40019018	A mɔn yi maxɔdinna ti, a naxa, “Yamari mundun ne ra?” Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “I nama faxan ti. I nama yalunyaan liga. I nama muɲan ti. I nama wule seren ba.
40019019	I baba nun i nga binya, i yi i adamadi boden xanu alo i yɛtɛna.”
40019020	Banxulanna yi a yabi, a naxa, “N bata ne birin suxu, nanfe fa luxi?”
40019021	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “Xa i waxi a xɔn ma, i xa findi muxu kamalixin na, siga, i sa i yii seene mati, i yi yiigelitɔne ki. I nafunla sɔtɔma nɛn ariyanna yi. Na xanbi ra, i fa bira n fɔxɔ ra.”
40019022	Banxulanna na mɛ waxatin naxan yi, a sunuxin yi siga amasɔtɔ nafulu gbee kanna nan yi a ra.
40019023	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi a fala a xarandiine xa, a naxa, “N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, nafulu kanne so raxɔlɔ Ariyanna Mangayani!
40019024	N mɔn xa a fala ɛ xa, nafulu kanna so raxɔlɔ Alaa Mangayani dangu ɲɔgɔmɛn so feen na sagilaan yinla ra.”
40019025	Xarandiine na mɛ waxatin naxan yi, e yi kabɛ kati! E yi a maxɔdin, e naxa, “Nde fa nɔɛ kisɛ nayi?”
40019026	Yesu yi e mato, a naxa, “Muxun mi nɔɛ na ligɛ koni Ala nɔɛ feen birin ligɛ nɛn.”
40019027	Na xanbi ra, Piyɛri yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “A mato, nxu bata feen birin beɲin, nxu bira i fɔxɔ ra. Nxu tan nanse sɔtɔma nayi?”
40019028	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, waxati nɛnɛ famatɔni, n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn na dɔxɔ n ma mangaya gbɛdɛ binyaxini, ɛ tan naxanye biraxi n fɔxɔ ra, ɛ fan dɔxɔma nɛn manga gbɛdɛ fu nun firinne ma, ɛ yi Isirayila bɔnsɔn fu nun firinne makiti.
40019029	Naxanye birin bata banxine lu na, hanma a ngaxakeden xɛmɛmane nun ɲaxalanmane hanma a fafe hanma a nga hanma a diine hanma a xɛɛne n tan ma fe ra, a na ɲɔxɔn kɛmɛ sɔtɔma nɛn e nun habadan nii rakisina.
40019030	Koni naxanye yɛɛn na, ne wuyaxi sa luma nɛn xanbin na. Naxanye xanbin na iki, ne yi sa lu yɛɛn na.”
40020001	Yesu naxa, “Ariyanna Mangayaan luxi nɛn alo xɛɛ kanna naxan minin subaxani muxu fendeni alogo e xa sa wali a manpa bili nakɔni.
40020002	E yi lan a ma, a xa e saranna fi gbeti gbanan keden, naxan lanɲɛ soge keden saranna ma. A yi e rasiga a manpa bili nakɔni.
40020003	Soge raxɛnxɛn waxatini, a keli, a siga lɔxɔ dɛɛn na, a yi muxuna ndee li tixi na, naxanye mi yi wali yo ra.
40020004	Nanara, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, ‘Ɛ fan xa siga, ɛ sa wali n ma manpa bili nakɔni, a lan n xa ɛ saren fi naxan na, n na soɛ ɛ yii.’
40020005	Awa, ne yi siga walideni. Na danguxina, a mɔn yi na ɲɔxɔn liga yanyi tagini e nun se din waxatin masoxina.
40020006	Awa, se din waxatin danguxina, a mɔn yi siga, a sa muxu gbɛtɛye fan li tixi na. A yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, ‘Ɛ fɛriɲɛnxi be nanfera? Ɛ mi fefe ligama?’
40020007	E yi a yabi, e naxa, ‘Bayo muxu yo mi nxu tixi wali ra.’ A yi a fala e xa, a naxa, ‘Awa, ɛ fan xa siga wali kɛdeni n ma manpa bili nakɔni.’ ”
40020008	“Ɲinbanna soxina, manpa bili nakɔ kanna yi a fala walikɛ kuntigin xa, a naxa, ‘Walikɛne xili, e saranna xa fi. A fɔlɔ dɔnxɛ ra xiine ma, i sa a raɲan a singe ra xiine ma.’
40020009	Xɛmɛn naxanye wanla fɔlɔ ɲinbari waxatini, ne keden kedenne birin yi gbeti gbanan keden keden sɔtɔ.
40020010	Nanara, muxun naxanye singe wanla fɔlɔ, ne to fa, e yi a miri fa fala, a e a sɔtɔma nɛn dangu bonne ra, koni e keden kedenna birin yi gbeti gbanan keden keden sɔtɔ.”
40020011	“Awa, e to yi a rasuxuma, e xɛɛ kanna mafala fɔlɔ.
40020012	E yi a fala, e naxa, ‘Muxun naxanye faxi dɔnxɛn na, ne waxatidi nan tun wali kɛxi. I nxu nun ne birin saren fima kii kedenna nin ba, nxu tan naxanye fɛriɲɛnxi sogen na?’
40020013	Xɛɛ kanna yi e tan nde keden yabi, a naxa, ‘Sɔxɔ, n mi tinxintareya xan ligaxi i ra. En mi lanxi gbeti gbanan keden xan ma ba?
40020014	I saranna tongo, i siga i konni. Naxanye faxi dɔnxɛn na, n waxi ne saranna fi feni alo n bata i saranna fi kii naxan yi.
40020015	N mi daxa ba, n xa n sagoon liga n ma gbetini? I n maxɔxɔlɔnma nɛn ba bayo n fonisire?’ ”
40020016	Na kiini, naxanye yɛɛn na, ne wuyaxi sa luma nɛn xanbin na. Naxanye xanbin na iki, ne yi sa lu yɛɛn na.
40020017	Yesu yi sigama Yerusalɛn taani waxatin naxan yi, a yi a xarandii fu nun firinne xali e danna. A yi a fala e xa,
40020018	a naxa, “Ɛ a mato, en sigama Yerusalɛn taani, n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn sa soma nɛn saraxarali kuntigine nun sariya karamɔxɔne yii na yi. E n ma kitin bolonma nɛn, a lan sayaan ma.
40020019	Na xanbi ra, e yi n so siya gbɛtɛne yii naxanye n magelema, e yi n bulan, e yi n gbangban wudin ma. A soge saxande lɔxɔni n kelima nɛn sayani.”
40020020	Sebede a dii xɛmɛne nga yi fa Yesu fɛma e nun a dii xɛmɛne, e yi e xinbi sin Yesu bun ma, e yi a maxandi fena nde ma.
40020021	Yesu yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, “I waxi nanse xɔn ma?” A yi a yabi, a naxa, “Tin, i na i ya mangayaan sɔtɔ, n ma dii xɛmɛ firinni itoe xa dɔxɔ i fɛma, kedenna i yiifanna ma, kedenna i kɔmɛnna ma.”
40020022	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ n maxandixin naxan ma, ɛ mi na kolon. Ɛ nɔɛ ɛ minɲɛ tɔrɔya igelengenna ra ba, n fama n mindeni naxan na?” E yi a yabi, e naxa, “Nxu nɔɛ nɛn.”
40020023	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ fama ɛ mindeni nɛn n ma tɔrɔya igelengenna ra yati! Koni muxun dɔxɔ fena n yiifanna ma hanma n kɔmɛnna ma, na mi n tan ma fɔ n fafe bata yi a ragidi naxanye xa.”
40020024	Xarandii fuun bonne na mɛ waxatin naxan yi, e xɔlɔ na ngaxakedenma firinne ma.
40020025	Nanara, Yesu yi e birin xili a fɛma, a naxa, “Ɛ a kolon yati siyane mangane nɔyaan nan ligama e xun na, e muxu gbeene fan yi kuntigiyaan naba e xun na.
40020026	Koni a mi na kiini ɛ tan tagi. Xa naxan yo wa findi feni muxu gbeen na ɛ yɛ, fɔ a xa findi ɛ walikɛɛn nan na.
40020027	Xa naxan yo wa findi feni ɛ yɛɛratiin na fɔ a xa findi ɛ konyin nan na
40020028	alo n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn to mi faxi muxe xa wali n xa koni alogo n tan xa wali, n yi n niin fi muxu wuyaxi xunbaan na.”
40020029	E yi kelima Yeriko taani waxatin naxan yi, yama gbeen yi bira Yesu fɔxɔ ra.
40020030	Danxutɔ firinna naxanye yi dɔxi kiraan na, ne yi a mɛ a Yesu dangumatɔɔn nan yi a ra, e yi gbelegbele, e naxa, “Nxu fafe, Dawudaa Dii Xɛmɛna, kininkinin nxu ma!”
40020031	Yamaan yi e masabari, koni e mɔn yi gbelegbele kati, e naxa, “Marigina, Dawudaa Dii Xɛmɛna, kininkinin nxu ma.”
40020032	Awa, Yesu yi ti, a yi e xili, a yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, “Ɛ waxi a xɔn ma n xa nanfe liga ɛ xa?”
40020033	E yi a yabi, e naxa, “Marigina, nxu waxi a xɔn ma nɛn, nxu mɔn xa seen to.”
40020034	Yesu yi kininkinin e ma, a yi a yiin din e yɛɛne ra. E yi seen to mafurɛn, e bira Yesu fɔxɔ ra.
40021001	E to maso Yerusalɛn taan na, e yi Betifage taan li, Oliwi Geyaan fari. Yesu yi a xarandii firin nasiga e yɛɛ ra.
40021002	A yi a ɲungu e ma, a naxa, “Ɛ siga banxidɛɛn na ɛ yɛɛ ra, ɛ sa sofanla nde lima xidixi na yi, a diina a fɛma. Ɛ a fulun, ɛ fa e firinna ra n xɔn ma.
40021003	Xa muxuna nde ɛ maxɔdin, ɛ a fala a xa, ɛ naxa, ‘Marigin nan mako a ma,’ na kanna e soma ɛ yii nɛn sa.”
40021004	Na liga nɛn alogo nabiin naxan fala, na xa kamali, a naxa,
40021005	“Ɛ a fala Siyon kaane xa, ɛ naxa, ‘Ɛ a mato! Ɛ mangan fama ɛ ma. A limaniya. A fama sofanla nan fari, sofali diina, sofali gilɛna diina.’ ”
40021006	Na ma, xarandiine yi siga, Yesu naxan fala e xa, e sa na liga.
40021007	E yi fa sofanla nun a diin na. E yi e dugine yifulun e fari, Yesu yi dɔxɔ sofanla fari.
40021008	Yamaan yi e dugine yifulun kiraan xɔn ma, nde yi ɲɔxɔndene magira, e yi e sa kiraan xɔn a binya feen na.
40021009	Yamaan naxan yi a yɛɛ ra e nun a xanbi ra, ne birin yi lu sɔnxɔɛ, e naxa, “Tantunna xa fi Dawudaa dii xɛmɛn ma! Naxan fama Marigin xinli, Ala xa na baraka! Ala tantun kore xɔnna ma pon!”
40021010	Yesu so Yerusalɛn taani waxatin naxan yi, taan yi maxa. Yamaan yi maxɔdinna ti, e naxa, “Nde ito ra?”
40021011	Yamaan yi e yabi, e naxa, “Nabi Yesu nan ito ra, keli Nasarɛti taani Galile yamanani.”
40021012	Yesu to so Ala Batu Banxini, a yi sare matine nun sare soone birin kedi na yi. A yi gbeti masarane tabanla rafelen e nun ganba matine gbɛdɛne.
40021013	A yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “A sɛbɛxi Kitabun kui, Ala naxa, ‘N ma Banxin xili bama nɛn Ala maxandi banxina.’ Koni ɛ tan bata a findi muɲadene luxunden na!”
40021014	Danxutɔne nun lɛbutɛnne yi siga Yesu fɛma Ala Batu Banxini, a yi e rakɛndɛya.
40021015	Koni saraxarali kuntigine nun sariya karamɔxɔne to a to kabanako feene ligɛ, e diidine fan to naxanye yi sɔnxɔma Ala Batu Banxini, e naxa, “Tantunna xa fi Dawudaa Dii Xɛmɛn ma,” e yi xɔlɔ.
40021016	E yi a fala Yesu xa, e naxa, “I mi diidine falan mɛɛn ba?” Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Di! Ɛ mi Kitabun yireni ito xaranxi ba, naxan a falaxi, ‘I bata diidine nun dii ɲɔrɛne yamari, e yi i matɔxɔ?’ ”
40021017	Yesu yi e lu mɛnni, a keli taani, a siga Betani taani a sa xi na.
40021018	Na xɔtɔn bode, a xɛtɛmatɔɔn Yerusalɛn taani, kamɛn yi a suxu.
40021019	A yi xɔdɛ binla to kiraan dɛxɔn ma, a yi siga a bun ma, koni a mi a bogi yo li a ra, fɔ a dɛɛne. Nanara, a yi a fala xɔdɛ binla ma, a naxa, “I tan mi fa bogin sɔnɔn!” Awa, na waxatin yɛtɛni xɔdɛ binla yi xara!
40021020	Xarandiine to na to, e yi kabɛ, e maxɔdinna ti, e naxa, “Xɔdɛ binli ito xaraxi di xulɛn?”
40021021	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, xa ɛ dɛnkɛlɛyaxi, ɛ mi sikɛ, n naxan ligaxi xɔdɛ binli ito ra, ɛ fan nɔɛ na ɲɔxɔnna ligɛ nɛn. A birin xa mi na ra, ɛ nɔɛ a falɛ nɛn geyaan xa, ɛ naxa, ‘Keli be, i sa sin fɔxɔ igeni,’ na yi liga.
40021022	Xa ɛ dɛnkɛlɛyaxi, ɛ na sese maxɔdin Ala ra, ɛ na sɔtɔma nɛn.”
40021023	Yesu mɔn yi fa Ala Batu Banxini. A yi yamaan xaranma waxatin naxan yi, saraxarali kuntigine nun yamaan fonne yi fa a fɛma, e yi a maxɔdin, e naxa, “I feni itoe ligama sɛnbɛ mundun na, nde i yamarixi i xa feni itoe liga?”
40021024	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “N fan xa ɛ maxɔdin fe keden ma, xa ɛ n yabi, n feene ligama sɛnbɛn naxan yi, n fan na falama ɛ xa nɛn.
40021025	Nde Yoni rafaxi a xa muxune rafu igeni e tubi xinla ma, a kelixi Ala nan ma ba, hanma muxune?” E yi falan ti fɔlɔ e bode tagi, e naxa, “Xa en a yabi fa fala a kelixi Ala nan ma, a falama nɛn nayi, a naxa, ‘Nanfera ɛ mi laxi Yoni ra?’
40021026	Koni xa en a fala fa fala a kelixi muxun nan ma, en gaxu yamaan yɛɛ ra bayo e birin laxi a ra a nabiin nan yi Yoni ra.”
40021027	Nanara, e yi Yesu yabi, e naxa, “Nxu mi a kolon.” Awa, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “N tan fan feni itoe ligama sɛnbɛn naxan yi, n mi na falama ɛ xa na yi.”
40021028	“Ɛ xaxili lu ito xɔn ma. Xɛmɛna nde yi na, dii xɛmɛ firin yi naxan yii. A siga a forimaan fɛma, a sa a fala a xa, a naxa, ‘N ma diina, siga wali kɛdeni n ma nakɔni to.’
40021029	A yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘N mi waxi siga feni.’ Koni dɔnxɛn na, a bɔɲɛn yi maxɛtɛ, a siga.
40021030	A fafe yi siga a diin bonna fɛma, a sa na fala kedenna ti na fan xa, a yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘N fafe, n sigama nɛn.’ Koni a mi siga.
40021031	Ne firinna yɛ, nde a fafe sagoon ligaxi?” E yi a yabi, e naxa, “Forimana.” Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, mudu maxinle nun yalundene singe soma ɛ yɛɛ ra Alaa Mangayani.
40021032	Amasɔtɔ Yoni bata fa, a tinxinna kiraan yita ɛ ra, ɛ mi la a ra. Koni mudu maxinle nun yalundene bata la a ra. Hali ɛ to na to, ɛ bɔɲɛ mi maxɛtɛ, ɛ la a ra.”
40021033	Yesu naxa, “Ɛ tuli mati sanda gbɛtɛ ra. Nakɔ kanna nde yi na nun naxan manpa bili nakɔɔn sa, a yi a sansan, a yi manpa ige badeni tɔn, a yi gbengben ti. Na xanbi ra, a yi nakɔɔn taxu a kantan muxune ra, a siga sigatini.
40021034	Awa, a bogi waxatina a lixina, a yi a walikɛna ndee rasiga a nakɔɔn kantan muxune ma, a e xa a gbeen so ne yii.
40021035	Nakɔɔn kantan muxune yi nakɔ kanna walikɛne suxu, e kedenna mabɔnbɔ, e bonna faxa, e bonna magɔlɔn gɛmɛne ra.
40021036	Na xanbi ra, nakɔ kanna mɔn yi a walikɛ gbɛtɛye rasiga, naxanye yi wuya dangu a fɔlɔyixine ra. Nakɔ kantan muxune yi ne fan liga na kii kedenni.
40021037	Dɔnxɛn na, a yi a dii xɛmɛn nasiga e ma, a naxa, ‘E danma nɛn n ma diin tan na.’ ”
40021038	“Koni nakɔ kantanne to a dii xɛmɛn to, e yi a fala e bode xa, e naxa, ‘Nakɔ kanna kɛ tongon nan ito ra, ɛ fa be, en na a faxa alogo en xa a kɛɛn sɔtɔ.’
40021039	Nayi, e yi a suxu, e siga a torontoronɲɛ nakɔ xɛɛn fari ma, e sa a faxa.
40021040	Awa, nakɔ kanna na fa waxatin naxan yi, a nanfe ligama nakɔ kantanne ra?”
40021041	E yi a yabi, e naxa, “A na muxu ɲaxine faxama nɛn kii ɲaxini, a yi nakɔɔn taxu muxu gbɛtɛye ra naxanye a gbeen soɛ a yii a xaba waxatini.”
40021042	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ munma Kitabun yireni ito xaran ba? A naxa, ‘Banxi tiine e mɛ gɛmɛn naxan na, na bata findi banxin gɛmɛ fisamantenna ra. Marigin nan na ligaxi, a findi kabanako feen na en yɛɛ ra yi.’ ”
40021043	Yesu naxa, “Nanara, n na a falama ɛ xa, Alaa Mangayaan bama ɛ yii nɛn, a so yama gbɛtɛn yii, naxanye kɛwali lanɲɛ a ma.
40021044	Naxan yo na bira gɛmɛni ito fari, na yigirama nɛn a dungin dungin na. Koni xa a nu bira naxan yo fari, a na yilunburunma nɛn.”
40021045	Saraxarali kuntigine nun Farisi muxune to Yesu a sandan mɛ, e yi a kolon a falan tima e tan nan ma.
40021046	Nanara, e yi kata a suxu feen na, koni e yi gaxu yamaan yɛɛ ra naxanye yi a mirixi fa fala a nabiin nan Yesu ra.
40022001	Yesu mɔn yi sandan sa yamaan xa.
40022002	A yi a fala, a naxa, “Ariyanna Mangayaan luxi nɛn alo mangan naxan ɲaxalandi tiin sɛwa donse donna malanni tɔn a dii xɛmɛn xa.
40022003	A yi a walikɛne rasiga a muxu xilixine ma alogo e xa fa donse donna malanni, koni e mi tin fɛ.
40022004	Nanara, a yi a walikɛ gbɛtɛye rasiga e ma, a naxa, ‘Ɛ sa a fala e xa, a donseen birin bata yitɔn iki. N bata n ma turaan nun ɲinge raturaxine faxa, seen birin bata yitɔn. Ɛ fa ɲaxalandi tiin donse donna malanni!’
40022005	Koni e mi a yatɛ, e siga e makone ra. Nde yi siga xɛɛne ma, nde yi siga e wanle ra.
40022006	A dɔnxɛne yi walikɛne suxu, e yi e rayarabi, e yi e faxa.”
40022007	“Mangan yi xɔlɔ kati, a yi a sofane rasiga, e sa faxa tiine halagi, e yi e taan gan.
40022008	Na xanbi ra, a yi a walikɛne xili, a naxa, ‘Ɲaxalandi tiin malanna bata yitɔn koni n muxun naxanye xilixi, ne mi yi daxa e xa xili.
40022009	Awa, iki ɛ siga kira xunne ma. Ɛ na muxu yo to, ɛ ne xili malanni.’
40022010	Nanara, walikɛne yi siga kira xunne ma, e muxun naxanye birin to, e yi ne malan muxu ɲaxine nun muxu faɲine birin. Nayi, ɲaxalandi tiin malan yiren yi rafe muxu xilixine ra.”
40022011	“Koni mangan to so, a xa a muxu xilixine to, a yi xɛmɛna nde to mɛnni, ɲaxalandi ti domaan mi yi a ma.
40022012	A yi a maxɔdin, a naxa, ‘Sɔxɔ, i soxi be di, anu, i mi maxidixi alo a daxa ɲaxalandi ti malanni kii naxan yi?’ Koni xɛmɛn mi a yabi sɔtɔ.
40022013	Mangan yi a fala a walikɛne xa, a naxa, ‘Ɛ a xidi ken, ɛ yi a ramini tanden ma dimini, wugan nun ɲin naxinna dɛnaxan yi.’ ”
40022014	Yesu naxa, “Muxu wuyaxi xilixi koni muxu dando nan tun sugandixi.”
40022015	Farisi muxune yi siga, e sa Yesu tɔɲɛgɛ feni tɔn a fala xuiin xɔn ma.
40022016	E yi e xarandiina nde nun Herode a muxuna nde rasiga Yesu fɛma a faladeni, e naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, nxu a kolon fa fala ɲɔndi falan nan i tan na, i yamaan xaranma Ala ɲɔndin nan ma. Muxe mi nɔɛ i ya miriyaan maxɛtɛ, amasɔtɔ i mi muxune rafisaxi e bode xa.
40022017	Awa, i mirixi a ma di, a fala nxu xa, a daxa mudun yi fi Romi Manga Gbeen ma ba hanma a nama fi?”
40022018	Koni Yesu yi e nata ɲaxin kolon. A yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ tan nafigine! Nanfera, ɛ katama n bunbadeni?
40022019	Ɛ gbeti gbananna yita n na mudun fima naxan na!” E yi gbeti gbananna yita a ra.
40022020	Yesu yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, “Nde xili nun a yɛtagin sawura a ma?”
40022021	E yi a yabi, e naxa, “Romi Manga Gbeena.” Nayi, Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Mangan gbeen xa so a yii, Ala gbeen yi so Ala yii.”
40022022	E na mɛ waxatin naxan yi, e kabɛ kati, e keli a fɛma, e siga.
40022023	Na lɔxɔn yɛtɛni, Saduse muxune yi e maso Yesu ra naxanye a falama a faxa muxune mi kelima sayani. E yi Yesu maxɔdin,
40022024	e naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, Musa bata yi a fala, a naxa, ‘Xa xɛmɛn faxa, a mi dii lu, a ngaxakedenna xa a kɛ ɲaxanla tongo alogo a xa diina nde bari faxa muxun xa.’
40022025	Awa, ngaxakedenmane muxu solofere yi be nun, forimaan yi ɲaxanla futu, a faxa, a mi dii sɔtɔ, a ɲaxanla yi lu a xunyɛn xa.
40022026	A yi liga na kiini a firinden fan na, a saxanden fan yi liga na kiini, na yi liga han solofere.
40022027	Dɔnxɛn na, ɲaxanla fan yi faxa.
40022028	Awa, faxa muxune na keli waxatin naxan yi, ɲaxanla findima nde gbee ra na muxu soloferene yɛ? Bayo e birin bata yi a dɔxɔ.”
40022029	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ bata tantan, amasɔtɔ ɛ mi Kitabun kolon hanma Ala sɛnbɛna.
40022030	Bayo faxa muxune na keli waxatin naxan yi, e ligama nɛn alo malekan naxanye ariyanna yi. Xɛmɛn mi ɲaxalan futɛ, ɲaxanla mi dɔxɛ xɛmɛn xɔn.
40022031	Awa, naxan lanxi faxa muxune rakeli feen ma, ɛ mi Alaa falan xaranxi ba? A naxa,
40022032	‘Iburahimaa Ala nan n tan na, e nun Isiyagaa Ala e nun Yaxubaa Ala.’ Anu, faxa muxune Ala mi a tan na fɔ niiramane.”
40022033	Yamaan na mɛ waxatin naxan yi, e kabɛ Yesu a xaranna ma kati!
40022034	Farisi muxune a mɛ waxatin naxan yi, a Yesu yabi kiin bata a liga Saduse muxune yi dundu, e yi e malan.
40022035	Sariya karamɔxɔ keden yi na, na yi Yesu kɛɲaan fɛsɛfɛsɛ, a yi a maxɔdin,
40022036	a naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, yamarin mundun gbo dangu a birin na Sariya Kitabuni?”
40022037	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “ ‘I Marigina Ala xanu i bɔɲɛn birin na e nun i niin birin na e nun i xaxinla birin na.’
40022038	Yamarini ito gbo dangu e birin na.
40022039	A firindeni ito luxi nɛn alo bonna, a naxa, ‘I adamadi boden xanu alo i yɛtɛna.’
40022040	Sariya Kitabun nun nabine kitabune birin singanxi yamari firinni itoe nan na.”
40022041	Farisi muxune malanxi waxatin naxan yi, Yesu yi e maxɔdin, a naxa,
40022042	“Ɛ mirixi Alaa Muxu Sugandixina feen ma di? Nde bɔnsɔn a ra?” E yi a yabi, e naxa, “Dawuda bɔnsɔnna nan a ra.”
40022043	Yesu yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, “Nanfera Dawuda a xili bama ‘N Marigina’ fata Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin na? Amasɔtɔ Dawuda a falama, a naxa,
40022044	‘Marigin yi a fala n marigin xa, a naxa, “Dɔxɔ n yiifanna ma, han n yi i yaxune sa i sanna bun ma.” ’
40022045	Awa, xa Dawuda a xili bama, ‘N Marigina,’ na ma, Alaa Muxu Sugandixin findixi Dawuda bɔnsɔnna ra di?”
40022046	Muxu yo mi nɔ a yabɛ fala keden peen na! Keli na waxatin ma, muxu yo mi fa susu a maxɔdinɲɛ fe gbɛtɛ ma.
40023001	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi falan ti yamaan nun a xarandiine xa,
40023002	a naxa, “Sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxune dɔxi Nabi Musa funfun nin.
40023003	Nayi, ɛ e falane birin suxu, ɛ yi e liga. Koni ɛ nama e kɛwali sifane tan liga, amasɔtɔ e naxan falama, e mi na ligama.
40023004	E goron binyene raxidima, e yi e dɔxɔ muxune xun ma, koni hali e yii sonla, e tan mi waxi na din feni e ra e maxalideni.
40023005	E feen birin ligama nɛn alogo muxune xa e to. Nayi, e Kitabu falane sɛbɛma, e yi a xidi e tigine nun e yiine ra han a gbo ayi. E domane maxidixi luti dɛnbɛxi kuyene ra.
40023006	Binye dɔxɔdene rafan e ma malanne yi, e dɔxɔ yamaan yɛɛ ra salide banxine yi.
40023007	Binye xɔntɔnne rafan e ma lɔxɔ tidene yi, muxune yi e xili ‘Karamɔxɔ.’ ”
40023008	“Koni muxe nama ɛ tan xili ba fa fala, ‘Karamɔxɔ,’ amasɔtɔ ngaxakedenmaan nan ɛ birin na, karamɔxɔ keden pee nan ɛ yii.
40023009	Awa, ɛ nama muxu yo xili dunuɲa ito yi fa fala, ‘N Fafe,’ amasɔtɔ Fafe keden pee nan ɛ yii ariyanna yi.
40023010	Ɛ nama tin muxune xa ɛ xili ‘Kuntigina,’ amasɔtɔ kuntigi keden peen nan ɛ yii. Alaa Muxu Sugandixin nan na ra.
40023011	Muxun naxan gbo ɛ birin xa, na xa findi ɛ konyin na.
40023012	Naxan na a yɛtɛ yite, na yigodoma nɛn. Naxan na a yɛtɛ magodo, na yitema nɛn.”
40023013	“Gbalona ɛ xa, ɛ tan sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxu nafigine! Amasɔtɔ ɛ Ariyanna Mangayaan dɛɛn nagalin muxune yɛɛ ra, ɛ tan yɛtɛɛn mi soma, ɛ mɔn mi muxune luma e so naxanye waxi so feni.”
40023014	“Gbalona ɛ xa, ɛ tan sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxu nafigine! Amasɔtɔ ɛ kaɲa gilɛne yii seene bama e yii. Ɛ yi ɛ yɛtɛ mayita sali xunkuyeni. Ɛ yalagima nɛn na feene ma a ɲaxin na.”
40023015	“Gbalona ɛ xa, ɛ tan sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxu nafigine! Ɛ fɔxɔ igen nun bɔxɔ xɔnna birin yisigama alogo ɛ xa tubi muxu keden peen sɔtɔ. Ɛ na a sɔtɔ ɛ a findima nɛn yahannama kaan na naxan ɲaxu ɛ tan xa dɔxɔ firin.”
40023016	“Gbalona ɛ xa, ɛ tan danxutɔɔn naxanye danxutɔɔn yii rasuxuma. Ɛ tan naxanye a falama, ɛ naxa, ‘Xa muxuna nde a kɔlɔ Ala Batu Banxin xinli, hali a mi a rakamali, koni naxan na a kɔlɔ Ala Batu Banxina xɛmani, fɔ na kanna xa a falan nakamali.’
40023017	Ɛ tan danxutɔ xaxilitarene! Mundun gbo xɛmana hanma Ala Batu Banxin naxan a xɛmaan nasariɲanma?
40023018	Ɛ mɔn a falama, ɛ naxa, ‘Xa muxuna nde a kɔlɔ saraxa ganden xinli, hali a mi a rakamali. Koni xa muxuna nde a kɔlɔ saraxan yɛtɛni naxan saraxa ganden fari, fɔ a xa a falan nakamali.’
40023019	Danxutɔne! Mundun gbo saraxana hanma saraxa ganden naxan saraxan nasariɲanma?
40023020	Awa, naxan na a kɔlɔ saraxa ganden xinli, na bata a kɔlɔ saraxa ganden xinli e nun seen naxanye birin a fari.
40023021	Naxan na a kɔlɔ Ala Batu Banxin xinli, na bata a kɔlɔ Ala Batu Banxin nun Ala yɛtɛni, naxan luma ɛ yɛ mɛnni.
40023022	Muxun naxan na a kɔlɔ ariyanna yi na bata a kɔlɔ Alaa manga gbɛdɛni e nun naxan dɔxi a yi.”
40023023	“Gbalona ɛ xa, sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxu nafigine, ɛ nakɔ yi seene yaganna bama alo sorontonna nun sabi se gbɛtɛye, koni ɛ bata ɛ mɛ sariyana fe gbeene ra, alo kiti kɛndɛn nun kininkininna nun tɔgɔndiyana. Anu, ɛ lan ɛ xa ne nan liga, e nun fe dɔnxɛne.
40023024	Ɛ tan danxutɔɔn naxanye danxutɔne yii rasuxuma, ɛ minseen naserendenma alogo ɛ xa soso keden peedin ba a yi, koni ɛ yi ɲɔgɔmɛn gerun!”
40023025	“Gbalona ɛ xa, sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxu nafigine, ɛ igelengenna nun ɛ donse saseen fanna masugusuguma, koni e kuiin nafexi milan nun yɛtɛ rafan fe ɲaxine ra.
40023026	I tan Farisi muxu danxutɔna, i ya igelengenna nun i ya donse saseen kui maxa singen, alogo a fanna fan xa sariɲan.”
40023027	“Gbalona ɛ xa, sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxu nafigine. Ɛ luxi nɛn alo banxi faɲin naxan tixi gaburun xun ma bɛndɛ fixɛn soxi naxan ma naxanye fari tofan, koni e kuiin nafexi faxa muxu xɔnne ra e nun se xɔsixin sifan birin.
40023028	Ɛ fan na kiini, ɛ yɛtɛ findima tinxin muxun nan na muxune birin yɛtagi, koni ɛ kuiin nafexi nafigiyaan nun fe ɲaxine ra pen!”
40023029	“Gbalona ɛ xa, sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxu nafigine. Ɛ banxi tofaɲine tima nabine gaburune xun ma, ɛ yi tinxin muxune gaburune ratofanɲɛ ayi.
40023030	Ɛ yi a fala, ɛ naxa, ‘Xa nxu yi na nun nxu benbane waxatini, nxu mi yi kafuma e ma e nabine faxa waxatin naxan yi.’
40023031	Awa, ɛ tan yɛtɛɛn sereyaan bama ɛ yɛtɛ xili ma fa fala naxanye nabine faxa, ne nan bɔnsɔn ɛ ra.
40023032	Awa, ɛ benbane hakɛne dɛfe!
40023033	Ɛ tan kosone, ɛ tan saɲi bɔnsɔnne, ɛ giyɛ yahannama kitin bun ma di?”
40023034	“Nanara, n nabine nun xaxilimane nun sariya karamɔxɔne rasigama ɛ ma. Ɛ nde faxama nɛn, ɛ yi nde gbangban wudin ma. Ɛ yi nde bulan salide banxine kui, ɛ yi e sagatan keli taa ma han taa ma.
40023035	Na kiini, ɛ saranma nɛn na tinxin muxune birin faxa feen na, keli Habila tinxin muxun ma han Sakari, Bɛrɛkaya dii xɛmɛna, ɛ naxan faxa Ala Batu Banxin nun saraxa ganden tagi.
40023036	N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, na birin xɛtɛma nɛn iki muxune ma.”
40023037	“Yerusalɛn kaane! Yerusalɛn kaane! Ɛ tan naxanye nabine faxaxi, ɛ yi Alaa xɛrane magɔlɔn. A xɔnla n suxu nɛn sanɲa ma wuyaxi n xa ɛ malan n fɛma alo tɔxɛ ngana a diine malanma a gabutɛɛn bun kii naxan yi, koni ɛ mi tin!
40023038	Awa, Ala ɛ konna rabeɲinma nɛn fefe!
40023039	Amasɔtɔ n xa a fala ɛ xa, ɛ mi fa n toma sɔnɔn han ɛ yi a fala, ɛ naxa, ‘Naxan fama Marigin xinli, Ala xa na baraka!’ ”
40024001	Yesu yi keli na, a siga. A to yi minima Ala Batu Banxini, a xarandiine yi fa a fɛma, e yi Ala Batu Banxin ti kiin yita a ra.
40024002	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ mi seni itoe birin toma ba? N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, gɛmɛni ito kedenna mi luma a funfuni be. E e birin xuyama ayi nɛn.”
40024003	Yesu yi dɔxi Oliwi Geyaan fari waxatin naxan yi, a xarandiine yi siga a fɛma wundoni, e yi a maxɔdin, e naxa, “Feni itoe birin ligan waxatin naxan yi, na fala nxu xa, e nun taxamasenna naxanye i fa waxatin nun waxati raɲanna yitama nxu ra.”
40024004	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ a liga ɛ yeren ma alogo muxe nama ɛ mayenden.
40024005	Amasɔtɔ muxu wuyaxi fama nɛn n xinli, e yi a fala, e naxa, ‘Alaa Muxu Sugandixin nan n tan na,’ e muxu wuyaxi mayenden.
40024006	Ɛ yɛngɛ feene mɛma nɛn, ɛ yɛngɛna ndee xinla mɛ. Koni ɛ nama gaxu. A fɛrɛ mi na fɔ na fe sifane xa liga nɛn, koni waxati raɲanna mi na ra singen.
40024007	Siyana ndee siyana ndee yɛngɛma nɛn, yamanana ndee yi yamanana ndee yɛngɛ. Fitina kamɛne yi so, bɔxɔn yi xuruxurun yirena ndee yi.
40024008	Na feene birin ligama nɛn alo ɲaxanla dii bari kuiin xɔlɛ singena.”
40024009	“Na xanbi ra, e ɛ suxuma nɛn, e yi ɛ tɔrɔ, e yi ɛ faxa. Siyane birin ɛ raɲaxuma nɛn n tan ma fe ra.
40024010	Muxu wuyaxi birama nɛn tantanni na waxatini, e yi e bode yanfa, e e bode so yiini, e yi e bode raɲaxu.
40024011	Wule nabi wuyaxi fama nɛn e fa muxu wuyaxi mayenden.
40024012	Fe ɲaxin gboma ayi nɛn dunuɲa yi han muxu wuyaxi a xanuntenyaan yi xurun.
40024013	Koni naxan na a yixɔdɔxɔ han a raɲanna, na kisima nɛn.
40024014	Awa, Alaax Mangayana falan Xibaru Faɲin kawandin bama nɛn dunuɲa yiren birin yi, a findi seren na siyane birin xa, na xanbi ra waxati raɲanna yi a li.”
40024015	“Ɛ na Se Haramuxin to tixi yire sariɲanxini naxan halagin tima, Nabi Daniyɛli naxan ma fe fala, (naxan ito xaranma, na xa a bunna kolon,)
40024016	nayi, naxanye Yudaya yi, ne xa e gi, e te geyane fari.
40024017	Muxun naxan a kore banxin kɔɛ ra, na nama xɛtɛ, a godo banxini a yii seene tongodeni.
40024018	Muxun naxan xɛɛn ma, na nama xɛtɛ banxini a domaan tongodeni.
40024019	Gbalo gbeen fudi kanne nun diin ngane yɛɛ ra na waxatine yi!
40024020	Ɛ Ala maxandi alogo ɛ giin nama lan xunbeli waxatin ma hanma Matabu Lɔxɔna!
40024021	Amasɔtɔ na lɔxɔne tɔrɔn ɲaxuma ayi nɛn dangu a birin na. A ɲɔxɔn munma liga singen xabu dunuɲa da waxatini han iki. A ɲɔxɔn fan mi fa ligama sɔnɔn!
40024022	Xa Ala mi yi nde ba na lɔxɔne ra nun, muxu yo mi yi kisima, koni a bata nde ba a ra a muxu sugandixine fe ra.”
40024023	“Awa na waxatini, xa muxuna nde a fala, a naxa, ‘A mato, Alaa Muxu Sugandixin be yi,’ hanma, ‘A sa mɛnni,’ ɛ nama la na ra.
40024024	Amasɔtɔ wule muxu sugandixine nun wule nabine kelima nɛn, e taxamaseri gbeene nun kabanako feene liga alogo hali Alaa muxu sugandixine, e xa ne mayenden, xa na lanɲɛ.
40024025	Ɛ a mato, n bata a fala ɛ xa benun a waxatin xa a li.
40024026	Nanara, xa muxu yo a fala ɛ xa, a naxa, ‘A mato, a sa burunna ra!’ Ɛ nama siga na! Hanma xa e a fala fa fala, ‘A luxunxi be yi!’ Ɛ nama la na ra!
40024027	Amasɔtɔ alo kuyen na a ɲinna masɔxɔn keli sogetedeni han sogegododeni, n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn fama na kii nin.
40024028	Binbin dɛnaxan yi, dugane e malanma mɛnna nin.”
40024029	“Na tɔrɔ lɔxɔne na dangu, ‘sogeni dimima nɛn, kiken mi fa dɛgɛma, sarene kelima nɛn kore e bira, kore xɔnna sɛnbɛne yimaxama nɛn.’
40024030	Nayi, n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛna taxamasenna minima nɛn kɛnɛnni kore. Dunuɲa siyane birin yi wuga. E n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn toma fɛ nɛn kore xɔnna kundani sɛnbɛn nun binyeni.
40024031	Xɔta xui gbeen na mini, n na n ma malekane rasigama nɛn bɔxɔn tongon naaninne birin yi, e yi n ma muxu yɛbaxine malan, keli dunuɲa danna bonna ma sa dɔxɔ bonna ra.”
40024032	“Ɛ xaxili sɔtɔ xɔdɛ binla fe ma. A yiine na maɲingi a dɛɛne yi mini fɔlɔ, ɛ a kolonma nɛn nayi fa fala ɲɛmɛn bata maso.
40024033	A na kii nin, ɛ na feni itoe birin to waxatin naxan yi, ɛ a kolonma nɛn fa fala waxati saxin bata maso, a bata so dɛ yɛtɛɛn li.
40024034	N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, iki muxune mi danguma fɔ na feene birin liga.
40024035	Kore xɔnna nun bɔxɔ xɔnna danguma nɛn, koni n ma falane mi danguma habadan!”
40024036	“Muxu yo mi na lɔxɔn nun waxati saxin kolon, hali malekan naxanye ariyanna yi hanma Dii Xɛmɛna, fɔ a Fafe Ala keden peena.
40024037	N tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn fa feen ligama nɛn alo naxan liga Nuhan gbee waxatini.
40024038	Benun fufaan xa fa waxatin naxan yi, yamaan yi e dɛgema, e yi e minma, e yi ɲaxanle futuma, e yi e diine fima xɛmɛne ma futun na, han Nuhan so waxatin yi a li kunkin kui.
40024039	Koni feen naxan fama ligadeni e mi yi na kolon mumɛ han fufaan yi fa, a yi e birin xali. Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn na fa waxatin naxan yi, a ligama na kii nin.
40024040	Muxu firin luma nɛn xɛɛn ma na waxatini, keden xalima nɛn, keden yi lu na.
40024041	Ɲaxalan firin luma nɛn se dinni, kedenna xalima nɛn, keden yi lu na.
40024042	Ɛ lu ɛ yɛɛ ra yi, amasɔtɔ ɛ mi ɛ Marigin fa waxatin kolon.
40024043	Ɛ ɛ xaxili lu ito xɔn ma. Xa banxi kanna yi muɲaden fa waxatin kolonɲɛ kɔɛɛn na nun, a mi yi tinɲɛ muɲaden xa so a banxini, a yi luma a yɛɛ ra yi nɛn.
40024044	Nanara, ɛ xa ɛ yitɔn amasɔtɔ ɛ xaxili mi lɔxɔn nun waxatin naxan ma, n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn fama na waxatin nin.”
40024045	“Walikɛɛn mundun lannaya muxun nun xaxilimaan na? Naxan ma kuntigi a dɔxi walikɛɛn bodene xun na, a e donseen taxun e ra a waxatini, a tan nan na ra.
40024046	Na walikɛɛn sɛwama nɛn xa a kuntigina a li na wanla kɛ!
40024047	N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, a kuntigina a yii seen birin taxuma a ra nɛn.
40024048	Koni xa walikɛ ɲaxin na a ra, a a falama nɛn a yɛtɛ ma, a naxa, ‘N ma kuntigin bata buyɛ ayi.’
40024049	A yi lu walikɛɛn bonne bɔnbɔɛ, a yi a dɛge, a yi a min e nun dɔlɔ minne.
40024050	Awa, walikɛɛn yengi mi lɔxɔn naxan ma, a mi waxatin naxan kolon, a kuntigin fama na waxatin nin.
40024051	A kuntigina a ɲaxankatama nɛn, a yi a saran a xun yifu wanle ra, a lu wugan nun ɲin naxinna dɛnaxan yi.”
40025001	“Ariyanna Mangayaan luxi nɛn alo sungutun fuun naxanye e lɛnpune tongo e siga ɲaxalandi kanna ralandeni siga ɲaxalandi tiine malanni.
40025002	Xaxilitare suulun yi e yɛ, xaxilimaan nan yi suulunna bonne ra.
40025003	Xaxilitarene yi e lɛnpune tongo koni e mi ture tongo.
40025004	Koni xaxilimane yi e lɛnpune tongo, e yi turena nde sa goronne kui lɛnpun nadɛgɛ seen na.
40025005	Ɲaxalandi kanna to bu, xixɔnla yi sungutunne suxu, e xi.”
40025006	“Kɔɛ tagini sɔnxɔ xuiin yi mini, e naxa, ‘Ɲaxalandi kanna bata fa. Ɛ fa a ralan!’
40025007	Nayi, sungutunne birin yi xulun, e yi e lɛnpune yitɔn.
40025008	Xaxilitarene yi a fala xaxilimane xa, e naxa, ‘Ɛ nxu ki tureni, amasɔtɔ nxɔ lɛnpune tumaan ni i ra.’
40025009	Xaxilimane yi e yabi, e naxa, ‘Ɛn-ɛn, a mi en birin yiliyɛ. Ɛ siga sare matine fɛma ɛ sa nde sara ɛ yɛtɛ xa.’
40025010	Nayi, sungutun xaxilitarene yi siga ture saradeni. E sa mɛnni waxatin naxan yi, ɲaxalandi kanna yi fa. Sungutun suulunna naxanye yitɔnxi, ne yi so ɲaxalandi kanna fɔxɔ ra malanni. E dɛɛn nagali.
40025011	Na xanbi ra, sungutunna bonne yi fa, e naxa, ‘Nxu fafe, yandi, dɛɛn nabi nxu xa.’
40025012	Ɲaxalandi kanna yi e yabi, a naxa, ‘N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, n mi ɛ tan kolon mumɛ!’ ”
40025013	Yesu yi a fala, a naxa, “Ɛ lu ɛ yɛɛ ra yi amasɔtɔ ɛ mi lɔxɔn nun waxati saxin kolon.”
40025014	“Ariyanna Mangayaan ligaxi nɛn alo xɛmɛn naxan yi sigama sigatini, a yi a walikɛne xili, a yi a yii seene taxu e ra.
40025015	A yi xɛma gbanan suulun so keden yii, a yi firin so gbɛtɛ yii, a yi keden so a saxanden yii, e birin nun e yilan. Na xanbi ra, a yi siga sigatini.
40025016	Walikɛɛn naxan xɛma gbanan suulun sɔtɔ, na yi siga na ra yulayadeni mafurɛn, a yi xɛma gbanan suulun gbɛtɛ sɔtɔ.
40025017	Walikɛɛn naxan xɛma gbanan firin sɔtɔ, na fan yi firin gbɛtɛ sɔtɔ.
40025018	Koni walikɛɛn naxan xɛma gbanan keden sɔtɔ, na yi sa yinla ge, a yi a kuntigina xɛmaan luxun na.”
40025019	“Waxati xunkuye danguxina, walikɛne kuntigin yi fa alogo e xa e dɛntɛgɛ.
40025020	Walikɛɛn naxan xɛma gbanan suulun sɔtɔ, na yi fa, a yi xɛma gbanan suulun gbɛtɛ yita a ra. A yi a fala, a naxa, ‘N kanna, i xɛma gbanan suulun nan taxu n na. N bata suulun gbɛtɛ sɔtɔ, a tan ni i ra.’
40025021	Kuntigin yi a fala a xa, a naxa, ‘I bata i yixɔdɔxɔ, i tan walikɛ faɲin nun lannaya muxuna! I bata lannayaan liga fe xurune yi, nayi n fe gbeene taxuma i ra nɛn. Fa sɛwa n tan i kanna xɔn!’
40025022	Na xanbi ra, a xɛma gbanan firinna so naxan yii, na yi fa, a naxa, ‘N kanna, i xɛma gbanan firin nan so n yii. N bata firin gbɛtɛ sɔtɔ, a tan ni i ra.’
40025023	Kuntigin yi a fala a xa, a naxa, ‘I bata i yixɔdɔxɔ, i tan walikɛ faɲin nun lannaya muxuna! I bata lannayaan liga fe xurune yi, nayi n fe gbeene taxuma i ra nɛn. Fa sɛwa n xɔn!’
40025024	Dɔnxɛn na, naxan xɛma gbanan keden sɔtɔ, na yi fa, a naxa, ‘N kanna, n na a kolon a i ya fe xɔdɔxɔ. I seen xabama yireni i mi a bixi dɛnaxan yi, i donseen malanma yireni i mi se sixi dɛnaxan yi.
40025025	Na nan n gaxu, n yi siga, n yi sa i ya xɛmaan luxun bɔxɔn bun. I gbeen naxan na, na ni i ra.’
40025026	A kuntigin yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘I tan walikɛ ɲaxi salantenna, i a kolon ba, fa fala a n seen xabama yireni n mi a bixi dɛnaxan yi, n yi donseen malan yire yi n mi a sixi dɛnaxan yi.
40025027	Na ma, a yi lan nun i xa sa n ma xɛmaan taxu gbeti mara banxin yulane ra, alogo n na fa waxatin naxan yi, n yi xɛmaan nun a tɔnɔdin sɔtɔ.
40025028	Nba, ɛ xɛma gbananna ba a yii, xɛma gbanan fu naxan yii, ɛ a so na yii.
40025029	Amasɔtɔ seen muxun naxan yii, nde soma nɛn na yii mɔn, a yi a gbegbe sɔtɔ. Koni se mi naxan yii hali naxan di a yii, na bama a yii nɛn.
40025030	Nba, tɔnɔ mi na walikɛɛn naxan na, ɛ na woli tandeni, dimini, wugan nun ɲin naxinna dɛnaxan yi.’ ”
40025031	“N tan, muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn na fa a binyeni waxatin naxan yi, e nun malekane birin a fɔxɔ ra, a dɔxɔma nɛn a mangaya gbɛdɛni binyeni.
40025032	Dunuɲa siyane birin malanma nɛn a yɛtagi. A yi e yitaxun dɔxɔ firinna ra, alo xuruse rabaan yɛxɛɛne nun siine yitaxunma kii naxan yi.
40025033	A yɛxɛɛne malanma nɛn a yiifanna ma, a siine malan a kɔmɛnna ma.
40025034	Na xanbi ra, mangana a falama nɛn a yiifari ma muxune xa, a naxa, ‘Ɛ fa be, n Fafe Ala dubaxi ɛ tan naxanye xa. Ɛ fa ɛ kɛɛn sɔtɔ, mangayaan naxan yitɔnxi ɛ xa xabu dunuɲa da waxatini.
40025035	Bayo kamɛna n suxu nɛn, ɛ yi donseen so n yii. Min xɔnla yi n suxu, ɛ yi igen so n yii. N siga nɛn xɔɲɛyani, ɛ yi n yigiya.
40025036	Marabɛnna yi n suxu, ɛ yi n marabɛri ba. N yi fura, ɛ yi n dandan. N yi sa kasoon na, ɛ yi fa n xɔntɔn.’
40025037	Tinxin muxune a yabima nɛn na yi, e naxa, ‘Marigina, nxu i kamɛtɔɔn to minɛn yi, nxu yi donseen so i yii, hanma i min xɔlitɔna, nxu yi igen so i yii?
40025038	Nxu i to xɔɲɛyani waxatin mundun yi, nxu yi i yigiya, hanma marabɛnna i ma, nxu yi i marabɛri ba?
40025039	Nxu i to furaxi waxatin mundun yi, hanma i kasoon na, nxu yi i xɔntɔn?’
40025040	Mangana e yabima nɛn, a naxa, ‘N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, ɛ naxan liga ngaxakedendina nde xa, naxan xurun dangu birin na, ɛ na liga n tan nan xa nayi!’ ”
40025041	“Na xanbi ra, naxanye na lu a kɔmɛnna ma, a yi a fala ne xa, a naxa, ‘Ɛ masiga n na, dangatɔne, ɛ siga habadan tɛɛni naxan yitɔnxi Yinna Mangan Setana nun a malekane xa.
40025042	Bayo kamɛna n suxu nɛn, ɛ mi donseen so n yii. Min xɔnla yi n suxu, ɛ mi igen so n yii.
40025043	N yi lu xɔɲɛyani, ɛ mi n yigiya. Marabɛnna yi n suxu, ɛ mi n marabɛri ba, n fura kasoon na, ɛ mi n mali.’
40025044	Ne fan yi a yabi, e naxa, ‘Marigina, nxu i kamɛtɔɔn to minɛn yi, hanma i min xɔlitɔna hanma i xɔɲɛyani hanma i marabɛritɔna hanma i furetɔna hanma i kasoon na, nxu mi tin i maliyɛ?’
40025045	Mangana e yabima nɛn, a naxa, ‘N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, ɛ mi naxanye liga muxudini ito nde keden xa naxan xurun dangu birin na, ɛ mi na ligaxi n tan fan xa na yi.’
40025046	Awa, ne sigama habadan tɔrɔn nin. Koni tinxin muxune sigama habadan nii rakisin nin.”
40026001	Yesu to yelin na falane birin tiyɛ, a yi a fala a xarandiine xa, a naxa,
40026002	“Ɛ a kolon, a luxi xii firin Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla xa a li. N tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛna, e n yanfama nɛn, n lu yiini, e n gbangban.”
40026003	Na waxatini, saraxarali kuntigine nun yamaan fonne yi e malan Saraxarali Kuntigi Singe Kayafa konni.
40026004	E yi a nata e xa Yesu suxu yanfani e yi a faxa.
40026005	E yi a fala, e naxa, “En nama a suxu sanla waxatini, xanamu, yamaan murutɛma nɛn!”
40026006	Yesu yi Simɔn dogonfontɔna banxini waxatin naxan yi Betani taani,
40026007	ɲaxanla nde yi fa a fɛma, a fa latikɔnɔnna sare xɔdɛxɛn na a sase gɛmɛ ramaan kui, gɛmɛn naxan xili “alabasita,” a yi a sa Yesu xunna ra a binye feen na a yi a dɛgema waxatin naxan yi.
40026008	Yesu a xarandiine to na to, e yi xɔlɔ, e yi maxɔdinna ti, e naxa, “I ito birin yikalama nanfera?
40026009	Latikɔnɔnni ito yi matiyɛ nɛn sare xɔdɛxɛn na, a saren yi so yiigelitɔne yii.”
40026010	Koni Yesu yi a kolon, e yi naxan falama, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ ɲaxanli ito mafalama nanfera? A bata fe faɲin liga n xa.
40026011	Amasɔtɔ yiigelitɔne ɛ fɛma waxatin birin koni n tan mi luma ɛ fɛma waxatin birin.
40026012	A bata latikɔnɔnna sa n fatin ma alogo n xa n yitɔn gaburuna fe ra.
40026013	N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, n ma falan Xibaru Faɲini ito na rali dunuɲa yire yo yi, ɲaxanli ito kɛwanla falama nɛn, yamaan yi e miri a ma.”
40026014	Nayi, xarandii muxu fu nun firinna nde keden naxan yi xili Yudasi Isakariyoti yi, na yi siga saraxarali kuntigine fɛma,
40026015	a naxa, “Xa n Yesu so ɛ yii, ɛ nanse soma n yii?” Ne yi gbeti gbanan tonge saxan so a yii.
40026016	Fɔlɔ na waxatin ma, Yudasi yi lu fɛrɛn fenɲɛ, alogo a xa Yesu yanfa, a a so e yii.
40026017	Buru Tetaren Sanla soge fɔlɔna xarandiine yi fa Yesu fɛma, e yi a maxɔdin, e naxa, “I waxi a xɔn ma nxu xa Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla donseen nafala i xa minɛn?”
40026018	A yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ siga xɛmɛna nde fɛma taani, ɛ sa a fala a xa, ɛ naxa, ‘Karamɔxɔ naxa, n ma waxatin bata a li. N tan nun n ma xarandiine xa Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla donseen don i ya banxini.’ ”
40026019	Xarandiine yi a liga alo Yesu a fala e xa kii naxan yi, e yi Halagi Tiin Dangu Lɔxɔn Sanla donseni tɔn.
40026020	Ɲinbanna to so, Yesu nun a xarandii fu nun firinne yi dɔxɔ e dɛgedeni.
40026021	E yi e dɛgema waxatin naxan yi, Yesu naxa, “N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, ɛ tan nde keden n yanfama nɛn, a yi n so yiini.”
40026022	Xarandiine yi sunu han, e yi a maxɔdin fɔlɔ keden keden yɛɛn ma, e naxa, “Marigina, n tan nan na ra ba?”
40026023	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Nxu nun naxan nxu yiin nagodoxi lenge kedenna kui, na nan n soma yiini.
40026024	N tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn faxama nɛn, alo Kitabuna a falaxi kii naxan yi, koni gbalon na kanna yɛɛ ra naxan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn soma yiini! A yi fisa nun hali na muxun mi yi bari nun mumɛ!”
40026025	Yudasi naxan a soma yiini, na yi falan tongo a naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, n tan nan na ra ba?” Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “I bata a fala.”
40026026	E yi e dɛgema waxatin naxan yi, Yesu yi burun tongo, a barikan bira Ala xa, a yi a yigira, a yi a so a xarandiine yii. A yi a fala, a naxa, “Ɛ a tongo, ɛ yi a don, n fati bɛndɛn nan ito ra.”
40026027	Na xanbi ra, a yi igelengenna tongo, a barikan bira Ala xa, a yi a so e yii, a yi a fala, a naxa, “Ɛ birin xa a min
40026028	amasɔtɔ n wunla ni ito ra n layirin xidima en tagi naxan xɔn, a minima muxu wuyaxi xa nɛn e yulubin mafeluun na.
40026029	N xa a fala ɛ xa, en wudi bogi igen naxan minma ito ra, n mi fa a minma han en birin mɔn yi sa a min n Fafe Alaa Mangayani.”
40026030	Na xanbi ra, e yi bɛtin ba, e siga Oliwi Geyaan fari.
40026031	Nayi, Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ birin ɛ mɛma n na nɛn to kɔɛɛn na, amasɔtɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitabuni, fa fala, ‘N xuruse rabaan faxama nɛn, yɛxɛɛne birin yi xuya ayi.’
40026032	Koni n na keli sayani, n sigama nɛn ɛ yɛɛ ra Galile yamanani.”
40026033	Piyɛri yi Yesu yabi, a naxa, “Hali bonne birin e mɛ i ra, n tan mi n mɛ i ra mumɛ!”
40026034	Yesu yi a fala Piyɛri xa, a naxa, “N xa ɲɔndin fala i xa, benun dontonna xa wuga to kɔɛɛn na, i a falama nɛn dɔxɔɲa ma saxan fa fala i mi n kolon.”
40026035	Piyɛri yi a yabi, a naxa, “Hali en birin faxa, n mi a falɛ mumɛ, fa fala n mi i kolon.” Xarandiin bonne fan birin yi na fala.
40026036	Na xanbi ra, Yesu nun a xarandiine yi siga yirena nde yi naxan xili Getesemani. A yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ dɔxɔ be, n tan sigan mɛnni, n xa sa Ala maxandi.”
40026037	A siga Piyɛri nun Sebede a dii xɛmɛ firinne ra. A bɔɲɛn yi rafɔrɔxi, a yi sunuxi.
40026038	Nanara, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “N bɔɲɛn nafɔrɔxi han n faxa, ɛ lu be, ɛ lu ɛ yɛɛ ra yi n xɔn ma.”
40026039	A yi siga ndedi, a yi bira, a yɛtagin yi lan bɔxɔn ma, a yi Ala maxandi, a naxa, “N Fafe, xa a lanɲɛ tɔrɔya igelengenni ito masiga n na, koni n tan sagoon nama liga fɔ i tan sagona.”
40026040	Na xanbi ra, a mɔn yi xɛtɛ, a yi a xarandiine li xixɔnli. A yi a fala Piyɛri xa, a naxa, “Ɛ mi nɔxi luyɛ ɛ yɛɛ ra yi n xɔn ma hali waxatidi!
40026041	Ɛ lu ɛ yɛɛ ra yi, ɛ Ala maxandi, alogo ɛ nama bira tantanni. Ɛ niin waxɔn feen fan koni ɛ fati bɛndɛn sɛnbɛ mi na.”
40026042	Yesu mɔn yi siga a firindeni, a sa Ala maxandi, a naxa, “N Fafe, xa tɔrɔya igelengenni ito mi nɔɛ masigɛ n na, fɔ a xa n li, i sagoon xa liga.”
40026043	A mɔn yi xɛtɛ, a xarandiine li xiyɛ, bayo xixɔnla bata yi e suxu.
40026044	A mɔn yi keli e fɛma, a siga a saxandeni, a sa Ala maxandi, a mɔn yi na fala kedenna ti.
40026045	Na xanbi ra, a xɛtɛ xarandiine fɛma, a naxa, “Ɛ mɔn xima ba? Ɛ mɔn ɛ matabuma ba? A mato! Waxatin bata a li! N tan, Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn bata so hakɛ kanne sɛnbɛn bun ma iki.
40026046	Ɛ keli, en siga, muxun naxan n yanfama, a n so yiini, na bata fa!”
40026047	A yi falan tima waxatin naxan yi, Yudasi a xarandii fu nun firinna nde yi fa, gali gbeen biraxi a fɔxɔ ra saraxarali kuntigine nun sariya karamɔxɔne nun yamaan fonne naxanye xɛ. Silanfanne nun gbengbetenne yi e yii.
40026048	Naxan yi a yanfama, a a so yiini, na bata yi taxamasenni ito fala yamaan xa nun, a naxa, “N na muxun naxan sunbu, a tan nan na ra. Ɛ a suxu ken!”
40026049	Nanara, Yudasi yi a tinxin Yesu ra keden na, a naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, i nuwali.” A yi a sunbu.
40026050	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “N xɔyina, i faxi naxan na, na liga.” Nayi, e yi Yesu suxu ken!
40026051	Naxanye yi Yesu fɔxɔ ra, na nde keden yi a silanfanna botin, a Saraxarali Kuntigi Singena konyin tunla sɛgɛ a ma.
40026052	Yesu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “I ya silanfanna raxɛtɛ a funfuni, amasɔtɔ naxan birin silanfanna tongoma, ne faxama silanfanna nan na.
40026053	I mi a kolon ba, fa fala n nɔɛ n Fafe Ala xilɛ nɛn, a yi maleka gali gbee fu nun firin nafa n ma mafurɛn?
40026054	Koni xa na liga, Kitabun fala xuiin kamalima di nayi? Bayo a sɛbɛxi a fɔ a xa liga ikiini.”
40026055	Yesu yi falan ti ganla xa, a naxa, “Ɛ bata fa n suxudeni silanfanne nun gbengbetenne ɛ yii alo fumaden nan yi n na nun. N yi xaranna tima Ala Batu Banxini lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ, koni ɛ mi n suxu.
40026056	Koni na birin ligaxi nɛn alogo nabine falan naxanye sɛbɛxi, ne xa kamali.” Nayi, a xarandiine birin yi a rabeɲin, e yi e gi.
40026057	Naxanye Yesu suxu, ne yi a xali Kayafa konni Saraxarali Kuntigi Singena, sariya karamɔxɔne nun yamaan fonne yi malanxi dɛnaxan yi.
40026058	Piyɛri yi bira Yesu fɔxɔ ra, koni e nun ganla tagi kuya, han Saraxarali Kuntigi Singena tande ma. A yi so tanden ma e nun kantan muxune yi dɔxɔ alogo a xa a kolon a raɲanma kii naxan yi.
40026059	Saraxarali kuntigine nun kitisa yamaan birin yi katama wule seren ba feen na Yesu xili ma, alogo e xa a faxa.
40026060	Koni hali muxu wuyaxi to fa wule seren ba a xili ma, e mi sese sɔtɔ. Dɔnxɛn na muxu firin yi ti e yɛtagi,
40026061	e naxa, “Xɛmɛni ito naxa, a nɔɛ Ala Batu Banxin kalɛ nɛn, a mɔn yi a ti soge saxan bun ma.”
40026062	Saraxarali Kuntigi Singen yi keli, a falan ti Yesu xa, a naxa, “Muxuni itoe naxan falama i xun ma, na yabi mi i xɔn ba?”
40026063	Koni Yesu mi fala yo ti. Saraxarali Kuntigi Singen yi falan ti a xa mɔn, a naxa, “N na i rakɔlɔma habadan Ala xinli, xa Alaa Muxu Sugandixin nan i tan na, Alaa Dii Xɛmɛna, na fala nxu xa.”
40026064	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “I bata a fala. Koni n xa a fala ɛ birin xa, fɔlɔ iki ma, ɛ n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn toma dɔxi Ala Sɛnbɛmaan yiifanna ma, ɛ yi n famatɔɔn to kore kundani.”
40026065	Saraxarali Kuntigi Singen na mɛ waxatin naxan yi, a yi a domani bɔ, a naxa, “A bata Ala rayelefu! En mako mi fa sere yo ma sɔnɔn! Ɛ bata a fala ɲaxine mɛ!
40026066	Ɛ mirixi a ma di?” E yi a yabi, e naxa, “A lan nɛn a xa faxa.”
40026067	Nayi, e yi e dɛgen puru Yesu yɛtagi, e yi a bɔnbɔ.
40026068	E lu a maxɔdinɲɛ, e naxa, “I tan Alaa Muxu Sugandixina, a fala nxu xa fata Ala ra, nde i bɔnbɔxi?”
40026069	Piyɛri yi dɔxi tanden ma waxatin naxan yi, Saraxarali Kuntigi Singena walikɛ ɲaxanla nde yi fa a fɛma, a naxa, “I tan fan yi Yesu Galile kaan fɔxɔ ra nun.”
40026070	Koni a yi a tandi e birin yɛtagi, a naxa, “N mi a kolon i waxi naxan fala fe yi.”
40026071	Na xanbi ra, a yi siga tanden so dɛɛn na. Walikɛ ɲaxalan gbɛtɛ yi a to. Muxun naxanye yi dɔxi na, a yi a fala ne xa, a naxa, “Xɛmɛni ito yi Yesu Nasarɛti kaan fɔxɔ ra nun.”
40026072	Piyɛri yi a tandi, a yi a kɔlɔ, a naxa, “N mi na xɛmɛn kolon!”
40026073	Waxatidi danguxina, naxanye yi tixi na, ne yi fa Piyɛri fɛma, e naxa, “A tan nan nde i tan fan na! Amasɔtɔ i fala ti kiin bata a yita nxu ra!”
40026074	Nayi, Piyɛri yi a kɔlɔ dangane ra, a yi a fala, a naxa, “N mi xɛmɛni ito kolon mumɛ!” Na waxatin yɛtɛni dontonna yi wuga mafurɛn.
40026075	Nayi, Yesu a falan yi rabira Piyɛri ma, a naxa, “Benun dontonna xa wuga i a falama nɛn dɔxɔɲa ma saxan fa fala i mi n kolon.” Piyɛri yi mini, a nimisa wugan ti!
40027001	Xɔtɔn xɔtɔn, saraxarali kuntigine nun yamaan fonne yi a ragidi, a e xa Yesu faxa.
40027002	E yi a xidi, e siga a ra yamana kanna Pilati fɛma.
40027003	Yudasi naxan Yesu yanfa, a a so yiini, na to a to, e bata Yesu yalagi sayaan na, a yi nimisa, a yi gbeti gbanan tonge saxanna raxɛtɛ saraxarali kuntigine nun yamaan fonne ma.
40027004	A yi a fala, a naxa, “N bata yulubin liga, n muxun yanfa naxan mi hakɛ yo ligaxi alogo e xa a faxa!” E yi a yabi, e naxa, “Nxu tan ma fe mi na yi, i ya feen nan na ra!”
40027005	Yudasi yi gbetin woli Ala Batu Banxini, a siga, a sa a yɛtɛ singan.
40027006	Saraxarali kuntigine yi gbetin matongo, e naxa, “A mi daxa gbetini ito xa sa en ma gbeti ramarade sariɲanxini, bayo faxa tiin saren nan a ra.”
40027007	E yi lan a ma a e xa na gbetin tongo, e fɛɲɛ rafalana nde a bɔxɔn sara na gbetin na, e yi na findi xɔɲɛ maluxunden na.
40027008	Nanara, han to, e na bɔxɔn xili bama a “Wuli Bɔxɔna.”
40027009	Nayi, Nabi Yeremi naxan fala, na yi kamali, a naxa, “E yi gbeti gbanan tonge saxanne tongo, Isirayila kaane a sara gbetin naxan na.
40027010	E fɛɲɛ rafalana bɔxɔn sara a ra alo Marigina n yamari kii naxan yi.”
40027011	Yesu yi ti yamana kanna yɛtagi, yamana kanna yi a maxɔdin, a naxa, “Yahudiyane mangan nan i tan na ba?” Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “I bata a fala.”
40027012	Koni saraxarali kuntigine nun yamaan fonne a kansun waxatin naxan yi, a mi fefe fala.
40027013	Nayi, Pilati yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “E i kansunma feen naxanye birin na, i mi na mɛɛn ba?”
40027014	Koni Yesu mi tin a yabɛ mumɛ, yamana kanna yi kabɛ kati!
40027015	Nba, sanli ito na yi a li nun, yamana kanna yi darixi kasorasaan muxu keden beɲinɲɛ nɛn, yamaan na wa naxan xɔn ma.
40027016	Na waxatini, kasorasa ɲaxina nde yi na naxan xili Baraba.
40027017	Nanara, Pilati yamana kanna yi yamaan malanxin maxɔdin, a naxa, “Ɛ waxi a xɔn ma n xa nde beɲin, Baraba hanma Yesu naxan xili Alaa Muxu Sugandixina?”
40027018	Bayo a yi a kolon yati, fa fala e Yesu soxi a yii xɔxɔlɔnyaan nan ma.
40027019	Pilati yi dɔxi kiti sadeni waxatin naxan yi, a ɲaxanla yi xɛraan nasiga a ma, a naxa, “I nama fefe liga tinxin muxuni ito ra amasɔtɔ n tɔrɔxi nɛn xiyeni a fe ra to ki faɲi!”
40027020	Saraxarali kuntigine nun yamaan fonne yi yamaan nadin, a Pilati xa Baraba beɲin, a yi Yesu faxa.
40027021	Yamana kanna yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, “Ɛ waxi a xɔn ma muxu firinni itoe, n xa nde beɲin?” E yi a yabi, e naxa, “Baraba!”
40027022	Pilati yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, “Yesu naxan xili Alaa Muxu Sugandixina, ɛ waxi a xɔn ma, n xa nanfe liga a ra?” E birin yi a yabi, e naxa, “A xa gbangban wudin ma.”
40027023	Koni Pilati yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, “A fe ɲaxin mundun ligaxi?” Koni e sɔnxɔn yi siga gboɛ ayi, e naxa, “A gbangban wudin ma!”
40027024	Pilati a to waxatin naxan yi, a mi yi nɔɛ sese ra, sɔnxɔn yi gboma ayi, a yi igen tongo, a yi a yiin naxa yamaan yɛɛ xɔri, a naxa, “N gbee yo mi xɛmɛni ito faxa feni! Ɛ feen ni ito ra!”
40027025	Yamaan yi a yabi, e naxa, “A wunla goronna xa lu nxu tan nun nxɔ diine xun ma!”
40027026	Awa, na xanbi ra, Pilati yi Baraba beɲin, a yi a yamari a e xa Yesu bulan, a yi a so e yii alogo e xa a gbangban wudin ma.
40027027	Yamana kanna sofane yi Yesu xali yamana kan banxini, sofane ganla birin yi e malan a rabilinni.
40027028	E yi a dugine ba a ma, e yi doma gbeela ragodo a ma.
40027029	E yi wudi yii ɲali kanne dɛnbɛ kɔmɔtin na mangaya taxamasenna ra, e yi a so a xunna, e dunganna so a yii. E yi e xinbi sin a bun ma, e lu a magelɛ, e naxa, “I kɛnɛ Yahudiyane mangana!”
40027030	E yi dɛgen puru a ma, e yi a dunganna tongo, e yi a bɔnbɔ a xunna ma.
40027031	E to yelin a magelɛ, e domaan ba a ma, e mɔn yi a maxidi a gbee dugine yi. Na xanbi ra, e yi siga a ra a gbangbandeni wudin ma.
40027032	E yi minima taani waxatin naxan yi, e yi lan xɛmɛna nde ra, naxan yi xili Simɔn Sirɛni kaana. E yi na karahan, a xa Yesu gbangban wudin tongo.
40027033	E yi fa na yireni dɛnaxan xili Gologota, naxan bunna nɛɛn “xun xɔri yirena.”
40027034	E yi manpaan so a yii naxan yi basanxi se gbɛtɛ ra naxan xɔlɔ, alogo a xa a min, koni a to a lɛnna ti a ma, a mi tin a minɲɛ.
40027035	E yi a gbangban wudin ma. Na xanbi ra, e yi masɛnsɛnna ti lan a dugine yitaxun feen ma.
40027036	E yi dɔxɔ a kantandeni.
40027037	E yi a kansun kɛdin sɛbɛ, e yi a gbangban a xun ma, e naxa, “Yahudiyane Mangan nan Yesu ito ra.”
40027038	E yi muɲade firin gbangban wudin ma Yesu fɛma, kedenna a yiifanna ma, bonna a kɔmɛnna ma.
40027039	Yamaan yi dangu a makonbɛ, e lu e xunni maxɛ,
40027040	e naxa, “I tan naxan Ala Batu Banxin kalama, i mɔn yi a ti soge saxan, i yɛtɛ rakisi! Xa Alaa Dii Xɛmɛ nan i tan na, godo, i keli wudin kɔɛ ra.”
40027041	Saraxarali kuntigine nun sariya karamɔxɔne nun yamaan fonne fan yi a magele na kii nin,
40027042	e naxa, “A bonne rakisi nɛn, koni a mi nɔɛ a yɛtɛ rakisɛ! Isirayila mangan xa mi a tan na ba? A xa keli wudin kɔɛ ra, a godo be alogo nxu xa dɛnkɛlɛya a ma!
40027043	A dɛnkɛlɛyaxi Ala ma, a naxa, a Alaa Dii Xɛmɛn nan a tan na. Nba, xa a rafan Ala ma, a xa a xunba!”
40027044	Hali muɲaden naxanye yi gbangbanxi wudin ma a dɛxɔn, ne fan yi a makonbi na kii nin.
40027045	Sogen bata yi a ratinxin nun, dimin yi so yamanan birin yi han se din waxatin yi maso.
40027046	Na waxatini, Yesu yi gbelegbele a kon xuini, a naxa, “Eli, Eli, lama sabakitani?” na bunna nɛɛn, “N ma Ala, n ma Ala, i n nabeɲinxi nanfera?”
40027047	Muxuna ndee yi tixi na yi, ne yi a xuiin mɛ, e naxa, “A Nabi Eli nan xilima.”
40027048	E tan nde keden yi a gi mafurɛn, a sa dugi dungin tongo, a yi a sin minse muluxunxini, a yi a filin tamin ɲɔɛ ra, a yi a ti a xa, a xa a min.
40027049	Koni bonne naxa, “A mamɛ, en na a mato xa Nabi Eli fa a rakisɛ.”
40027050	Yesu mɔn yi a xui ramini fangan na, a niin yi ba.
40027051	Dugin naxan yi singanxi Ala Batu Banxin tagi, na yi bɔ firinna ra, fɔlɔ a xunna ra han a sanbun na. Bɔxɔn yi xuruxurun, fanyene yi bɔ.
40027052	Gaburune yi rabi, faxa muxu sariɲanxina ndee yi keli.
40027053	E keli gaburune kui. Yesu keli xanbini sayani, e yi siga Taa Sariɲanxini, e mini kɛnɛnni muxu wuyaxi xa.
40027054	Sofa kɛmɛ kuntigin nun a sofaan naxanye yi Yesu kantanma, ne to bɔxɔn to xuruxurunɲɛ, e nun feen naxanye birin bata liga, e yi gaxu kati! E yi a fala, e naxa, “Alaa Dii Xɛmɛn nan yi a ra yati!”
40027055	Ɲaxanla naxanye yi biraxi Yesu fɔxɔ ra keli Galile yamanani, naxanye yi a malima nun, ne wuyaxi yi na, e tixi wulani, e a matoma.
40027056	Mariyama Magadala kaan yi ne yɛ nun, e nun Mariyama, Yaki nun Yusufu nga, e nun Sebede a dii xɛmɛne nga.
40027057	Ɲinbanna to a li, nafulu kanna nde yi fa naxan yi xili Yusufu Arimate kaana, Yesu a xarandiina nde nan yi a fan na.
40027058	A yi siga Pilati fɛma, a yi a maxɔdin Yesu binbina fe ma. Pilati yi e yamari, a e xa Yesu binbin so Yusufu yii.
40027059	Nanara, Yusufu yi a binbin tongo, a yi a kasangen dugi fixɛni,
40027060	a sa a maluxun gaburun na fanye kui gexini alo faran yili, a yi baxi naxan gedeni a yɛtɛ xa nun. Na xanbi ra, a yi gɛmɛ belebelen makutukutu gaburun dɛ ra, a siga.
40027061	Mariyama Magadala kaan nun Mariyama bonna yi dɔxi na nun, e yɛɛn lanxi gaburun ma.
40027062	Yuma lɔxɔn xɔtɔn bode, saraxarali kuntigine nun Farisi muxune yi siga Pilati fɛma,
40027063	e naxa, “Nxu fafe, wule falani ito yi a nii ra waxatin naxan yi, nxu xaxili dɔxi na xɔn ma, a fala nɛn, a naxa, ‘Soge saxan na dangu waxatin naxan yi, n mɔn kelima nɛn sayani.’
40027064	Na ma, i xa yamarin fi, gaburun xa kantan ken, han a soge saxande lɔxɔni alogo a xarandiine nama fa a binbin muɲa, e siga a ra. E yi a fala yamaan xa fa fala ‘A bata keli sayani.’ Xa ito liga, wule dɔnxɛni ito ɲaxuma ayi nɛn dangu a fɔlɔn na.”
40027065	Pilati yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ kantan muxune tongo, e xa sa gaburun kantan alo e nɔɛ a ra kii naxan yi.”
40027066	Nanara, e yi siga, e sa gaburun dɛɛn nagali ki faɲi, e taxamasenna sa a ma, e yi a kantan sofane lu na yi.
40028001	Matabu Lɔxɔn danguxina, xati lɔxɔn subaxani, Mariyama Magadala kaan nun Mariyama bonna yi siga gaburu matodeni.
40028002	Bɔxɔn yi xuruxurun gbeen ti. Marigina malekan yi godo keli kore, a yi gɛmɛ gbeen makutukutu, a dɔxɔ a fari.
40028003	Na malekan yɛtagin yi luxi alo kuyen na a ɲinna masɔxɔn, a dugine yi fixa alo balabalan kɛsɛna.
40028004	Kantan muxune yi gaxu han e xuruxurun, e yi fuga a ra, e lu alo faxa muxune.
40028005	Koni malekan yi falan ti ɲaxanle xa, a naxa, “Ɛ nama gaxu, n na a kolon fa fala ɛ Yesu nan fenma naxan gbangban wudin ma.
40028006	A mi be yi, a bata keli alo a a fala kii naxan yi. Ɛ fa a saden mato.
40028007	Ɛ siga mafurɛn, ɛ sa a fala a xarandiine xa, ɛ naxa, ‘A bata keli sayani, ɛ sa a lima Galile yamanani, ɛ a toma nɛn na yi!’ N bata a fala ɛ xa iki.”
40028008	Nanara, e keli gaburun yireni mafurɛn gaxun nun sɛwani, e siga e giyɛ, e sa a fala a xarandiine xa.
40028009	Yesu yi e ralan mafurɛn, a naxa, “Ɛ nuwali.” E yi fa a sanna suxu, e yi a batu.
40028010	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ nama gaxu, ɛ siga, ɛ sa a fala ngaxakedenne xa, a e xa siga Galile yi, e sa n toma mɛnna nin.”
40028011	Ɲaxanle mɔn yi kira yi waxatin naxan yi, sofaan naxanye yi gaburun kantanma, na ndee yi xɛtɛ taani. Feen naxan birin ligaxi, e na fala saraxarali kuntigine xa.
40028012	Saraxarali kuntigine nun yamaan fonne yi e bode to, e lan fe keden ma, e gbeti gbeen so sofane yii.
40028013	E yi a fala e xa, e naxa, “Ɛ xa ito fala, ɛ naxa, ‘A xarandiine bata fa kɔɛɛn na, e yi a binbin muɲa, nxu yi xiin waxatin naxan yi.’
40028014	Xa yamana kanna na mɛ, nxu a mafanɲɛ, nxu yi ɛ ba kɔntɔfinli.”
40028015	Kantan muxune yi gbetin nasuxu. E naxan fala e xa, e yi na liga. Na falan yi xuya ayi na kiini Yahudiyane tagi han to.
40028016	Xarandii fu nun kedenna yi siga Galile yamanani geyaan fari Yesu naxan ma fe fala e xa.
40028017	E to a to, e yi a batu. Koni sikɛn yi ndee yi.
40028018	Yesu yi a maso e ra, a naxa, “Sɛnbɛn birin bata fi n ma kore xɔnna nun bɔxɔ xɔnna fari.
40028019	Nayi, ɛ siga, ɛ sa siyane birin findi n ma xarandiine ra, ɛ yi e rafu igeni n Fafe Ala nun a Dii Xɛmɛn nun a Nii Sariɲanxin xinli,
40028020	n na ɛ yamarixi naxanye birin ma, ɛ yi e xaran ne suxun ma. A mato, n luma nɛn ɛ xɔn ma waxatin birin han dunuɲa raɲanni.”
41001001	Ningila Yesu a fe fɔlɔn ni ito ra, Alaa Muxu Sugandixina, Alaa Dii Xɛmɛna.
41001002	A sɛbɛxi Nabi Esayi Kitabun kui, a naxa, “N nan n ma xɛraan nasigama nɛn i yɛɛ ra, a kiraan nafala i xa.
41001003	Muxuna nde xuiin minima tonbonni, a naxa, ‘Ɛ kirani tɔn Marigin yɛɛ ra, ɛ kirane matinxin a xa!’ ”
41001004	Nanara, Yoni yi mini kɛnɛnni tonbonni, a lu yamaan nafuyɛ igeni e tubi feen na Ala ma, a e kawandi, a e xa e xun xanbi so e yulubine yi, e yi rafu igeni alogo e yulubine xa xafari.
41001005	Yudaya kaane nun Yerusalɛn kaane birin yi siga a fɛma. E yi e ti e yulubine ra. A yi e rafu igeni Yurudɛn baani e tubi feen na.
41001006	Ɲɔgɔmɛ xabe dugin nan yi ragodoxi Yoni ma, a tagi xidixi kidin na. A yi baloma tuguminne nun kumin nan na.
41001007	A yi kawandin ba yamaan xa, a naxa, “Naxan fama n tan xanbi ra, na sɛnbɛn gbo dangu n tan na, n mi sa lan nɛn n xa findi a sankidin luti fulunna ra.
41001008	N tan ɛ rafuma igen nin iki, koni a tan ɛ rafuma Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin nin.”
41001009	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi fa sa keli Nasarɛti taani Galile yamanani. Yoni yi a rafu Yurudɛn baani.
41001010	Yesu yi a rakelima igeni waxatin naxan yi, a yi kore xɔnna to rabiyɛ, Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin yi godo a ma ganba sawurani.
41001011	A yi fala xuiin mɛ keli kore, a naxa, “N nafan Dii Xɛmɛn ni i tan na. I bata n kɛnɛn ki faɲi.”
41001012	Na waxati yɛtɛni, Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin yi a rasiga tonbonni.
41001013	A yi lu na yi soge tonge naanin. Setana yi kata a xa a ratantan. Yesu nun burunna subene nan yi a ra. Malekane fan yi fa a mali.
41001014	E yelin xanbini Yoni sɛ kasoon na, Yesu yi siga Galile yamanani. A sa Alaa falan Xibaru Faɲin kawandin ba yamaan xa,
41001015	a naxa, “Waxatin bata a li, Alaa Mangayaan bata maso. Ɛ ɛ xun xanbi so ɛ hakɛne yi, ɛ dɛnkɛlɛya n ma falan Xibaru Faɲin ma.”
41001016	Awa, Yesu yi sigan tima Galile Daraan dɛxɔn ma waxatin naxan yi, a yɛxɛ suxun muxu firin to, Simɔn nun a ngaxakedenna Andire. E yi yɛxɛ suxu nin yalaan na darani.
41001017	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ bira n fɔxɔ ra. N xa ɛ findi muxu fenne ra Ala xa alo ɛ yɛxɛn suxuma kii naxan yi.”
41001018	E yi e yalane bira mafurɛn! E bira a fɔxɔ ra.
41001019	Yesu mɔn yi siga yɛɛn na ndedi, a yi Yaki nun a ngaxakedenna Yoni to, Sebede a dii xɛmɛne. E yi e yalane yitɔnma kunkin kui.
41001020	Yesu yi e xili keden na. E yi e fafe Sebede nun walikɛne lu kunkin kui, e bira Yesu fɔxɔ ra.
41001021	E yi sa Kapɛrunan taan li. Yesu yi so salide banxini Matabu Lɔxɔni, a yi lu xaranna tiyɛ.
41001022	Yamaan yi kabɛ Yesu xaran ti kɛɲaan ma, amasɔtɔ a yi xaranna tima Ala sɛnbɛn nin. A mi yi luxi alo sariya karamɔxɔne.
41001023	Na waxatin yɛtɛni, xɛmɛna nde yi e salideni yinna ɲaxin yi naxan fɔxɔ ra. Yinnan yi xɛmɛn nasɔnxɔ, a yi falan ti a xɔn,
41001024	a naxa, “Yesu Nasarɛti kaana, i waxi nanse xɔn ma nxu xa? I faxi nxu halagiden nin ba? N ni i kolon, Alaa muxu sariɲanxin nan i tan na.”
41001025	Yesu yi yinnan yamari a sɔbɛɛn na, a naxa, “I dundu, xɛtɛ xɛmɛni ito fɔxɔ ra.”
41001026	Yinna ɲaxin yi xɛmɛn naxuruxurun kati! A gbelegbele, a xɛtɛ a fɔxɔ ra.
41001027	Muxune yi kabɛ, e yi e bode maxɔdin fɔlɔ, e naxa, “Nanse ito ra, xaran nɛnɛn ni ito ra ba, Ala sɛnbɛn naxan yi? A yinna ɲaxine yamarima, e yi a falan suxu.”
41001028	Muxune yi Yesu a feen xibarun mɛ Galile yamanan yiren birin yi mafurɛn!
41001029	E to mini salide banxini, Yesu nun Yaki nun Yoni yi siga Simɔn nun Andire konni keden na.
41001030	Simɔn bitan gilɛn furaxin yi saxi banxini, a fatin wolonxi a ma. E yi a fe fala Yesu xa sa!
41001031	Yesu yi siga na ɲaxanla fɛma, a yi a suxu a yiin ma, a yi a mali, a yi a rakeli. Fati mawolonna yi a beɲin, a wali fɔlɔ e xa.
41001032	Ɲinbanna ra, sogen godo xanbini, yamaan yi fa furetɔne birin na Yesu fɛma e nun ɲinan ɲaxine yi muxun naxanye fɔxɔ ra.
41001033	Taan birin yi e malan dɛɛn na.
41001034	Yesu yi furetɔ wuyaxi rakɛndɛya furen sifan birin ma, a ɲinan wuyaxi kedi muxune fɔxɔ ra. Koni a mi yi tinma ɲinanne yi falan ti hali ndedi amasɔtɔ e yi a kolon.
41001035	Na xɔtɔn bode subaxani, Yesu yi keli, a mini, a siga yire madunduxina nde yi Ala maxandideni.
41001036	Koni Simɔn nun a lanfane yi siga Yesu fendeni.
41001037	Awa, e a toxina, e yi a fala a xa, e naxa, “Muxune birin i fenma iki.”
41001038	Koni Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “En siga taa gbɛtɛye yi be dɛxɔn ma, alogo n mɔn xa sa kawandin ba mɛnne fan yi, amasɔtɔ n faxi na nan ma.”
41001039	Nayi, a yi siga Galile yamanan yiren birin yi, a sa kawandin ba salide banxine kui, a yi ɲinanne kedi.
41001040	Dogonfontɔɔn yi fa Yesu fɛma, a yi a xinbi sin a bun ma. A yi a mafan, a naxa, “Xa i tinɲɛ, i nɔɛ n nakɛndɛyɛ nɛn.”
41001041	Yesu yi kininkinin a ma han, a yi a yiin sa a ma. A yi a yabi, a naxa, “N bata tin, i xa kɛndɛya!”
41001042	Dogonfonna yi a beɲin sa! Xɛmɛn yi kɛndɛya.
41001043	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi a maxadi ken ken, a yi a rasiga keden na,
41001044	a naxa, “I tuli mati, i nama a fala muxu yo xa. Koni siga saraxaraliin fɛma mafurɛn, a xa i mato. Na xanbi ra, i saraxan ba i rasariɲan feen na alo Nabi Musa a yamari kii naxan yi. Na findima nɛn sereyaan na saraxaraline xa.”
41001045	Koni xɛmɛn yi siga yiren birin yi, a sa feni ito fala muxune birin xa. A yi a fala kati, han Yesu mi yi fa nɔɛ soɛ taani kɛnɛnni, a lu a danna burunna ra. Yamaan yi fa a fɛma sa keli yiren birin yi.
41002001	Waxatidi danguxina, Yesu yi xɛtɛ Kapɛrunan taani. Yamaan yi a mɛ a Yesu bata fa a konni.
41002002	Muxu wuyaxi yi e malan na yi. E na rafe han hali tandeni, tide mi yi fa na. Yesu yi Alaa falan kawandi ba e xa.
41002003	Muxu naanin yi fa xɛmɛ lɛbutɛnna nde ra e yii.
41002004	E mi yi nɔɛ Yesu masɔtɛ amasɔtɔ yama gbeen yi na yi. Nanara, e yalenna raba banxin fari Yesu xun ma. E xɛmɛn nagodo Yesu ma na yalenna ra, a saxi a sa seni.
41002005	Yesu to e dɛnkɛlɛyaan to, a yi a fala lɛbutɛnna xa, a naxa, “N ma dii, i ya yulubine bata mafelu.”
41002006	Sariya karamɔxɔna ndee yi dɔxi na yi, ne yi e miri e yɛtɛ ma, e naxa,
41002007	“A falan tima na ki nanfera? A bata Ala rayelefu. Muxu yo mi nɔɛ yulubine mafeluyɛ fɔ Ala keden peena!”
41002008	Yesu yi e miriyaan kolon mafurɛn! Nanara, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ mirima fe sifani itoe ma nanfera?
41002009	Nanse fala raxɔlɔ lɛbutɛnna xa, ‘I ya yulubine bata mafelu’ hanma ‘Keli, i ya sa seen tongo, i sigan ti?’
41002010	N na yitama ɛ ra nɛn nayi fa fala sɛnbɛna n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn yii dunuɲa yi, n muxun mafelu a yulubine ra.” A yi a fala lɛbutɛnna xa, a naxa,
41002011	“N na a falama i xa, keli i i ya sa seen tongo, i siga i konni.”
41002012	Xɛmɛn yi keli mafurɛn, a yi a sa seen tongo, a sigan ti e birin yɛɛ xɔri. E birin yi kabɛ kati! E yi Ala tantun, e naxa, “Nxu munma ito ɲɔxɔnna to singen mumɛ!”
41002013	Yesu mɔn yi siga daraan dɛ, yama gbeen yi fa a fɛma, a e xaran fɔlɔ.
41002014	A yi sigama waxatin naxan yi, a mudu maxinla nde to, a xili Lewi, Alifaa dii xɛmɛna, a yi dɔxi mudu maxilideni. Yesu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Bira n fɔxɔ ra.” Lewi yi keli, a bira a fɔxɔ ra.
41002015	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi siga a dɛgedeni Lewi a banxini. Mudu maxinla nun hakɛ kan wuyaxi yi dɔxɔ e dɛgedeni Yesu nun a xarandiine fɛma, bayo na muxu sifan wuyaxi yi biraxi a fɔxɔ ra.
41002016	Farisi muxu sariya karamɔxɔna ndee yi Yesu to a dɛgɛ hakɛ kanne nun mudu maxinle fɛma. Nanara, e yi a xarandiine maxɔdin, e naxa, “Nanfera Yesu a dɛgema mudu maxinle nun hakɛ kanne fɛma?”
41002017	Yesu yi e xuiin mɛ, a yi e yabi, a naxa, “Muxun naxan kɛndɛ na mako mi seribaan ma fɔ furetɔne. N mi faxi tinxin muxune xan xilideyi fɔ hakɛ kanne.”
41002018	Yoni a xarandiine nun Farisi muxune yi sunna suxuma. Muxuna ndee yi fa Yesu fɛma, e yi a maxɔdin, e naxa, “Nanfera Yoni a xarandiine nun Farisi muxune xarandiine sunna suxuma koni i gbeene mi sunna suxuma?”
41002019	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɲaxalandi kanna nɛma ɲaxalandi tiine fɛma, e sunna suxɛ ba? Na mi ligɛ, xa a e fɛma!
41002020	Koni waxatina nde fama, ɲaxalandi kanna bama nɛn e yɛ. Na waxatini, e sunna suxuma nɛn.
41002021	Muxu yo mi dugi nɛnɛ dungin tongɛ, a yi dugi fonna bɛtɛrɛn a ra. Xa a na liga, dungi nɛnɛn bɔma nɛn a fonna ra, a yinla yi ragbo ayi.
41002022	Muxun mi manpa nɛnɛn sɛ se sase fonna kui. Xa a na liga, manpa nɛnɛn se saseen kalama nɛn, se saseen nun manpaan yi kala. Koni manpa nɛnɛn sama se sase nɛnɛn nan kui.”
41002023	Yesu nun a xarandiine yi danguma xɛɛna nde ma Matabu Lɔxɔna nde yi, a xarandiine yi sansi tɔnsɔnne ratorondon fɔlɔ.
41002024	Nanara, Farisi muxune yi a fala Yesu xa, e naxa, “I ya xarandiine feen naxan ligama, na mi daxa Matabu Lɔxɔni.”
41002025	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ munma na xaran ba, kamɛn Dawuda nun a fɔxɔrabirane suxu waxatin naxan yi?
41002026	A so nɛn Alaa banxini Saraxarali Kuntigi Singena Abiyatari waxatini, a yi Alaa buru ralixin don muxe mi daxa a xa naxan don fɔ saraxaraline. Dawuda mɔn yi ndee so a fɔxɔrabirane fan yii.”
41002027	Yesu mɔn yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Matabu Lɔxɔn daxi muxun nan xa, muxun xa mi daxi Matabu Lɔxɔn xa.
41002028	Nanara, n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn nan Matabu Lɔxɔn kanna ra.”
41003001	Na xanbi ra, Yesu mɔn yi siga salide banxini. A yi xɛmɛ yii madɔnxina nde li mɛnni.
41003002	E yi lu Yesu matoɛ xa a xɛmɛn nakɛndɛyɛ Matabu Lɔxɔni alogo e xa a kansun na fe ra.
41003003	Yesu yi a fala xɛmɛ yii madɔnxin xa, a naxa, “Keli, i fa yamaan yɛtagi be.”
41003004	Na xanbi ra, a yi yamaan maxɔdin, a naxa, “Matabu Lɔxɔni, nanse daxa a xa liga, a ɲaxin ba, xa a faɲina? En yi muxun niin nakisi ba, xa en yi a halagi?” Koni e mi fefe fala.
41003005	Yesu xɔlɔxin yi e mato. A sunu e kininkinintareyana fe ra ki faɲi. A yi a fala xɛmɛn xa, a naxa, “I yiini bandun.” A yi a yiini bandun, a kɛndɛya.
41003006	Nanara, Farisi muxune yi mini mafurɛn! E nun Herode a muxuna ndee yi sa e bode to, e Yesu faxa feni tɔn.
41003007	Yesu nun a xarandiine yi siga Galile Daraan dɛxɔn ma, yama gbeen yi bira a fɔxɔ ra keli Galile yamanani, e nun Yudaya
41003008	nun Yerusalɛn nun Idumeya nun Yurudɛn baan kidimaan nun Tire taan nun Sidɔn taan nabilinni. Yesu yi feen naxanye ligama, yamaan yi na mɛ, e yi fa a fɛma.
41003009	A yi a fala a xarandiine xa a e xa kunkina nde fen a xa, alogo yamaan nama a yigbɛtɛn.
41003010	A bata yi muxu wuyaxi rakɛndɛya nun. Furetɔne birin yi kataxi alogo e xa e maso a ra, e yi e yiin din a ra.
41003011	Nba, yinna ɲaxine yi muxun naxanye fɔxɔ ra, ne a to waxatin naxan yi, e bira a bun ma, yinna ɲaxine yi lu e ragbelegbelɛ, e falan ti e xɔn, e naxa, “Alaa Dii Xɛmɛn nan i tan na.”
41003012	Koni a yi yinnane yamari, a e nama a fe fala.
41003013	Awa, Yesu yi te geyaan fari. A yi waxi muxun naxanye xɔn ma, a yi ne xili, e yi fa a fɛma.
41003014	A yi muxu fu nun firin sugandi, a naxanye findi xɛrane ra alogo e xa lu a fɛma,
41003015	a yi e rasiga kawandi badeni, a fangan so e yii e ɲinanne kedi.
41003016	A muxu fu nun firinna naxanye sugandi, ne nan itoe ra, Simɔn, Yesu naxan xili sa Piyɛri,
41003017	e nun Sebede a dii xɛmɛn Yaki nun a xunyɛn Yoni Yesu naxanye xili sa “Boyanerigɛ.” Na bunna nɛɛn “Kuye Sarinna diine.”
41003018	E nun Andire nun Filipi nun Barotolome nun Matiyu nun Tomasi nun Alifaa dii xɛmɛn Yaki nun Tade nun Simɔn e naxan ma a “Yahudiya siya xanuna,”
41003019	e nun Yudasi Isakariyoti naxan Yesu yanfa, a a so yiini.
41003020	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi xɛtɛ banxini. Yama gbeen yi e malan na yi han Yesu nun a xarandiine mi yi fa nɔ e dɛge fɛrɛn sɔtɛ.
41003021	A denbayaan na mɛ waxatin naxan yi, e siga a tongodeni, amasɔtɔ a denbayaan yi a falama nɛn, e naxa, “Seen bata so a yi.”
41003022	Sariya karamɔxɔn naxanye fa sa keli Yerusalɛn taani, ne yi a fala, e naxa, “Bɛlɛsɛbu nan a fɔxɔ ra!” Bonne naxa, “A yinnane kedima yinna mangan Bɛlɛsɛbu barakan nin.”
41003023	Nanara, Yesu yi e xili a fɛma, a sandana ndee sa e xa, a naxa, “Setana nɔɛ Setana kedɛ ba?
41003024	Xa yamanan bata yitaxun yɛngɛni, na yamanan mi sabatima.
41003025	Yɛngɛn tanden naxan kui, na tanden mi sabatima.
41003026	Xa Setana keli a yɛtɛ xili ma, a mangayani taxunma yɛngɛni nɛn. A mi sabatima, a ɲanma nɛn na yi.
41003027	Muxu yo mi nɔɛ soɛ sɛnbɛmana banxini a yi a yii seene tongo, xa a mi sɛnbɛmaan xidi singen. Na xanbi ra, a banxi kui seene tongɛ nɛn.
41003028	N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, muxun yulubin naxan birin ligama, hali a na Ala rayelefu, Ala e mafeluyɛ nɛn na birin na.
41003029	Koni muxun naxan na Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin nayelefu, na mi mafeluyɛ mumɛ, habadan yulubin luma a ma nɛn.”
41003030	Yesu ito falaxi nɛn amasɔtɔ muxune yi a falama nɛn, e naxa, “Yinna ɲaxin nan a fɔxɔ ra.”
41003031	Na xanbi ra, Yesu nga nun a xunyɛne yi fa. E ti tandeni, e xɛraan nasiga a xilideni banxini.
41003032	Yamaan yi dɔxi Yesu rabilinni, e yi a fala a xa, e naxa, “A mato, i nga nun i xunyɛne tandeni e waxi i to feni.”
41003033	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ndee nga nun n xunyɛne ra?”
41003034	Muxun naxanye dɔxi a rabilinni, a yi ne mato, a naxa, “N nga nun n xunyɛne mato be yi.
41003035	Amasɔtɔ muxun naxanye Ala sagoon ligama, ngaxakeden xɛmɛmaan nun ɲaxalanmaan ne nan na e nun n nga.”
41004001	Na xanbi ra, Yesu mɔn yi xaranna fɔlɔ daraan dɛ. Yama gbeen yi malan a fɛma han a yi so kunkin kui daraan xun ma. Yamaan yi lu baan xɛ dɛɛn xɔn ma.
41004002	A yi e xaran fe wuyaxi ma sandani. A yi a fala e xa a xaranni, a naxa,
41004003	“Ɛ tuli mati. Xɛɛ biina nde yi mini, a siga a sansiin wolideni.
41004004	A yi sansiin wolima waxatin naxan yi, ndee yi bira kiraan xɔn ma. Xɔline yi ne don.
41004005	Ndee yi bira fanyen fari bɛndɛ gbee mi yi dɛnaxan yi. E yi soli mafurɛn, amasɔtɔ bɛndɛn mi yi gbo na yi.
41004006	Sogen to te, e yi lisi a ra, e xara, bayo e salenne mi yi godoxi bɔxɔni ki faɲi.
41004007	Sansina ndee yi bira sɛxɛ ɲali kanne tagi, sɛxɛne yi gbo, e yi e don, e mi bogi.
41004008	Koni ndee yi bira bɔxɔ faɲini, e soli, e sabati, e bogi, e keden kedenna birin yi tonge saxan sɔtɔ hanma tonge sennin, hanma kɛmɛ.”
41004009	Yesu yi a fala, a naxa, “Xa tunla naxan xɔn, a feen mɛ, na xa a tuli mati!”
41004010	Yesu yi a danna waxatin naxan yi, muxun naxanye nun a xarandii fu nun firinne yi a rabilinni, ne yi a maxɔdin sandane fe ma.
41004011	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Alaa Mangayaan wundo feen bata so ɛ tan yii. Koni muxun naxanye a fari ma, ne feen birin mɛma sandan nin
41004012	bayo, ‘E seen matoma nɛn han, koni e mi a yigbɛma. E e tuli matima nɛn han, koni e mi fefe famuma, alogo e nama maxɛtɛ, e yulubine yi xafari.’ ”
41004013	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, “Ɛ mi sandani ito bunne kolon ba? Xa ɛ mi ito kolon, ɛ sandan bonne bunna kolonma di?”
41004014	“Awa, sansi wonla Alaa falan nan wolima.
41004015	Muxuna ndee luxi nɛn alo sansiin naxanye bira kiraan xɔn ma. E na Alaa falan mɛ tun, Setana yi fa, a yi a ba e yi.
41004016	Muxuna ndee luxi nɛn alo sansiin naxanye bira fanyen fari. E na Alaa falan mɛ, e a suxuma nɛn sɛwani mafurɛn!
41004017	Koni salen mi e bun ma, e mi buma. Tɔrɔn nun bɛsɛnxɔnyaan na fa Alaa falana fe ra, e birama nɛn tantanni mafurɛn!
41004018	Muxuna ndee luxi nɛn alo sansiin naxanye bira sɛxɛ ɲali kanne tagi. E falan mɛ,
41004019	koni dunuɲa xaminne nun nafunla fe kunfan nun nata gbɛtɛye yi a liga e falan beɲin, a tɔnɔn mi lu e ma.
41004020	Koni muxuna ndee luxi nɛn alo sansiin naxanye bira bɔxɔ faɲini. E falan mɛma nɛn, e yi a suxu, e bogi. Ndee yi tonge saxan namini, ndee tonge sennin, ndee kɛmɛ.”
41004021	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Lɛnpun dɔxɛ deben hanma saden bun ma ba? A mi dɔxɔma seen xan fari ba?
41004022	Feen naxanye birin luxunxi, ne makɛnɛnma nɛn. Feen naxanye birin wundoni, ne minima nɛn kɛnɛnni.
41004023	Xa tunla naxan ma a feen mɛ, na xa a tuli mati!”
41004024	A mɔn yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ feen naxan mɛxi, ɛ na fe liga ɛ yeren ma. Ɛ ligaseen naxan yatɛma bonne xa, Ala fan na yatɛma ɛ xa nɛn, a yi nde sa a fari.
41004025	Seen muxun naxan yii, nde mɔn soma nɛn na yii, koni se mi muxun naxan yii, hali naxan di a yii, na bama nɛn a yii.”
41004026	Yesu mɔn yi a fala, a naxa, “Alaa Mangayaan luxi nɛn alo xɛmɛn naxan a sansiin woli a xɛɛn ma.
41004027	Xa a xi, xa a mi xi, kɔɛɛn ba, yanyin ba, sansi xɔnna solima nɛn, a yi gbo, koni a tan mi a liga kiin kolon.
41004028	Bɔxɔn nan bogi seene raminima a yɛtɛ ra. A solima nɛn singe, na xanbi ra, a sabati, dɔnxɛn na a yi bogi.
41004029	A na mɔ waxatin naxan yi, xɛmɛn yi wɔlitɛn naso a ra, bayo a xaba waxatin bata a li.”
41004030	Yesu yi maxɔdinna ti, a naxa, “En Alaa Mangayaan sama nanse ma, hanma en nɔɛ a yɛbɛ sandan mundun xɔn?
41004031	A luxi nɛn alo sansi kɛsɛ xuridin naxan xurun dangu se kɛsɛn birin na muxune naxanye sima.
41004032	Koni a na si, a gboma nɛn han a dangu sansine birin na. A yiine yi gbo han xɔline yi e tɛɛne sa a yiine yi, a nininna ra.”
41004033	Yesu yi Alaa falan nali e ma sanda sifani ito wuyaxi xɔn, e yi nɔɛ naxanye famunɲɛ.
41004034	A mi yi falan tima e xa, xa a mi sandan sa. Koni e nun a xarandiine nɛma yi e danna, a yi e birin yɛbama nɛn e xa.
41004035	Na lɔxɔn ɲinbanna ra, Yesu yi a fala a xarandiine xa, a naxa, “En gidi daraan kidi ma.”
41004036	Nayi, e yi keli yamaan yɛ, e sa so kunkin kui Yesu yi dɔxi naxan kui. Kunki gbɛtɛye fan yi a dɛxɔn.
41004037	Foye gbeen yi keli, igen mɔrɔnne yi so fɔlɔ kunkin kui, a yi luxi ndedi kunkin xa rafe igen na.
41004038	Yesu yi xima kunkin kui xanbin na, a xunna saxi xunbunsaan fari. E yi a raxulun, e yi a fala a xa, e naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, i ya fe mi nxu faxa feni ba?”
41004039	Yesu yi keli, a foyen nun igen mɔrɔnne yamari, a naxa, “I raxara, i sabari!” Foyen yi dɔxɔ, na yi madundu yenyen!
41004040	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ gaxuxi nanfera? Dɛnkɛlɛya mi ɛ yi singe ba?”
41004041	Koni e gaxu kati! E a fala e bode xa, e naxa, “Nde xɛmɛni ito ra? Hali foyen nun igena a falan suxuma!”
41005001	E yi dangu Galile Daraan bode fɔxɔn na Gadara yamanani.
41005002	Yesu godo nɛn kunkin kui tun, xɛmɛna nde yi fa sa keli bilingan yireni, yinna ɲaxin yi naxan fɔxɔ ra.
41005003	Na xɛmɛn yi bilingan yiren nin, muxu yo mi yi fa nɔɛ a xidɛ sɔnɔn, hali yɔlɔnxɔnna ra.
41005004	Amasɔtɔ e bata yi a sanne balan wuren na, e a yiine xidi yɔlɔnxɔnne ra sanɲa ma wuyaxi, koni a yi a yɔlɔnxɔnne yibolonma nɛn, a wurene ba a sanne ma. Muxu yo mi yi fa a nɔɛ.
41005005	A yi sigama bilingan yiren nin, e nun geyane fari kɔɛɛn nun yanyin birin na. A yi gbelegbelema nɛn waxatin birin, a yi lu a yɛtɛ maxabɛ gɛmɛn na.
41005006	A to sa Yesu to fɛ wulani, a yi a gi, a sa a xinbi sin a bun ma.
41005007	A yi a xuini te, yinnan yi a ragbelegbele a falan ti a xɔn, a naxa, “Kore Xɔnna Alaa Dii Xɛmɛna, Yesu, i waxi nanse xɔn ma n tan xa? I kɔlɔ Ala yi, fa fala i mi n ɲaxankatama!”
41005008	A na falaxi nɛn, amasɔtɔ Yesu bata yi a fala, a naxa, “I tan yinna ɲaxina, xɛtɛ xɛmɛni ito fɔxɔ ra.”
41005009	Yesu yi yinnan maxɔdin, a naxa, “I xili di?” A yi a yabi, a naxa, “N xili nɛn, ‘Ganla.’ Amasɔtɔ nxu wuya!”
41005010	Yinnan yi lu Yesu mafanɲɛ, a nama yinnane kedi yamanani.
41005011	Awa, xɔsɛ kuru gbeen yi na dɛxɔn ma, e yi e dɛgema geyaan ma.
41005012	Yinnane yi Yesu mafan, e naxa, “Nxu rasiga xɔsɛ kuruni itoe yɛ, alogo nxu xa sa so ne yi.”
41005013	Nanara, a yi tin. Yinna ɲaxine yi xɛtɛ xɛmɛn fɔxɔ ra, e sa so xɔsɛne yi. Xɔsɛ kurun birin yi godo e giyɛ geyaan na, e godo darani, e faxa. Xɔsɛ wuli firin ɲɔxɔn.
41005014	Muxun naxanye yi xɔsɛne kantanma, ne yi siga e giyɛ taani, e sa na xibarun nali taani e nun xɛɛne ma. Yamaan yi siga na feen matodeni.
41005015	Awa, e siga Yesu fɛma, e na xɛmɛn to yinna ganla yi naxan fɔxɔ ra nun. A dɔxi, domaan nagodoxi a ma, a bata xaxili sɔtɔ. Nanara, e birin yi gaxu kati!
41005016	Naxanye na feene birin to, e yi ne yɛba yamaan xa naxan ligaxi na muxun xa yinna ɲaxin yi naxan fɔxɔ ra e nun naxan liga xɔsɛne ra.
41005017	Nanara, e Yesu mafan fɔlɔ, a xa keli e yamanani.
41005018	Awa, Yesu yi soma kunkin kui waxatin naxan yi, yinna ɲaxin yi xɛmɛn naxan fɔxɔ ra nun, na yi Yesu mafan alogo a xa lu a fɛma.
41005019	Koni Yesu mi tin, a yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Xɛtɛ i konni i ya denbayaan fɛma. Marigin naxan ligaxi i xa, a kininkininxi i ma kii naxan yi, i sa na fala e xa.”
41005020	Awa, xɛmɛn yi siga na Taa Xun Fune birin yi. Yesu feen naxan ligaxi a xa, a sa na fala. Na muxune yi kabɛ kati!
41005021	Yesu mɔn yi xɛtɛ daraan bode fɔxɔn na kunkin kui. Yama gbeen yi malan Yesu rabilinni daraan dɛxɔn ma.
41005022	Salide banxin kuntigina nde yi fa, naxan yi xili Yirusu, a yi a to, a bira Yesu san bun ma.
41005023	A yi a mafan kati, a naxa, “N ma dii tɛmɛn faxamaan ni i ra! Yandi, fa i yiin sa a ma alogo a xa kɛndɛya, a lu a nii ra.”
41005024	Awa, Yesu yi siga a fɔxɔ ra, yama gbeen fan yi siga a fɔxɔ ra, e yi a yigbɛtɛn han!
41005025	Ɲaxanla nde yi na nun ɲaxalan furen yi naxan ma xabu ɲɛɛ fu nun firin.
41005026	A bata yi tɔrɔ seriba wuyaxi fɛma a dandandeni, a gbetin birin bata yi ɲan, koni a mi kɛndɛya, fɔ a furen to yi sigan gboɛ ayi!
41005027	A to Yesu a fe mɛ, a yi fa yamaan yɛ Yesu xanbi ra, a yi a yiin din a domaan na.
41005028	Amasɔtɔ a yi a mirima nɛn, a naxa, “Hali n na n yiin din a domaan na gbansan, n kɛndɛyama nɛn.”
41005029	Na waxatin yɛtɛni, wunla naxan yi minima a ma, na yi dan, a yi a kolon a fatini fa fala a bata kɛndɛya.
41005030	Yesu yi a kolon mafurɛn a sɛnbɛna nde bata mini a yi. A yi a yɛɛ rafindi yamaan ma a yi a fala, a naxa, “Nde a yiin dinxi n ma domaan na?”
41005031	A xarandiine yi a fala a xa, e naxa, “I yamaan toma i yigbɛtɛnɲɛ, i mɔn a falama, i naxa, ‘Nde a yiin dinxi n na?’ ”
41005032	Koni Yesu yi lu a rabilinna matoɛ alogo a xa ɲaxanla to naxan a yiin dinxi a ra.
41005033	Ɲaxanla yi xuruxurunma gaxuni, a to bata a kolon naxan ligaxi a xa, a yi fa bira a san bun, a yi ɲɔndin fala a xa.
41005034	Yesu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “N ma dii tɛmɛna, i ya dɛnkɛlɛyaan bata i rakisi, siga bɔɲɛ xunbenli, i ya tɔrɔn bata ɲan.”
41005035	Yesu yi na falama waxatin naxan yi, xɛrana ndee yi fa sa keli salide banxin kuntigin Yirusu konni. Ne yi a fala Yirusu xa, e naxa, “I ya dii tɛmɛn bata faxa. I karamɔxɔ tɔrɔma nanfera?”
41005036	Yesu mi a tuli mati e falan na, koni a yi a fala salide banxin kuntigin xa, a naxa, “I nama gaxu, i xa dɛnkɛlɛya tun!”
41005037	A mi tin muxu yo xa siga a fɔxɔ ra, fɔ Piyɛri nun Yaki nun Yaki xunyɛn Yoni.
41005038	E to salide banxin kuntigin konna li, Yesu yi e to kɔntɔfilixi, e yi wugama han, e gbelegbelema!
41005039	A yi so banxini, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ kɔntɔfilixi nanfera, ɛ yi wuga? Diin mi faxaxi, a xiin nɛn.”
41005040	Koni, e yi a magele fɔlɔ. A yi e birin namini banxini, a yi diidina nga nun a fafe xili e nun a xarandii saxanna. E diidin saxi dɛnaxan yi, e so mɛnni.
41005041	A yi a suxu a yiin ma, a yi a fala a xa a kon xuini, a naxa, “Talita kumi.” Na bunna nɛɛn fa fala, “Dii tɛmɛna, n na falama i xa, keli!”
41005042	Dii tɛmɛn yi keli mafurɛn, a sigan ti fɔlɔ. A barin bata yi ɲɛɛ fu nun firin ti. E yi kabɛ na ma kati!
41005043	Koni Yesu yi e yamari, a muxu yo nama feni ito kolon, e mɔn xa donseen so diin yii.
41006001	Yesu yi keli na yi, a siga a konni, a maxuruxi taan naxan yi, a xarandiine biraxi a fɔxɔ ra.
41006002	Matabu Lɔxɔn to a li, a yi xaranna ti fɔlɔ salide banxini. Yamaan naxan yi tuli matixi a ra, ne yi kabɛ, e yi a fala, e naxa, “A ito sɔtɔxi minɛn yi? A xaxinla sifani ito sɔtɔxi di, a to fa kabanako feni itoe ligama?
41006003	Kamudɛrɛn xa mi ito ra ba? Mariyamaa diin xa mi a ra ba? Yaki nun Yusufu nun Yudasi nun Simɔn tada xa mi ito ra ba? A xunyɛ ɲaxalanmane xa mi dɔxi be ba?” E yi e mɛ a ra.
41006004	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Nabiin binyɛ yiren birin yi, fɔ a kon taan nun a xabilan nun a denbayani.”
41006005	A mi nɔ kabanako fe yo ligɛ mɛnni, fɔ a to a yiin sa furetɔna ndee tun ma, a yi e rakɛndɛya.
41006006	A yi kabɛ e dɛnkɛlɛyatareyaan ma han! Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi siga na taane yi, a yi yamaan xaran.
41006007	A yi xarandii fu nun firinna xili, a yi e rasiga firin firin yɛɛn ma. A yi sɛnbɛn so e yii yinna ɲaxine xun na.
41006008	A yi e yamari, a naxa, “Ɛ nama siga sese ra ɛ yii sigatini, fɔ dunganna. Ɛ nama siga buru ra hanma bɔndunla hanma gbetina ɛ tagi xidini.
41006009	Ɛ xa sankidin so ɛ sanni koni ɛ nama doma gbee firin xali ɛ yii.”
41006010	A mɔn yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ na yigiya banxin naxan yi, ɛ xa lu mɛnni han ɛ yi keli na taani.
41006011	Xa ɛ yirena nde li, yamaan mi ɛ rasuxu, e mi e tuli mati ɛ ra, ɛ xa keli na yi. Ɛ yi ɛ sanne rakunkun, ɛ yi na gbangbanna ba ɛ sanne ra. Na findima nɛn sereyaan na e xa!”
41006012	Nayi, e yi siga, e sa kawandin ba, e naxa, a yamaan xa e xun xanbi so e hakɛne yi.
41006013	E yi ɲinan wuyaxi kedi, e turen sa furetɔne xunne yi misaala ra, e yi e rakɛndɛya.
41006014	Manga Herode yi na birin mɛ amasɔtɔ Yesu xinla bata yi xuya ayi yiren birin yi. Muxuna ndee naxa, “Yoni Marafu Tiin nan kelixi sayani. Nanara, sɛnbɛna a yii, a kabanako feene liga.”
41006015	Koni ndee naxa, “Nabi Eli nan a ra.” Ndee naxa, “Nabiin nan a tan na alo waxati danguxin nabina nde.”
41006016	Herode a mɛ waxatin naxan yi, a yi a fala, a naxa, “Yoni nan a ra, n naxan xunna sɛgɛ a dɛ! A bata keli sayani!”
41006017	Herode yɛtɛɛn yamarin fi nɛn, a Yoni xa suxu, e yi a xidi, e yi a sa kasoon na Herodiyade a fe ra, naxan bata yi dɔxɔ Herode fafaxakedenna Filipi xɔn, Herode naxan dɔxɔ a ɲaxanla ra.
41006018	Yoni bata yi a fala Herode xa, a naxa, “A mi daxa i xa i fafaxakedenna ɲaxanla dɔxɔ!”
41006019	Nanara, Herodiyade yi xɔlɔ Yoni ma, a yi waxi a faxa feni. Koni a mi nɔ,
