42004005	Na xanbi ra, Yinna Mangan Setana yi a tongo, a siga a ra, a dunuɲa mangayane birin yita a ra mafurɛn.
42004006	Awa, Yinna Mangan Setana yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “N nɔɔn birin fima i ma nɛn e nun nafunli ito birin amasɔtɔ a birin taxuxi n tan nan na, muxun naxan na n kɛnɛn, n yi a so na yii.
42004007	Awa, xa i n batu, n ni ito birin fima nɛn i ma.”
42004008	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “A sɛbɛxi Kitabuni, a ‘I xa i Marigina Ala binya, i yi a keden peen batu!’ ”
42004009	Na xanbi ra, Yinna Mangan Setana yi Yesu tongo, a siga a ra Yerusalɛn taani, a yi a ti Ala Batu Banxin xun tagi, a yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Xa Alaa Dii Xɛmɛn nan i tan na, tugan be,
42004010	amasɔtɔ a sɛbɛxi Kitabuni, fa fala, ‘Ala yamarin fima nɛn a malekane ma i ya fe yi alogo e xa i kantan,’
42004011	a mɔn yi a fala, a naxa, ‘e i tongoma nɛn alogo i nama i sanna din gɛmɛ yo ra.’ ”
42004012	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “A sɛbɛxi, ‘I nama i Marigina Ala mato bunbani.’ ”
42004013	Yinna Mangan Setana to yelin Yesu matoɛ kiin birin yi, a keli a fɛma han waxati gbɛtɛ.
42004014	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi xɛtɛ Galile yi, Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin sɛnbɛna a xun ma. A fe xibarun yi rali na yamanan birin yi.
42004015	A yi e xaran e salide banxine yi, e birin yi a tantun.
42004016	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi siga Nasarɛti taani, a maxuruxi dɛnaxan yi. Matabu Lɔxɔni, a yi siga salide banxini alo a darixi a ligɛ kii naxan yi. A keli, a ti e xaran feen na.
42004017	E yi Nabi Esayi gbee Kitabun so a yii. A yi a rabi, a na yiren to a sɛbɛxi dɛnaxan yi, a naxa,
42004018	“Marigina Niina n yi. A bata n sugandi, a n xa Alaa falan Xibaru Faɲin nali yiigelitɔne ma. A bata n nasiga, a n xa xɔrɔya feen kawandin ba suxu muxune xa, n yi danxutɔne yɛɛn nabi. Naxanye nɔɔn bun ma, n ne xɔrɔya.
42004019	N xa Marigina muxune xunba ɲɛɛn nali.”
42004020	Yesu yi Kitabun nagali, a yi a so a suxu muxun yii, a dɔxɔ. Muxun naxanye birin yi salide banxini, ne yi e yɛɛn ti a ra.
42004021	A falan ti fɔlɔ e xa, a naxa, “To, n bata naxan xaran, ɛ yi a mɛ, na bata kamali.”
42004022	E birin yi a sere ba, e kabɛ na fala faɲine ma a naxanye ti e xa. E yi a fala, e naxa, “Yusufu a dii xɛmɛn xa mi ito ra ba?”
42004023	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “N laxi a ra yati, fa fala ɛ sandani ito sama n ma nɛn fa fala, ‘Seribana, i yɛtɛ rakɛndɛya.’ Ɛ mɔn a falama n ma nɛn fa fala, ‘Nxu feen naxanye mɛxi i ya fe yi Kapɛrunan yi, ne fan liga i gbee taani.’ ”
42004024	Yesu mɔn yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, nabiin mi binyen sɔtɛ a kon taani mumɛ!”
42004025	A yi a fala, a naxa, “Ɛ tuli mati, ɲɔndin na a ra, kɛ ɲaxalan wuyaxi yi Isirayila muxune yɛ Nabi Eli waxatini. Na waxatini tulen mi fa ɲɛɛ saxan e nun a tagi, fitina kamɛn yi so na yamanan birin yi.
42004026	Koni hali na Ala mi Nabi Eli rasiga e tan nde keden yo ma, fɔ kɛ ɲaxalan keden peen naxan yi Sarepata taani, Sidɔn yamanani.
42004027	Dogonfontɔ wuyaxi yi Isirayila muxune yɛ Nabi Elise waxatini, koni hali na keden pe, a mi kɛndɛya fɔ Naman, Siriya kaana.”
42004028	Muxun naxanye yi salide banxini, ne na mɛ waxatin naxan yi, e bɔɲɛn yi te.
42004029	E keli, e siga a ratuntunɲɛ taan fari ma han geyaan tintinna ra taan yi geyaan naxan fari, alogo e xa a radin lanbanni.
42004030	Koni a dangu yamaan tagi, a siga.
42004031	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi siga Galile Kapɛrunan taani, a yamaan xaran dɛnaxan yi Matabu Lɔxɔni.
42004032	E birin yi kabɛ a xaran ti kiin ma amasɔtɔ a yi falan tima Ala sɛnbɛn nin.
42004033	Xɛmɛna nde yi salide banxini yinnan yi naxan fɔxɔ ra, yinna ɲaxina. A yi a xuini te, a gbelegbele, a naxa
42004034	“Ee! Yesu Nasarɛti kaana, i waxi nanse xɔn ma nxu yii? I faxi nxu halagiden nin ba? N na a kolon nde i ra. Alaa muxu sariɲanxin nan i tan na.”
42004035	Yesu yi yinnan yamari a sɔbɛɛn na, a naxa, “I dundu, xɛtɛ xɛmɛni ito fɔxɔ ra.” Yinnan yi xɛmɛn nabira e birin yɛtagi, a xɛtɛ a fɔxɔ ra, a mi sese ɲaxi liga a ra.
42004036	Muxune birin yi kabɛ, e yi a fala e bode xa, e naxa, “Xaran sifan mundun ito ra? Xɛmɛni ito bata falan ti yinna ɲaxine xa nɔɔn nun sɛnbɛni, e xɛtɛ muxune fɔxɔ ra!”
42004037	Yesu a fe xibarun yi xuya ayi na yamanan birin yi.
42004038	Yesu yi keli salide banxini, a siga Simɔn konni. A yi a li Simɔn bitan gilɛn fatin wolonxi a ma. E yi a fe fala Yesu xa.
42004039	A sa a ti a saden dɛxɔn ma, a yi falan ti fati mawolonna xili ma, ɲaxanla yi kɛndɛya, na waxatin yɛtɛni, a yi keli a fɔlɔ walɛ e xa.
42004040	Sogen godo waxatin naxan yi, furemane yi naxanye birin yii, furen sifan wuyaxi, ne yi fa ne ra Yesu fɛma. A yi a yiin sa e birin xun ma, a yi e rakɛndɛya.
42004041	Ɲinanne fan yi muxun naxanye fɔxɔ ra, e yi ne ragbelegbele e falan ti e xɔn, e naxa, “Alaa Dii Xɛmɛn nan i tan na!” E xɛtɛ muxu wuyaxi fɔxɔ ra. Koni, a yi ɲinanne yamari a e nama falan ti, amasɔtɔ e yi a kolon a Alaa Muxu Sugandixin nan a tan na.
42004042	Subaxani, Yesu yi keli taani, a siga a danna yirena nde yi. Yamaan yi a fen fɔlɔ. E a to waxatin naxan yi, e kata e xa a makankan alogo a nama siga
42004043	koni a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “A fɛrɛ mi na fɔ n xa Alaa Mangayaan Xibaru Faɲin nali taan bonne fan yi nɛn amasɔtɔ Ala n xɛxi na nan ma.”
42004044	Nanara, a yi kawandin bama Yudaya yamanani salide banxine yi.
42005001	Lɔxɔna nde, Yesu yi tixi Genesarɛti Daraan dɛ, yamaan yi a yigbɛtɛnma Alaa falan mɛdeni,
42005002	a yi kunki firin to igen dɛ yɛxɛ suxune bata yi keli naxanye kui e lu e yalane raxɛ.
42005003	Yesu yi so Simɔn ma kunkin kui, a yi a mafan, a xa a tutun igen xun ma ndedi. Yesu yi dɔxɔ kunkin kui, a yamaan xaran.
42005004	A yelin falan tiyɛ waxatin naxan yi, a yi a fala Simɔn xa, a naxa, “Kunkin nasiga tilin yireni ɛ nun i lanfane xa yalane ragodo igeni, ɛ yɛxɛn suxu.”
42005005	Simɔn yi a yabi, a naxa, “Nxu kanna, nxu bata wali kɔɛɛn na kati! Nxu mi sese suxu. Koni xa i bata a fala na kiini, n yalane ragodoma nɛn igeni.”
42005006	E to yalane ragodo igeni, e yɛxɛ wuyaxi suxu han yalane yi lu yibɔɛ.
42005007	E lanfaan naxanye yi kunkin boden kui, e ne xili e malideni. E fa, e yi kunkin firinne birin nafe yɛxɛn na han e godo fɔlɔ igen bun ma.
42005008	Feen naxan liga, Simɔn Piyɛri na to waxatin naxan yi, a yi a xinbi sin Yesu bun ma, a naxa, “Marigina, i masiga n na amasɔtɔ hakɛ kanna nan n tan na!”
42005009	Gaxun yi a suxu a tan nun a lanfane birin na yɛxɛ suxune fe ra
42005010	hali Yaki nun Yoni Sebede a dii xɛmɛne. Yesu yi a fala Simɔn xa, a naxa, “I nama gaxu, fɔlɔ to ma, i fa muxune nan sɔtɔma Ala xa alo i yi yɛxɛn suxuma kii naxan yi.”
42005011	E kunkine rate xareyaan na, e seene birin lu na, e bira Yesu fɔxɔ ra.
42005012	Yesu yi taana nde yi, xɛmɛna nde yi fa dogonfonna yi naxan fatin birin ma. A Yesu to waxatin naxan yi, a yi bira, a yɛtagin yi lan bɔxɔn ma, a yi a mafan, a naxa, “N kanna, xa i tin, i nɔɛ n nakɛndɛyɛ nɛn!”
42005013	Yesu yi a yiin sa a ma, a naxa, “N bata tin, i xa kɛndɛya!” Dogonfonna yi a beɲin sasa!
42005014	Yesu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “I nama a fala muxu yo xa, koni siga saraxaraliin fɛma, a xa i mato. Na xanbi ra, i saraxan ba i rasariɲan feen na alo Musa a yamari kii naxan yi. Na findima seren na e xa.”
42005015	Koni Yesu xinla yi xuya ayi na yiren birin yi. Yama gbeen yi fa a falan namɛdeni e nun e rakɛndɛya feen na.
42005016	Koni a yi keli, a siga a danna, a yi Ala maxandi, alo a darixi a ra kii naxan yi.
42005017	Lɔxɔna nde Yesu yi xaranna tima, Farisi muxuna ndee nun sariya karamɔxɔne yi dɔxi na yi, naxanye yi kelixi Galile nun Yudaya taan birin yi e nun Yerusalɛn taani. Marigin sɛnbɛn yi Yesu yi a furetɔne rakɛndɛya.
42005018	Muxuna ndee yi fa lɛbutɛnna ra a sa seni e yii. E kata, a e xa a raso banxini, alogo e xa sa a sa Yesu bun ma.
42005019	Koni yamaan yi gbo, e mi kira sɔtɔ e yi a raso. Na nan a liga e te banxin fari e yinla raba mɛnni e yi e nun a sa seen nagodo yamaan tagi Yesu yɛtagi.
42005020	Yesu e dɛnkɛlɛyaan to waxatin naxan yi, a yi a fala xɛmɛn xa, a naxa, “N xɔyina, i ya yulubine bata mafelu.”
42005021	Sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxune yi e miri, e naxa, “Nde xɛmɛni ito ra naxan Ala rayelefuma? Muxu yo mi nɔɛ yulubine mafeluyɛ fɔ Ala keden peena!”
42005022	Yesu yi e miriyaan kolon. Nanara, a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ mirima fe sifani itoe ma nanfera?
42005023	Nanse fala raxɔlɔ, ‘I ya yulubine bata mafelu’ hanma ‘Keli, i ya sa seen tongo, i sigan ti?’
42005024	N na yitama ɛ ra nɛn nayi fa fala sɛnbɛna n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn yii dunuɲa yi, n muxun mafelu a yulubine ra.” A yi a fala lɛbutɛnna xa, a naxa, “Keli, i ya sa seen tongo, i siga i konni!”
42005025	Xɛmɛn yi keli e birin yɛtagi, a yi a sa seen tongo, a siga a konni mafurɛn, a yi Ala tantun.
42005026	E birin yi kabɛ kati! E yi Ala tantun amasɔtɔ e bata yi gaxu Ala yɛɛ ra, e naxa, “En bata kabanako feen to to!”
42005027	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi mini, a siga, a sa mudu maxinla nde to, a xili Lewi, a yi dɔxi mudu maxilideni. Yesu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Bira n fɔxɔ ra.”
42005028	Lewi yi keli, a yi a seene birin lu na, a bira Yesu fɔxɔ ra.
42005029	Na xanbi ra, Lewi yi ɲaxaɲaxani tɔn a banxini Yesu xa. Mudu maxili wuyaxi nun muxu gbɛtɛye fan wuyaxi yi dɔxɔ e fɛma.
42005030	Farisi muxuna ndee nun e sariya karamɔxɔna ndee yi falan ti Yesu a xarandiine fe yi, e yi e maxɔdin, e naxa, “Nanfera ɛ donseen donma ɛ yi ɛ min mudu maxinle nun hakɛ kanne fɛma?”
42005031	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Muxun naxan kɛndɛ na mako mi seribaan ma fɔ furetɔne.
42005032	Amasɔtɔ n mi faxi tinxin muxune xilideni fɔ hakɛ kanne, alogo e xa e xun xanbi so e hakɛne yi.”
42005033	Muxuna ndee yi a fala Yesu xa, e naxa, “Yoni a xarandiine sunna suxuma yɛ yo yɛ, e yi Ala maxandi. Farisi muxune xarandiine fan na ligama. Koni i ya xarandiine donseen donma, e yi e min.”
42005034	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɲaxalandi kanna nɛma ɲaxalandi tiine fɛma waxatin naxan yi, e sunɛ ba? Na mi ligɛ mumɛ!
42005035	Koni waxatina nde fama ɲaxalandi kanna bama nɛn e yɛ, e sunna suxuma nɛn na waxatini.”
42005036	Yesu yi sandani ito fan sa e xa, a naxa, “Muxu yo mi nɔɛ dugi nɛnɛn tongɛ a yi a yibɔ, a dugi fonna bɛtɛrɛn a ra. Xa a na liga, a dugi nɛnɛn kalama nɛn. Dugi dungi nɛnɛn fan mi lanɲɛ a fonna ma.
42005037	Muxun mi manpa nɛnɛn sɛ se sase fonna kui. Xa a na liga, manpa nɛnɛn se sase fonna kalama nɛn, manpaan yi bɔxɔn, se sase fonna yi kala.
42005038	Koni manpa nɛnɛn sama se sase nɛnɛn nan kui!
42005039	Awa, muxun na manpa fonna min waxatin naxan yi, a nɛnɛn mi fa rafan a ma sɔnɔn, a falama nɛn nayi, a naxa, ‘A fonna fan.’ ”
42006001	Yesu yi danguma xɛɛna nde ma lɔxɔna nde yi, Matabu Lɔxɔni, a xarandiine yi sansi tɔnsɔnne ratorondon fɔlɔ, e yi a tɛrɛxɛn e yiin kui, e a kɛsɛn don.
42006002	Farisi muxuna nde naxa, “Ɛ ito ligama nanfera? A mi daxa Matabu Lɔxɔni.”
42006003	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ mi na xaranxi ba, kamɛn Dawuda suxu waxatin naxan yi, e nun a fɔxɔrabirane naxan liga?
42006004	A so nɛn Alaa banxini, a yi Alaa buru ralixin don, a yi nde so a muxune fan yii. Anu, a mi daxa muxun xa a don fɔ saraxaraline.”
42006005	Yesu mɔn yi a fala, a naxa, “N tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn nan Matabu Lɔxɔn kanna ra.”
42006006	Yesu yi siga salide banxini Matabu Lɔxɔ gbɛtɛ yi, a sa e xaran. Xɛmɛna nde yi na naxan yiifari ma yiin yi madɔnxi.
42006007	Sariya karamɔxɔna ndee nun Farisi muxuna ndee yi waxi a xɔn ma e xa Yesu tɔɲɛgɛ. Nanara, e yi e yɛɛn ti a ra alogo e xa a kolon xa a muxun nakɛndɛyɛ Matabu Lɔxɔni.
42006008	Koni Yesu yi e miriyaan kolon. Nanara, a yi a fala xɛmɛ yii madɔnxin xa, a naxa, “Keli, i fa yamaan yɛtagi be.” Xɛmɛn yi keli, a ti e yɛtagi.
42006009	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “N xa ɛ maxɔdin, Matabu Lɔxɔni, nanse daxa a xa liga, a ɲaxina xa a faɲina? En yi muxun niin nakisi ba, xa en yi a halagi?”
42006010	A yi e birin mato, a yi a fala xɛmɛn xa, a naxa, “I yiini bandun.” A yi a liga na kiini, a yiin yi kɛndɛya.
42006011	Koni e xɔlɔ kati, e naxan ligama Yesu ra e na fala e bode tagi.
42006012	Yesu yi siga geyaan fari, a sa Ala maxandi na waxatini, a xi Ala maxandɛ.
42006013	Kuye ba waxatin naxan yi, a yi a xarandiine xili, a fu nun firin yɛba e tagi, a yi ne xili sa xɛrane.
42006014	E xinle ni i ra, Simɔn, a naxan xili sa Piyɛri, e nun a ngaxakedenna Andire, e nun Yaki nun Yoni nun Filipi nun Barotolome nun
42006015	Matiyu nun Tomasi nun Alifaa dii xɛmɛn Yaki, e nun Simɔn e naxan ma a “Yahudiya siya xanuna,”
42006016	e nun Yaki a dii xɛmɛn Yudasi e nun Yudasi Isakariyoti naxan Yesu yanfa, a yi a so yiini.
42006017	Yesu yi godo keli geyaan fari e nun a xɛrane, a ti lanbanni, e nun a xarandii wuyaxi. Yama gbeen yi na nun sa keli Yudaya yamanan yiren birin yi, e nun keli Yerusalɛn taani, e nun taan naxanye tixi fɔxɔ igen dɛxɔn ma, naxanye xili Tire e nun Sidɔn. Mɛn kanne yi fa a xuiin namɛdeni e nun e rakɛndɛyadeni e furen sifan birin ma.
42006018	Yinna ɲaxine bata yi naxanye tɔrɔ ne fan yi fa e rakɛndɛyadeni.
42006019	Muxun birin yi kataxi, alogo e xa e yiin din a ra, amasɔtɔ sɛnbɛn yi minima ayi naxan yi e rakɛndɛyama.
42006020	Yesu yi a xarandiine mato, a naxa, “Sɛwana ɛ tan yiigelitɔne xa, amasɔtɔ ɛ gbeen nan Alaa Mangayaan na!
42006021	Sɛwana ɛ xa, kamɛn naxanye ma iki amasɔtɔ ɛ lugoma nɛn ken! Sɛwana ɛ xa, naxanye wugama iki, amasɔtɔ ɛ gelema nɛn!”
42006022	“Yamaan na ɛ raɲaxu waxatin naxan yi, e yi ɛ kedi, e yi ɛ konbi fa fala muxu ɲaxin nan ɛ tan na Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛna fe ra, sɛwana ɛ xa na yi.
42006023	Na na liga waxatin naxan yi, ɛ xa sɛwa, ɛ yi ɛ bodon sɛwana fe ra amasɔtɔ barayi gbeen namaraxi ɛ xa ariyanna yi. Bayo e benbane nabine tɔrɔ na kii nin.”
42006024	“Koni nafulu kanne, gbalona ɛ yɛɛ ra amasɔtɔ ɛ bata yelin ɛ gbee ɲaxunna sɔtɛ ɛ siini.
42006025	Ɛ tan naxanye lugoxi iki, gbalona ɛ yɛɛ ra, amasɔtɔ kamɛna ɛ suxuma nɛn. Ɛ tan naxanye gelema iki, gbalona ɛ yɛɛ ra, amasɔtɔ ɛ mɔnɛma nɛn, ɛ wuga.”
42006026	“Muxun birin na ɛ xili faɲin fala waxatin naxan yi, gbalona ɛ yɛɛ ra amasɔtɔ e benbane a fala na kii nin wule nabine ma.”
42006027	“Koni, naxanye n xuiin mɛma, n na falama ɛ xa nɛn. Ɛ ɛ yaxune xanu, naxanye bata ɛ raɲaxu, ɛ xa fe faɲin liga ne xa.
42006028	Ɛ xa duba ɛ danga muxune xa. Naxanye ɛ tɔrɔma, ɛ xa Ala maxandi ne xa.
42006029	Naxan na i dɛɛn fɔxɔ kedenna garin a ma, bode fɔxɔ fan ti a xa. Xa muxuna nde i ya doma gbeen tongo, i xa tin a xa doma bun biran fan tongo.
42006030	Naxan na i xandi seni, i xa na ki. Xa muxuna nde i yii seen tongo, i nama a maxɔdin na ra sɔnɔn.
42006031	I waxi muxune xa feen naxan naba i xa, na ɲɔxɔnna liga bonne xa.”
42006032	“Muxun naxanye bata ɛ xanu, xa ɛ ne nan tun xanu, ɛ barayin sɔtɔma na yi di? Hali hakɛ kanne fan muxun xanuma naxan bata e xanu!
42006033	Muxun naxanye bata fe faɲin liga ɛ xa, xa ɛ fe faɲin liga ne nan tun xa, ɛ barayin sɔtɔma na yi di? Hali hakɛ kanne fan na ligama.
42006034	Xa ɛ muxune nan tun dolima naxanye a fima, ɛ barayin sɔtɔma na yi di? Hali hakɛ kanne fan e bode dolima na kiini.
42006035	Koni, ɛ tan xa ɛ yaxune xanu, ɛ fe faɲin liga e xa. Ɛ muxune doli, ɛ nama ɛ miri se sɔtɔ feen ma ne yi. Ɛ barayi gbee sɔtɔma nɛn na yi. Ɛ ligama nɛn alo ɛ Fafe, Kore Xɔnna Ala. Amasɔtɔ a fe faɲin ligama finsiriwanle nun muxu ɲaxine xa.
42006036	Ɛ kininkinin alo ɛ Fafe Ala kininkininxi kii naxan yi.”
42006037	“Ɛ nama ɛ yɛtɛ findi ɛ lanfaan kɛwanle makiti muxun na, alogo Ala nama ɛ fan makiti. Ɛ nama bonne yalagi alogo Ala nama ɛ fan yalagi. Ɛ muxune mafelu alogo Ala xa ɛ fan mafelu.
42006038	Ɛ muxune ki alogo Ala xa ɛ fan ki. Ɛ yi liga seen nafexin sɔtɔ na yi, a rafexina ken, a madɛtɛn, ɛ yi a sa ɛ dugi dɛni. Ɛ ligaseen naxan yatɛma bonne xa, Ala fan na yatɛma ɛ xa nɛn.”
42006039	Yesu yi sandani ito sa e xa, a naxa, “Danxutɔɔn mi danxutɔɔn yii rasuxɛ, xa a na liga e firinna birin birama nɛn yinla kui.
42006040	Xarandiin mi gboɛ a karamɔxɔ xa. Xarandii yo xarandii, a na yelin xaranna ra waxatin naxan yi, a ligama nɛn alo a karamɔxɔna.”
42006041	“Nanfera ɲamadin naxan i adamadi boden yɛɛn xɔn, i na toma, koni gbindonna naxan i tan yɛɛn xɔn, i mi na toma?
42006042	I a falama i adamadi boden xa nanfera fa fala, ‘Yandi, ti n xa ɲamadin ba i yɛɛn xɔn ma.’ Koni i mi na gbindonna toma i yɛtɛ yɛɛn xɔn ma ba? I tan nafigina, gbindonna ba i yɛtɛ yɛɛn xɔn ma singen, na xanbi ra i nɔɛ na ɲamadin toɛ nɛn, i yi a ba i adamadi boden yɛɛn xɔn ma.”
42006043	“Wudin faɲin mi bogi ɲaxin tima, wudi ɲaxin mi bogi faɲin tima.
42006044	Wudin birin kolonma a bogin nan xɔn ma, i mi xɔdɛ bogin bolonɲɛ wudi maɲalixin kɔɛ ra, i mi manpa bogin bolonɲɛ tansinna kɔɛ ra.
42006045	Muxu faɲin fe faɲin nan naminima a muxu faɲiyani. Muxu ɲaxin yi fe ɲaxin namini a muxu ɲaxiyani. Amasɔtɔ feen naxan muxun bɔɲɛni, a na nan falama.”
42006046	“Ɛ n xilima nanfera fa fala, ‘Marigina, Marigina,’ koni n naxan falama ɛ xa, ɛ mi na ligama?
42006047	Naxan birin fama n fɛma, e yi n ma falane ramɛ, e yi e suxu, n na muxune maligan yitama ɛ ra nɛn.
42006048	A ligaxi nɛn alo naxan a banxin ti, a yi yinla ge kati! Han a fanyen li a bun ma, a banxin ti fanyen fari. Tulen yi fa, foyen yi fa, koni a mi a ramaxa amasɔtɔ a tixi ki faɲi.
42006049	Koni muxun naxan bata n ma falane mɛ, a mi e suxu, a ligaxi nɛn alo muxun naxan a banxin tiin bɔxɔn fari ma, a mi bɔxɔn ge alogo a xa a bɛtɛn sa. Tulen fa waxatin naxan yi, a yi bira, a kala kiin yi ɲaxu ayi kati!”
42007001	Yesu yelin na falane birin tiyɛ yamaan xa waxatin naxan yi, a siga Kapɛrunan yi.
42007002	Romi kaa sofa kɛmɛ kuntigina nde yi na, a walikɛɛn naxan yi rafan a ma han, na yi furaxi, a yi fa luxi ndedi a xa faxa.
42007003	Na kuntigin Yesu a fe mɛ waxatin naxan yi, a Yahudiya fonna ndee rasiga Yesu ma, e yi a mafan a a xa fa a walikɛɛn nakɛndɛya.
42007004	E fa Yesu mafan, e naxa, “A lan i xa xɛmɛni ito mali
42007005	amasɔtɔ a bata en kon kaane xanu, a tan nan mɔn nxɔ salide banxin tixi.”
42007006	Yesu yi siga e fɔxɔ ra. E bata yi maso banxin na, kuntigin yi a xɔyina ndee rasiga a faladeni a xa, e naxa, “N kanna, i nama i yɛtɛ tɔrɔ. Na binyen mi lan n ma, i so n ma banxini,
42007007	na nan a ligaxi, n yi n miri n yɛtɛ ma fa fala a mi lan n xa fa i fɛma. Falan ti tun, n ma walikɛɛn kɛndɛyama nɛn!
42007008	N tan fan kuntigina ndee sɛnbɛn bun ma, koni sofane fan n bun ma. N na a falama na nde xa nɛn, n naxa, ‘Siga,’ a siga. N yi a fala nde gbɛtɛ xa, n naxa, ‘Fa,’ a fa. N yi a fala n ma konyin xa, n naxa, ‘Ito liga,’ a na liga.”
42007009	Yesu na mɛ waxatin naxan yi, a kabɛ, a yi a yɛɛ rafindi e ma, a yi a fala yamaan xa a fɔxɔ ra, a naxa, “N xa a fala ɛ xa, n munma dɛnkɛlɛyaan sifani ito to singen hali Isirayila muxune yɛ!”
42007010	Xɛrane yi xɛtɛ kuntigin konni, e yi a li a walikɛɛn bata kɛndɛya.
42007011	Na xɔtɔn bode, Yesu yi siga taana nde yi naxan xili Nayin. A xarandiine nun yama gbeen yi siga a fɔxɔ ra.
42007012	A taan so dɛɛn li waxatin naxan yi, a sa binbi tiine li. Kaɲa gilɛna dii xɛmɛ keden peen bata faxa. Muxu wuyaxi yi na ɲaxanla fɛma keli na taani.
42007013	Marigin na ɲaxanla to waxatin naxan yi, a kininkinin a ma kati, a yi a fala ɲaxanla xa, a naxa, “I nama wuga.”
42007014	A sa a yiin din binbin na, naxanye yi a xalima, ne yi ti. Yesu naxa, “Banxulanna, n na a falama i xa, keli, i ti!”
42007015	Faxa muxun yi keli, a falan ti fɔlɔ. Yesu yi a raxɛtɛ a nga ma mɔn.
42007016	Yamaan birin yi gaxu kati, e yi Ala tantun, e naxa, “Nabi gbeen bata mini kɛnɛnni nxu tagi! Ala bata fa, a yi a yamaan kisi!”
42007017	Muxune yi Yesu a fe xibarun mɛ Yudaya nun a dɛxɔn yamanan birin yi.
42007018	Yoni a xarandiine yi feni ito birin fala a xa. Yoni yi muxu firin xili a fɛma,
42007019	a yi e rasiga Marigin fɛma, e yi a maxɔdin, e naxa, “Yoni yi naxan ma fe falama, fa fala a muxuna nde fama, i tan nan na ra ba, hanma nxu lan nxu xa muxu gbɛtɛ nan legeden?”
42007020	E fa Yesu fɛma waxatin naxan yi, e naxa, “Yoni Marafu Tiin nan nxu xɛxi i ma, a nxu xa i maxɔdin, fa fala a yi muxun naxan fa fe falama, na nan i tan na ba, hanma nxu lan nxu xa muxu gbɛtɛ nan legeden?”
42007021	Na waxatin yɛtɛni, Yesu yi muxu wuyaxi rakɛndɛya furen sifan birin ma e nun ɲinan ɲaxin yi naxanye fɔxɔ ra. A danxutɔ wuyaxi yɛɛn naba ayi.
42007022	Yesu yi Yoni a xɛrane yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ xɛtɛ, ɛ naxan toxi, ɛ yi a mɛ, ɛ sa na fala Yoni xa fa fala danxutɔne seen toma, lɛbutɛnne sigan tima, dogonfontɔne kɛndɛyaan sɔtɔma, tuli xɔrine falan mɛma, faxa muxune kelima sayani, Alaa falan Xibaru Faɲin nalima yiigelitɔne ma.
42007023	Naxan mi biran tantanni n ma fe yi, sɛwan na kanna xa!”
42007024	Yoni a xɛrane siga waxatin naxan yi, Yesu yi Yoni a fe fala fɔlɔ yamaan xa, a naxa, “Ɛ siga nanse matode yi tonbonni? Foyen sɛxɛ ramaxan ba?
42007025	Xa na mi a ra, ɛ siga nanse matode yi? Xɛmɛn naxan marabɛri baxi dugi faɲin na ba? Koni, naxanye marabɛri baxi na kiini, ne manga banxine nin!
42007026	Nayi, ɛ siga nanse matode yi, nabiin ba? N xa a fala ɛ xa, ɛ bata nde to naxan gbo nabiin xa.
42007027	Amasɔtɔ Kitabun bata Yoni a fe fala, a naxa, ‘Ala naxa: N nan n ma xɛraan nasigama nɛn i yɛɛ ra, a yi kirani tɔn i xa.’ ”
42007028	Yesu mɔn yi a fala, a naxa, “N xa a fala ɛ xa, muxun naxan birin bata bari a fɔlɔni, Yoni gbo ne birin xa. Koni naxan xurun e birin xa Alaa Mangayani, na gbo Yoni xa.”
42007029	Yamaan nun mudu maxinle yi Yesu xuiin mɛ, e yi Alaa tinxinyaan falan suxu, bayo Yoni bata yi ne rafu igeni e tubi xinla ma Ala ma.
42007030	Koni Farisi muxune nun sariya karamɔxɔne bata yi e mɛ Ala fe ragidixine ra. E mi tin Yoni xa e rafu igeni.
42007031	“Awa, to muxune, n na e misalima nanse ra iki? E nun nanse maliga?
42007032	E luxi nɛn alo diidin naxanye sabaan soma lɔxɔ tideni. Bonne a falama bonne xa, e naxa, ‘Nxu bata xulenna fe ɛ xa, koni ɛ mi ɛ bodon. Nxu yi binbi wuga sigin sa koni ɛ mi wuga!’
42007033	Yoni Marafu Tiin yi fa, a sunna suxu, a mi manpaan min, koni ɛ naxa, ‘Ɲinanna a fɔxɔ ra!’
42007034	N tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn yi fa, n donseen don, n yi n min, koni ɛ naxa ‘Xɛmɛni ito mato! Fudimaan nun dɔlɔ minna nan a ra! Mudu maxinle nun hakɛ kanne xɔyin nan a ra!’
42007035	Koni naxanye Alaa fe kolonna suxi, ne ɲɔndin yitama e kɛwanle xɔn ma nɛn.”
42007036	Farisi muxuna nde yi Yesu xili a konni, alogo a xa fa a dɛge a fɛma. Nanara, Yesu yi siga a banxini, a sa a dɛge a xɔn ma.
42007037	Ɲaxanla nde yi na taani, yalunden nan yi a ra. A yi a mɛ, a Yesu a dɛgema na Farisi muxun konni. Nanara, a fa alabasita gɛmɛn goronna latikɔnɔnna yi naxan kui.
42007038	A ti Yesu san xanbi ra, a wugama, a Yesu sanna makun a yɛɛgen na. Na xanbi ra, a yi a sanna masugusugu a xun sɛxɛn na, a yi a sanna sunbu, a latikɔnɔnna sugusugu a ma a binya feen na.
42007039	Farisi muxun naxan Yesu xili, na ito to waxatin naxan yi, a yi a miri a yɛtɛ ma, a naxa, “Xa nabiin nan yati yi xɛmɛni ito ra nun, a yi a kolonma nɛn nun, nde ɲaxanli ito ra naxan a yiin dinxi a ra. A yi a kolonma nɛn nun a ɲaxanli ito yulubin gbo!”
42007040	Yesu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Simɔn, n waxi a xɔn ma, n xa fena nde fala i xa.” A yi a yabi, a naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, awa, a fala n xa.”
42007041	Yesu naxa, “Xɛmɛ firin yi na nun naxanye gbetin doli gbeti kanna ma, kedenna yi kɛmɛ suulun tongo a yii, bonna yi tonge suulun tongo a yii.
42007042	E firinna sese mi a donla fi. Nama, a yi diɲa e firinna birin ma donle ma. Na muxu firinna, mundun a xanuma dangu a lanfaan na?”
42007043	Simɔn yi a yabi, a naxa, “N mirixi a ma, doli gbeen naxan ma.” Yesu naxa, “I bata a yabi ki faɲi.”
42007044	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi a yɛɛ rafindi ɲaxanla ma, a yi a fala Simɔn xa, a naxa, “I bata ɲaxanli ito to? N bata fa i ya banxini, i mi igen so n yii n yi n sanna maxa. Koni a tan bata n sanna maxa a yɛɛgen na, a yi a masugusugu a xun sɛxɛn na.
42007045	N fa waxatin naxan yi, i mi n nalan, koni xabu n fa a tan mi xadan n sanna sunbuɛ.
42007046	I mi turen so n yii n yi a sugusugu n xunna ra, koni a tan bata n sanna birin masugusugu latikɔnɔnna ra.
42007047	N na a falama i xa nɛn nayi, fa fala ɲaxanli ito yulubi wuyaxine birin bata mafelu bayo a bata xanuntenya gbeen yita n na. Koni naxan bata mafelu ndedi, na a xanuntenyaan mayitama nɛn ndedi.”
42007048	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi a fala ɲaxanla xa, a naxa, “I bata mafelu i yulubine ra.”
42007049	Muxun naxanye yi dɔxi na, ne yi a fala fɔlɔ e bode xa, e naxa, “Nde ito ra naxan yulubin mafeluma?”
42007050	Koni Yesu yi a fala ɲaxanla xa, a naxa, “I ya dɛnkɛlɛyaan bata i rakisi, siga bɔɲɛ xunbenli.”
42008001	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi siga taane nun banxidɛne yi, a sa Alaa Mangayaan Xibaru Faɲin kawandin ba e xa. Xarandii fu nun firinne yi siga a fɔxɔ ra,
42008002	e nun ɲaxanla ndee naxanye kɛndɛya ɲinan ɲaxine nun furene ma, ne nan xiliye itoe ra: Mariyama naxan xili Magadala kaana ɲinan solofere raxɛtɛ naxan fɔxɔ ra e nun
42008003	Yoyana Herode a tande kuntigin Kusa a ɲaxanla, e nun Susana e nun ɲaxalan gbɛtɛ wuyaxi. Ne nan yi Yesu nun a xarandiine malima e yɛtɛ yii seene ra.
42008004	Yama gbeen yi e malan a fɛma, taa wuyaxi muxune yi fa. A yi sandani ito sa e xa, a naxa,
42008005	“Xɛɛ biina nde yi mini, a siga a sansiin wolideni. A yi sansiin wolima waxatin naxan yi, ndee yi bira kiraan xɔn ma, yamaan yi dangu ne fari, xɔline yi e don.
42008006	Ndee yi bira fanyen ma, bɛndɛ gbee mi yi dɛnaxan yi. E to soli, e xara mafurɛn amasɔtɔ igen mi yi e bun ma.
42008007	Sansina ndee yi bira sɛxɛ ɲali kanne tagi e nun sɛxɛne yi gbo e bode xɔn ma, sɛxɛn yi e don.
42008008	Sansina ndee yi bira bɔxɔ faɲini, e soli, e bogi, e keden kedenna birin yi kɛmɛ sɔtɔ.” A yelinxi na falɛ, a yi a fala, a naxa, “Xa tunla naxan xɔn, a feen mɛ, na xa a tuli mati.”
42008009	Yesu a xarandiine yi a maxɔdin sandani ito bunna ma.
42008010	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Alaa Mangayaan wundo feene kolonna bata so ɛ yii, koni a falama bonne xa sandane nin alogo e xa e yɛɛn ti, koni e nama a yigbɛ, e yi e tuli mati, koni e nama a famu.”
42008011	Yesu naxa, “Sandani ito bunna nan ito ra. Sansina, Alaa falan nan na ra.
42008012	Sansiin naxanye bira kiraan xɔn ma, ne findixi muxune nan na naxanye Alaa falan mɛ koni Yinna Mangan Setana yi fa, a yi a ba e bɔɲɛni, alogo e nama dɛnkɛlɛya, e kisi.
42008013	Sansiin naxanye bira fanyen fari, ne findixi muxune nan na naxanye Alaa falan mɛ, e yi a suxu sɛwani, koni salen mi e bun ma. E dɛnkɛlɛya waxatidi tun, koni e na tɔrɔ waxatin naxan yi, e bama nɛn dɛnkɛlɛyani.
42008014	Sansiin naxanye bira sɛxɛ ɲali kanne tagi, ne findixi muxune nan na naxanye falan mɛ, koni dunuɲa xaminna nun nafulu feen nun yɛtɛ rafan feene yi e kala, e mi bogin nayi e mɔ hali!
42008015	Sansiin naxanye bira bɔxɔ faɲini, ne findixi muxune nan na naxanye Alaa falan mɛ, a lu e bɔɲɛni sɔbɛɛn na, e yi a suxu, e tunnafan han a bogi, a mɔ.”
42008016	“Muxu yo mi lɛnpun nadɛgɛ, a deben so a xun na, hanma a yi a raso saden bun ma, fɔ a xa a dɔxɔ se nan fari, alogo yamaan na so banxini waxatin naxan yi, e kɛnɛnna to.
42008017	Feen naxanye birin luxunxi, ne makɛnɛnma nɛn. Wundo feen birin kolonma nɛn, a yi mini kɛnɛnni.”
42008018	“Ɛ a liga ɛ yeren ma ɛ fe mɛ kiini, amasɔtɔ seen muxun naxan yii nde soma nɛn na yii, koni se mi muxun naxan yii hali a mirixi naxan di ma a yii, na bɛ a yii.”
42008019	Yesu nga nun a xunyɛne yi fa a fɛma, koni e mi nɔ a masɔtɛ, amasɔtɔ yamaan yi gbo.
42008020	E yi a fala Yesu xa, e naxa, “I nga nun i xunyɛne tixi tandeni, e waxi i to feni.”
42008021	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Naxanye Alaa falan namɛma, e yi a suxu, n nga nun n xunyɛne ne nan na.”
42008022	Lɔxɔna nde Yesu nun a xarandiine yi so kunkin kui, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “En dangu daraan bode fɔxɔn na.” Nayi, e siga.
42008023	E yi sigama waxatin naxan yi, Yesu yi xi kunkin kui. Foye gbeen yi keli daraan xun ma. Kunkin yi rafe fɔlɔ igen na, na yi magaxu han.
42008024	Xarandiine yi fa Yesu fɛma, e yi a raxulun, e naxa, “Nxu kanna, nxu kanna, nxu faxamaan ni i ra!” Yesu yi keli, a falan ti foyen nun igen mɔrɔnne xili ma, e yi e raxara.
42008025	A yi a fala a xarandiine xa, a naxa, “Ɛ mi dɛnkɛlɛyaxi ba?” Koni e kabɛ, e gaxu. E yi a fala e bode xa, e naxa, “Muxun sifan mundun ni ito ra? A bata igen nun foyen yamari, e yi a falan suxu ken!”
42008026	E dangu Gadara yamanani naxan Galile yamanan yɛtagi.
42008027	Yesu ti bɔxɔni waxatin naxan yi, muxuna nde yi fa a ralan keli na taani yinna ɲaxin yi a fɔxɔ ra. A bata yi bu a mi domaan nagodo a ma, a mi yi tinɲɛ dɔxɛ a konni fɔ a dɔxɔ bilingan yireni.
42008028	A to Yesu to, yinnan yi a rasɔnxɔ kati, a yi a sa Yesu bun ma, yinnan yi falan ti a xɔn a xui yitexin na, a naxa, “Yesu, Kore Xɔnna Alaa Dii Xɛmɛna, i waxi nanse xɔn ma n tan xa? Yandi, i nama n ɲaxankata!”
42008029	Amasɔtɔ Yesu bata yi yinna ɲaxin yamari a xa xɛtɛ xɛmɛn fɔxɔ ra, a bata yi naxan suxu xabu waxati xunkuye. E yi a yiine nun a sanne xidima yɔlɔnxɔnna nan na. Koni a yi a xidi seene bolonma nɛn, yinnan yi a rayaya ayi burunna ra.
42008030	Yesu yi yinnan maxɔdin, a naxa, “I xili di?” A yi a yabi, a naxa, “N xili nɛn ‘Ganla.’ ” Amasɔtɔ yinna wuyaxi bata bira a fɔxɔ ra.
42008031	Yinnane yi Yesu mafan a nama e rasiga yili ɲaxin na.
42008032	Xɔsɛ kuru gbeen yi na dɛxɔn ma nun, e yi e dɛgema geyaan na, yinnane yi Yesu mafan, a xa tin a yi e rasiga xɔsɛne fɔxɔ ra. A tin e xa.
42008033	Nanara, yinnane yi xɛtɛ xɛmɛn fɔxɔ ra, e siga xɔsɛne fɔxɔ ra. Xɔsɛ kurun yi godo a giyɛ geyaan na, e sa faxa darani.
42008034	Muxun naxanye yi xɔsɛne kantanma, ne to na feen to, e yi siga e giyɛ, e sa na feen xibarun nali taan nun banxidɛne yi.
42008035	Muxune yi siga na feen matodeni, e yi fa Yesu fɛma, e xɛmɛn li dɔxi a fɛma yinnane xɛtɛ naxan fɔxɔ ra, domaan nagodoxi a ma, a bata xaxinla sɔtɔ. E birin yi gaxu.
42008036	Yinnane xɛtɛ xɛmɛn fɔxɔ ra kii naxan yi, muxun naxanye na to, e na fala bonne xa.
42008037	Gadara kaane birin yi a fala Yesu xa, a xa siga amasɔtɔ e birin bata yi gaxu kati! Nanara, Yesu yi so kunkin kui, a siga.
42008038	Yinnane xɛtɛ xɛmɛn naxan fɔxɔ ra, na yi Yesu mafan, a naxa, “Tin n xa siga i fɔxɔ ra.” Koni Yesu yi a raxɛtɛ, a naxa,
42008039	“Siga i konni, Ala bata naxan liga i xa, i sa na yɛba.” Yesu naxan ligaxi a xa, a sa na rali taan birin ma.
42008040	Yesu xɛtɛ daraan bode fɔxɔn na waxatin naxan yi, yamaan yi a ralan amasɔtɔ e birin yi a legedenma.
42008041	Xɛmɛna nde yi fa naxan yi xili Yirusu, salide banxin kuntigin nan yi a ra. A yi bira Yesu sanna bun ma, a yi a mafan, a xa siga a konni
42008042	amasɔtɔ a dii tɛmɛ keden peen yi faxa feni. A sɔtɔn bata yi ɲɛɛ fu nun firin ti. Yesu sigama Yirusu fɔxɔ ra waxatin naxan yi, yamaan yi a yigbɛtɛn han!
42008043	Ɲaxanla nde yi na yi, ɲaxalan furen yi a ma xabu ɲɛɛ fu nun firin. A bata yi a yii seen birin so seribane yii, koni muxu yo mi nɔ a rakɛndɛyɛ.
42008044	A fa yamaan tagi Yesu xanbi ra, a yi a yiin din Yesu domaan dɛ kinkin na, a kɛndɛya mafurɛn!
42008045	Yesu yi maxɔdinna ti, a naxa, “Nde a yiin dinxi n na?” Muxun birin yi a tandi, koni Piyɛri yi a fala, a naxa, “N kanna, yamaan tixi i rabilinni, e bata i yigbɛtɛn.”
42008046	Koni Yesu naxa, “Muxuna nde bata a yiin din n na yati, n bata a kolon amasɔtɔ sɛnbɛna nde bata mini n yi.”
42008047	Ɲaxanla yi a to fa fala a bata mini kɛnɛnni. Nayi, a fa, a xuruxurunma, a yi a sa Yesu bun ma yamaan birin yɛtagi. A a yiin dinxi Yesu ra feen naxan ma, a na fala a xa, e nun a kɛndɛyaxi kii naxan yi mafurɛn!
42008048	Yesu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “N ma dii tɛmɛna, i ya dɛnkɛlɛyaan bata i rakɛndɛya. Siga bɔɲɛ xunbenli.”
42008049	Yesu na falama waxatin naxan yi, xɛraan yi fa sa keli salide banxin kuntigina banxini, a yi a fala Yirusu xa, a naxa, “I ya dii tɛmɛn bata faxa, i nama Karamɔxɔ tɔrɔ sɔnɔn.”
42008050	Yesu yi na mɛ, a yi a fala Yirusu xa, a naxa, “I nama gaxu, i dɛnkɛlɛya tun, a kɛndɛyama nɛn.”
42008051	Yesu na li waxatin naxan yi, a mi tin muxu yo xa so a fɔxɔ ra fɔ Piyɛri nun Yoni nun Yaki, e nun diidina nga nun a fafe.
42008052	Muxune birin yi wugama, e gbelegbelema diidina fe ra. Yesu naxa, “Ɛ nama wuga, diidin mi faxaxi, a xiin nɛn tun!”
42008053	E birin yi gele a ma amasɔtɔ e yi a kolon yati, fa fala diidin bata faxa!
42008054	Koni Yesu yi a suxu a yiin ma, a yi a xili, a naxa, “Diidina, keli!”
42008055	A niin yi xɛtɛ ayi, a keli mafurɛn! Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ donseen so a yii.”
42008056	A sɔtɔ muxune yi kabɛ, koni Yesu yi e maxadi, a naxa, “Feen naxan ligaxi, ɛ nama na fala muxu yo xa.”
42009001	Yesu yi a xarandii fu nun firinna xili, a sɛnbɛn so e yii alogo e xa ɲinanne kedi, e furetɔne rakɛndɛya.
42009002	A yi e rasiga, a e xa sa Alaa Mangayaan kawandin ba, e furetɔne rakɛndɛya.
42009003	A yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ nama siga sese ra ɛ yii sigatini. Ɛ nama siga dungari ra ɛ yii, ɛ nama siga bɔnduli ra ɛ yii, hanma donsena hanma gbetina. Ɛ nama siga doma firin na ɛ ma.
42009004	Ɛ na yigiya dɛnaxan yi, ɛ xa lu mɛnni han ɛ keli waxatini na taani.
42009005	Xa muxe mi ɛ yisuxu taan naxan yi, ɛ keli na taani, ɛ yi ɛ sanne rakunkun ɛ na gbangbanna ba ɛ sanne ra, na yi findi sereyaan na e xa.”
42009006	Xarandiine yi siga banxidɛne birin na, e sa Yesu a fe Xibaru Faɲin kawandin ba, e yamaan nakɛndɛya yiren birin yi.
42009007	Herode, Galile mangan yi feni itoe birin mɛ, a kuisan kati! Amasɔtɔ ndee naxa, “Yoni Marafu Tiin bata keli sayani!”
42009008	Bonne naxa, a Nabi Eli bata mini kɛnɛnni. Koni bonne naxa, a nabi fonna nde nan kelixi sayani.
42009009	Manga Herode naxa, “N bata yi Yoni xunna sɛgɛ a dɛ nun. Koni muxun mundun ito ra, n naxan ma fe mɛma?” Awa, a yi kata Yesu to feen na.
42009010	Xɛrane to xɛtɛ, e naxan birin liga, e na yɛba Yesu xa. A siga e ra a fɔxɔ ra a danna taana nde yi naxan xili Betasada.
42009011	Yamaan na mɛ waxatin naxan yi, e siga a fɔxɔ ra. A yi e yisuxu, a yi Alaa Mangayana fe fala e xa. Naxanye yi waxi kɛndɛyaan xɔn ma, a yi ne rakɛndɛya.
42009012	Sogen godo fɔlɔxina, xarandii fu nun firinne yi fa a fɛma, e naxa, “Yamaan beɲin alogo e xa nɔ sigɛ banxidɛne ra e nun xɛɛne ma naxanye en nabilinni, e yi donseen nun e yigiyaan sɔtɔ mɛnne yi, bayo en burunna nan na be.”
42009013	Koni Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ tan yɛtɛɛn xa donseen so e yii.” E yi a yabi, e naxa, “Naxan nxu yii, buru xun suulun e nun yɛxɛ firin. I waxi a xɔn ma nxu xa donseen sara yamani ito birin xa di?”
42009014	Xɛmɛne gbansanna, muxu wuli suulun ɲɔxɔn nan yi e ra. Yesu yi a fala a xarandiine xa, a naxa, “Ɛ yamaan nadɔxɔ tonge suulun suulun yɛɛn ma.”
42009015	Xarandiine yi na liga e yi e birin nadɔxɔ.
42009016	Yesu yi buru xun suulunne nun yɛxɛ firinne tongo, a yi a yɛɛn nate kore, a barikan bira Ala xa, a yi e yigira, a yi a so a xarandiine yii, e yi e yitaxun yamaan na.
42009017	E birin yi e dɛge, e lugo ken! Xarandiine yi deben fu nun firin nafe a dungi dɔnxɛne ra.
42009018	Lɔxɔna nde Yesu yi Ala maxandima a kedenna a xun xɔn ma, a xarandiine yi fa a fɛma, a yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, “Yamaan naxa, a nde n tan na?”
42009019	E yi a yabi, e naxa, “Ndee naxa, a Yoni Marafu Tiin nan i tan na. Ndee naxa, a Nabi Eli nan i tan na, koni ndee fan naxa, a nabi fonna nde nan kelixi sayani.”
42009020	Yesu mɔn yi e maxɔdin, a naxa, “Ɛ tan go, ɛ naxa a nde n tan na?” Piyɛri yi a yabi, a naxa, “Alaa Muxu Sugandixin nan i tan na!”
42009021	Awa, Yesu yi a xarandiine yamari, a e nama na fala muxu yo xa.
42009022	A mɔn yi falan ti, a naxa, “A fɛrɛ mi na fɔ n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn xa tɔrɔ wuyaxi sɔtɔ. Yamaan fonne nun saraxarali kuntigine nun sariya karamɔxɔne e mɛma n na nɛn, e yi n faxa, a soge saxandeni n keli sayani.”
42009023	A yi a fala e birin xa, a naxa, “Xa muxu yo waxi bira feni n tan fɔxɔ ra, fɔ a xa a mɛ a yɛtɛ ra, a yi a faxa wudin tongo lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ, a bira n fɔxɔ ra.
42009024	Amasɔtɔ naxan na wa a niin nakisi feni, a bɔnɔma ayi nɛn. Koni naxan bɔnɔma a niini n tan ma fe ra, na kisima nɛn.
42009025	Hali muxun dunuɲa birin sɔtɔ, koni xa a bɔnɔ a niini habadan, na nanse fanma a ma?
42009026	Xa muxun yagi a tiyɛ n tan nun n ma fe falana fe ra, Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn fan yagima nɛn na kanna fe ra a na fa a binyeni waxatin naxan yi e nun a Fafe Alaa binyena e nun maleka sariɲanxine.
42009027	N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, ndee be, ne mi faxɛ fɔ e Alaa Mangayaan to.”
42009028	Yesu yelin feni itoe falɛ waxatin naxan yi, lɔxɔ xun keden ɲɔxɔn danguxina, a Piyɛri nun Yoni nun Yaki tongo, e siga a fɔxɔ ra geyaan fari Ala maxandideni.
42009029	A yi Ala maxandima waxatin naxan yi, a yɛtagin kɛɲaan yi masara, a domaan yi fixa ayi alo kuyen na a ɲinna masɔxɔn!
42009030	Na waxatini, muxu firin yi mini kɛnɛnni, Nabi Musa nun Nabi Eli, e falan ti a xa.
42009031	E yi nɔrɔxi. E yi Yesu faxa feen fala a xa naxan yi kamalima Yerusalɛn taani.
42009032	Piyɛri nun a lanfane yi xima, koni e xulun, e Yesu a nɔrɔn to e nun xɛmɛ firin yi tixi a dɛxɔn ma.
42009033	Na muxune kelima Yesu fɛma waxatin naxan yi, Piyɛri yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Nxu kanna, a lanxi bayo nxu be yi. Nxu xa gage saxan ti be yi, i gbeen keden, Nabi Musa gbeen keden, Nabi Eli gbeen keden.” A mi yi a kolon a naxan falama.
42009034	A falan tima waxatin naxan yi, kundaan yi godo e xun ma, xarandiine yi gaxu.
42009035	Fala xuiin yi keli kundani, a naxa, “N ma Dii Xɛmɛn nan ito ra, n bata naxan sugandi, ɛ tuli mati a xuiin na!”
42009036	Fala xuiin dan waxatin naxan yi, Yesu keden peen yi lu na yi. Xarandiine yi e dundu feni ito birin ma, e feen naxanye toxi, e mi ne fala muxu yo xa na waxatini.
42009037	Na xɔtɔn bode e godo keli geyaan fari, yama gbeen yi Yesu ralan.
42009038	Xɛmɛn yi a xuini te yamaan tagi, a naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, n ni i mafanma, i xa n ma dii xɛmɛ keden peen mato.
42009039	Yinnan na keli a ra, a gbelegbelema nɛn mafurɛn, a xuruxurun, a yi a rabira, a dɛ xunfanna yi lu minɛ, a mi a beɲinma xulɛn fɔ a na a tɔrɔ kati!
42009040	N bata i ya xarandiine mafan, alogo e xa a kedi a fɔxɔ ra, koni e mi nɔxi a kedɛ.”
42009041	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “Ee! Ɛ tan dɛnkɛlɛyatarene nun tinxintarene, n xa lu ɛ fɛma han waxatin mundun yi? N diɲama ɛ xa han waxatin mudun yi?” A yi a fala xɛmɛn xa, a naxa, “Fa i ya diin na be.”
42009042	Diidin fama waxatin naxan yi, yinnan yi a raxuruxurun, a yi a rabira bɔxɔni. Yesu yi falan ti yinna ɲaxin xili ma, a diidin nakɛndɛya, a yi a so a fafe yii mɔn.
42009043	Muxune birin yi kabɛ Ala sɛnbɛn ma. Yesu feen naxan birin liga, yamaan yi lu kabɛ ne ma, a yi a fala a xarandiine xa na waxatini, a naxa,
42009044	“N naxan falama ɛ xa, ɛ nama ɲinan na xɔn ma! N tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn soma nɛn yamaan yii n lu e sɛnbɛn bun ma.”
42009045	Koni e mi ito bunna kolon. A bata luxun e ma alogo e nama a bayen kolon. E mɔn yi gaxu a maxɔdinɲɛ na feen na.
42009046	Falan yi keli xarandiine tagi fa fala nde gbo dangu e birin na.
42009047	E yi mirixi naxan ma, Yesu na kolon. Nanara, a yi diidina nde tongo, a yi a ti a dɛxɔn ma.
42009048	A yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Naxan na diidini ito yisuxu n xinli, na bata n fan yisuxu. Naxan na n tan yisuxu, na bata na kanni suxu naxan n xɛxi. Amasɔtɔ naxan xurun ɛ birin tagi, na nan gbo ɛ birin xa.”
42009049	Yoni yi falan ti, a naxa, “Nxu kanna, nxu bata xɛmɛna nde to ɲinanne kedɛ i xinli, nxu yi a raxɔlɔ, a xa a lu amasɔtɔ a mi en tan fɔxɔ ra.”
42009050	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ nama a raxɔlɔ amasɔtɔ naxan mi kelixi ɛ xili ma, na ɛ xa nɛn.”
42009051	Yesu siga waxatin masoxina ariyanna yi, a yi a ragidi a xa siga Yerusalɛn taani.
42009052	A xɛrane rasiga a yɛɛ ra Samariya taana nde yi, alogo e xa sa feene yitɔn a yɛɛ ra.
42009053	Koni muxun naxanye na yi, ne mi a yisuxu amasɔtɔ e a kolon, a a sigama Yerusalɛn taan nin.
42009054	A xarandiine, Yaki nun Yoni na to waxatin naxan yi, e naxa, “Marigina, i waxi a xɔn ma ba, nxu xa tɛɛn yamari keli kore xɔnna ma, a yi itoe halagi?”
42009055	Yesu yi a yɛɛ rafindi e ma, a yi e maxadi.
42009056	E yi siga taa gbɛtɛ yi.
42009057	E yi kira yi waxatin naxan yi, xɛmɛna nde yi a fala Yesu xa, a naxa, “I siga dɛdɛ, n sigɛ i fɔxɔ ra.”
42009058	Yesu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Xulumaseene xima yinle nan na, xɔline yi e tɛɛn sa, koni hali n na n xunna sama dɛnaxan yi, na mi n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn yii.”
42009059	A yi a fala xɛmɛna nde xa, a naxa, “Bira n fɔxɔ ra.” Koni na xɛmɛn yi a fala, a naxa, “N Marigina, tin n xa sa n fafe maluxun singen.”
42009060	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “A lu faxa muxune xa e faxa muxune maluxun. I tan xa sa Alaa Mangayana fe Xibarun nali.”
42009061	Gbɛtɛ fan yi a fala, a naxa, “N kanna, n birama nɛn i fɔxɔ ra, koni tin n xa sa n ɲungu n kon kaane ma singen.”
42009062	Yesu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Muxu yo ɲinge kenna suxu, a lu a xanbi ratoɛ, na mi daxa a wali Alaa Mangayani.”
42010001	Na xanbi ra, Marigin yi muxu tonge solofere e nun firin gbɛtɛye yɛba. A yi e rasiga firin firin yɛɛn ma a yɛɛ ra taan birin yi e nun yiren birin a tan yɛtɛɛn yi lan a xa siga dɛnaxanye yi.
42010002	A yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Malo xaba daxin gbo koni a xaba muxune mi wuya. Ɛ xɛɛ kanna mafan, a xa walikɛna ndee rasiga e sa maala xaba.
42010003	Ɛ siga, n bata ɛ xɛ alo yɛxɛɛne kankone tagi.
42010004	Ɛ nama siga gbeti ra, ɛ nama bɛnbɛlidi xali, ɛ nama sankidi xali. Ɛ nama bu muxune xɔntɔndeni kira yi.
42010005	Ɛ na so banxin naxan kui, ɛ xa a fala singen, ɛ naxa, ‘Ala xa bɔɲɛ xunbenla lu banxini ito kui.’
42010006	Xa bɔɲɛ xunbeli muxuna nde na, na duban xa lu a xɔn ma. Xa na mi a ra, na duban mɔn xa xɛtɛ ɛ tan ma.
42010007	Ɛ xa yigiya banxi kedenna nan kui. E na naxan so ɛ yii, ɛ xa na don, ɛ yi ɛ min, amasɔtɔ walikɛɛn lan nɛn a yi a saranna sɔtɔ. Ɛ nama lu sigamatini keli banxini ito yi, siga ito yi.
42010008	Ɛ na so taan naxan yi, xa e ɛ yisuxu, e na naxan so ɛ yii, ɛ na don.
42010009	Ɛ xa furetɔne yiyalan na taani, ɛ yi a fala na muxune xa, ɛ naxa, ‘Alaa Mangayaan bata maso ɛ ra.’
42010010	Koni ɛ na siga taan naxan yi, xa e mi ɛ yisuxu na yi, ɛ siga yamaan malandeni, ɛ yi a fala e xa, ɛ naxa,
42010011	‘Hali ɛ taan gbangbanna naxan nxu sanna ra, nxu bata na rakunkun ɛ xili ma, koni ɛ xa a kolon Alaa Mangayaan bata maso!’
42010012	N xa a fala ɛ xa, Kiti Sa Lɔxɔni Ala xɔlɔma nɛn na taan ma dangu Sodoma taan na!”
42010013	“Gbalon Korasin kaane yɛɛ ra! Gbalon Betasada kaane fan yɛɛ ra, bayo kabanako feen naxanye liga ɛ tagi, xa ne yi liga Tire taan nun Sidɔn taani nun, na kaane yi tinxinma ayi nɛn nun, to mi na ra, e bɛnbɛli dugin nagodo e ma, e yi xuben so e yɛtɛ ma, e yi a yita fa fala e bata e xun xanbi so e hakɛne yi!
42010014	Ala kininkininma nɛn Tire taan nun Sidɔn taan ma Kiti Sa Lɔxɔni dangu ɛ tan na.
42010015	Ɛ tan Kapɛrunan kaane, ɛ tema nɛn kore xɔnna ma ba? Ɛn-ɛn, ɛ godon laxira yi!”
42010016	Yesu yi a fala a xarandiine xa, a naxa, “Naxan na a tuli mati ɛ xuiin na, na kanna bata a tuli mati n fan xuiin na. Naxan na a mɛ ɛ ra, na kanna bata a mɛ n fan na. Naxan na a mɛ n tan na, na kanna bata a mɛ n xɛ muxun fan na.”
42010017	Na muxu tonge solofere e nun firinna yi xɛtɛ sɛwa gbeeni. E yi a fala, e naxa, “Marigina, hali ɲinanne nxu xuiin namɛ nɛn i xinli!”
42010018	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “N bata Setana to birɛ keli kore xɔnna ma alo galanna.
42010019	A mato, n bata sɛnbɛn fi ɛ ma ɛ sigan ti saɲine nun tanle fari e nun yaxun Setana sɛnbɛn fari, na sese mi ɛ maxɔlɛ.
42010020	Koni ɛ nama sɛwa tun, fa fala ɲinanne bata ɛ fala xuiin suxu, koni ɛ sɛwa amasɔtɔ ɛ xinla bata sɛbɛ ariyanna yi.”
42010021	Na waxatini, Yesu yi lugo sɛwan na Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin xɔn ma, a naxa, “N Fafe, kore xɔnna nun dunuɲa Marigina! N barikan birama i xa bayo i feen naxanye luxunxi xaxilimane nun fekolonne ma, i bata ne yita diidine ra. N Fafe, a rafanxi i ma na kii nin.”
42010022	“N Fafe bata feen birin taxu n na. Muxu yo mi Dii Xɛmɛn kolon fɔ a fafe Ala. Muxu yo mi Fafe Ala kolon fɔ a Dii Xɛmɛna e nun a Dii Xɛmɛn waxi a xɔn ma a xa a yita naxanye ra.”
42010023	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi a yɛɛ rafindi a xarandiine ma, a yi a fala e xa wundoni, a naxa, “Sɛwan na kanne xa naxanye yɛɛn feen toma ɛ naxan toma.
42010024	Amasɔtɔ n xa a fala ɛ xa, nabi wuyaxi nun manga wuyaxi yi waxi a to feni ɛ naxan toma, koni e mi a to, e mi a mɛ ɛ naxan mɛma.”
42010025	Awa, na waxatini Sariya karamɔxɔna nde yi fa Yesu bunbadeni, a yi a maxɔdin, a naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, n nanfe ligɛ n habadan nii rakisin sɔtɔ?”
42010026	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “Sariya Kitabun nanfe falaxi? I a xaranma di?”
42010027	Xɛmɛn yi a yabi, a naxa, “ ‘I xa i Marigina Ala xanu i bɔɲɛn birin na, e nun i niin birin na e nun i sɛnbɛn birin na e nun i xaxinla birin na’ e nun ‘i yi i adamadi boden xanu alo i yɛtɛna.’ ”
42010028	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “I ya falan tinxin. I xa na liga, i niin kisima nɛn.”
42010029	Koni Sariya karamɔxɔn yi waxi a xɔn ma nɛn, a xa yoon sɔtɔ a yɛtɛ xa. Nanara, a Yesu maxɔdin, a naxa, “N adamadi bodena nde ra?”
42010030	Yesu yi sandan sa a xa, a naxa, “Xɛmɛna nde yi keli Yerusalɛn taani siga Yeriko yi, muxu mafune yi a suxu, e yi a bɔnbɔ, a lu ndedi e xa a faxa.
42010031	A mi bu saraxaralina nde yi fa na kiraan xɔn ma, a na xɛmɛn to waxatin naxan yi, a dangu a ra bode fɔxɔn na.
42010032	Lewi bɔnsɔnna muxuna nde fan yi fa, a xɛmɛn to, a dangu a dɛxɔn ma.
42010033	Koni Samariya kaana nde dangumatɔɔn na a ra, na kiraan xɔn ma, na yi a li na, a to a to, a kininkinin a ma kati!
42010034	A siga a fɛma, a turen nun manpaan sa a maxɔlɔdene dɛ, a yi e maxidi. Na xanbi ra, a xɛmɛn sa a soon fari, a siga a ra xɔɲɛ yigiya banxini a dandandeni.
42010035	Na xɔtɔn bode, a gbeti gbanan firin tongo, a yi a so xɔɲɛ yigiya banxin kanna yii. A yi a fala a xa, a naxa, ‘A dandan, n na xɛtɛ waxatin naxan yi, i naxan yo baxi a fe ra, n na a raxɛtɛ i ma.’ ”
42010036	Yesu yelinxi na sandan sɛ, a yi a maxɔdin, a naxa, “I tan yɛɛ ra yi, na muxu saxanne yɛ, muxu mafune xɛmɛn naxan bɔnbɔxi, nde na adamadi bode kɛndɛn na?”
42010037	Sariya karamɔxɔn yi a yabi, a naxa, “Naxan kininkininxi a ma.” Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “Siga, i sa na ɲɔxɔnna liga.”
42010038	Yesu nun a xarandiine yi sigama waxatin naxan yi, e taana nde li, ɲaxanla nde yi na yi, a xili Marata, na yi a yigiya a banxini.
42010039	A xunyɛ ɲaxalanmaan xili Mariyama, na yi dɔxɔ Marigin dɛxɔn ma, a yi a tuli mati a xaranna ra.
42010040	Marata yi xaminxi wali wuyaxi kɛ feen na. Nanara, a fa a fala Marigin xa, a naxa, “Marigina n xunyɛn bata wanla birin lu n yii, i ya fe mi na yi ba? A fala a xa, a xa fa n mali!”
42010041	Marigin yi a yabi, a naxa, “Ee! Marata, i xaminxi, i kɔntɔfilixi fe wuyaxi ra.
42010042	Koni adamadiin makoon se keden peen nan ma. Mariyama bata wa fe faɲin xɔn. Na mi fa bɛ a yii!”
42011001	Lɔxɔna nde, Yesu yi Ala maxandima yirena nde yi. A yelin waxatin naxan yi, a xarandii keden yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Marigina, nxu xaran Ala maxandɛ alo Yoni a xarandiine xaran kii naxan yi.”
42011002	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ Ala maxandima ikiini, ɛ naxa, ‘Nxu Fafe, i xinla xa sariɲan, i ya Mangayaan xa fa.
42011003	I xa nxɔ lɔxɔ yo lɔxɔ balon fi nxu ma.
42011004	I xa nxu mafelu nxu yulubine ra, alo nxu fan bata nxu hakɛ tongone mafelu kii naxan yi. I nama tin nxu xa bira tantanni.’ ”
42011005	Yesu yi a fala a xarandiine xa, a naxa, “Xa ɛ tan nde keden siga a xɔyin fɛma kɔɛ tagini, a yi a fala a xa, a naxa, ‘N xɔyina, n doli buru xun saxan yi
42011006	amasɔtɔ n lanfaan naxan sa sigatini, na bata fa iki sasa, koni sese mi n yii n naxan soɛ a yii!’
42011007	Koni xa bonna a yabi banxini, a naxa, ‘I nama n tɔrɔ! Dɛɛn balanxi, nxu nun n ma diine bata nxu sa, n mi fa nɔɛ kelɛ, n sena nde so i yii.’
42011008	Awa, n xa a fala ɛ xa, hali xa a mi keli e xɔyiyana fe ra, a burun so a yii, koni a kelɛ, a makoon seen naxan birin ma, a na so a yii amasɔtɔ a mi yagixi a xandɛ.
42011009	Awa, n xa a fala ɛ xa, ɛ seen maxɔdin, ɛ a sɔtɔma nɛn, ɛ seen fen, ɛ a toma nɛn, ɛ dɛɛn kɔnkɔn, a rabima ɛ xa nɛn.
42011010	Amasɔtɔ naxan yo na seen maxɔdin, na a sɔtɔma nɛn. Naxan na seen fen, na a toma nɛn. Naxan na dɛɛn kɔnkɔn, a rabima a xa nɛn.
42011011	Muxuna nde ɛ yɛ ba, naxan ma diin yɛxɛn maxandima a ra, a yi saɲin so a yii?
42011012	Hanma a na a xandi tɔxɛ xɛlɛni, a yi tanla so a yii?
42011013	Hali ɛ to findixi muxu ɲaxine ra, ɛ a kolon fa fala a lan nɛn, ɛ xa se faɲin so ɛ diine yii. E faxi fa, ɛ Fafe naxan ariyanna yi, na a Nii Sariɲanxin fima a maxandi muxune ma kii naxan yi!”
42011014	Lɔxɔna nde Yesu yi ɲinanna raxɛtɛ bobon fɔxɔ ra. Ɲinanna xɛtɛ xɛmɛn fɔxɔ ra waxatin naxan yi, a falan ti fɔlɔ, yamaan yi kabɛ.
42011015	Koni e ndee naxa, “A ɲinanne kedima Ɲinan Mangan Bɛlɛsɛbu barakan nin.”
42011016	Bonne yi waxi a xɔn ma e xa a kɛɲaan fɛsɛfɛsɛ. Nanara, e yi a maxɔdin a a xa kabanako fena nde liga, naxan kelixi Ala ma.
42011017	Koni Yesu yi e miriyaan kolon, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Yamanan naxan yitaxunxi yɛngɛni, na yamanan kalama nɛn mafurɛn! Yɛngɛn tanden naxan kui, na fan kalama nɛn.
42011018	Awa, xa Setanaa mangayana a yɛtɛ yɛngɛ, a sabatima nayi di? Ɛ bata a fala, a n bata ɲinanne kedi Bɛlɛsɛbu barakani.
42011019	Xa n ɲinanne kedima Bɛlɛsɛbu barakan nin, ɛ fɔxɔrabirane e kedima nanse xɔn nayi? Na ma, ɛ fɔxɔrabirane a yitama nɛn nayi fa fala yo mi ɛ xa!
42011020	Xa n ɲinanne kedima Ala sɛnbɛn barakan nin, na a yitama nɛn nayi fa fala Alaa Mangayaan bata ɛ li.”
42011021	“Sɛnbɛmaan na a yitɔn yɛngɛ so xinla ma, a yi a banxin kantan, a seene birin natangama nɛn.
42011022	Koni xa sɛnbɛ kanna nde baga a ma, a yi a nɔ, a sigama a yɛngɛ so seene birin na nɛn nayi, a yigi saxi naxanye fari, seen naxanye a yii, a yi ne yitaxun.”
42011023	“Naxan mi n tan fɔxɔ ra, na bata keli n xili ma. Nxu nun naxanye mi malanma, ne sigama ayi nɛn.”
42011024	Yesu naxa, “Yinna ɲaxin na xɛtɛ muxun fɔxɔ ra, a sigama yire yixaren nin, a sa a matabuden fen. Xa a mi yire yo to, a a mirima nɛn nayi, a naxa, ‘N kelixi dɛnaxan yi, n mɔn xa xɛtɛ na.’
42011025	Nanara, a na xɛtɛ na, xa a li na makɔxi, a yitɔnxi,
42011026	nayi a sigama nɛn, a sa fa yinna ɲaxi solofere gbɛtɛye ra naxanye ɲaxu dangu a tan na. Ne yi lu a fɛma. Na muxuna fe raɲanna ɲaxuma ayi nɛn dangu a fɔlɔn na.”
42011027	Yesu ito fala waxatin naxan yi, ɲaxanla nde yi falan ti a xa yamaan yɛ, a naxa, “Ɲaxanla naxan i sɔtɔxi, a yi i maxuru, muxu sɛwaxin nan na ra!”
42011028	Koni Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “Naxan dangu na ra, muxu sɛwaxin nan ne ra naxanye Alaa falan mɛma, e yi a suxu ken!”
42011029	Yamaan malan Yesu fɛma waxatin naxan yi, a yi a fala, a naxa, “Iki muxune findixi muxu ɲaxine nan na, ɛ to n maxɔdinma kabanako taxamasenna ma. Koni ɛ mi kabanako fe yo toɛ ba Nabi Yunusaa taxamasenna ra.
42011030	Nabi Yunusa findi taxamasenna ra kii naxan yi Niniwa kaane xa, n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn findima taxamasenna ra na kii nin iki muxune xa.
42011031	Ɲaxalan Mangan naxan keli sogeteden yiifanna ma, na tima nɛn Kiti Sa Lɔxɔni, a yi iki muxune yalagi bayo a kelixi bɔxɔn danna nan na, a fa a tuli mati Sulemani a fekolonna falan na. Awa, n xa a fala ɛ xa, naxan gbo dangu Sulemani ra, na be yi.
42011032	Niniwa kaane tima nɛn Kiti Sa Lɔxɔni, e yi ɛ yalagi amasɔtɔ ne Yunusa a kawandin mɛ waxatin naxan yi, e xun xanbi so nɛn e hakɛne yi. Koni n xa a fala ɛ xa, nde be naxan gbo Yunusa xa!”
42011033	Yesu naxa, “Muxu yo mi lɛnpun nadɛgɛma, a yi a luxun hanma a yi a raso deben bun ma, koni a dɔxɔma seen nan fari alogo yamaan na so banxini, e xa kɛnɛnna to.
42011034	I yɛɛn luxi nɛn alo lɛnpuna i fati bɛndɛn xa. Xa i yɛɛn kɛndɛ, i fatin birin luma nɛn kɛnɛnni, koni xa i yɛɛn kala, i fatin luma nɛn dimini.
42011035	A liga i yeren ma nayi, kɛnɛnna naxan i yi, na nama findi dimin na.
42011036	Xa i fatin kɛnɛnni, dimi yo mi a yi, a birin dɛgɛma nɛn alo lɛnpun dɛgɛma kii naxan yi.”
42011037	Yesu yelin falan tiyɛ waxatin naxan yi, Farisi muxuna nde yi a xili, a a xa sa a dɛge a konni. Nanara, a so, a dɔxɔ a dɛgedeni.
42011038	Farisi muxuna a to waxatin naxan yi, a Yesu mi a yiin naxaxi lan e dinan kiin ma benun a xa a dɛge, a kabɛ.
42011039	Nanara, Marigin yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Ɛ tan Farisi muxune, ɛ igelengenna nun donse sa seen fanna maxama, koni ɛ kuiin nafexi muxu seen nun fe ɲaxin na.
42011040	Ɛ tan daxune! Xa Ala nan seen fanna daxi, a tan xa mi a kuiin fan daxi ba?
42011041	Koni naxan ɛ donse don goronna kui, ɛ xa na so yiigelitɔne yii, seen birin sariɲanma nɛn na yi.”
42011042	“Ɛ tan Farisi muxune, gbalona ɛ yɛɛ ra! Amasɔtɔ ɛ nakɔ yi seene yaganna bama, alo sorontonna nun sabi gbɛtɛye, koni ɛ bata ɛ mɛ tinxinyaan nun Alaa xanuntenyana fe ra. A lan nɛn ɛ xa ne nan liga, e nun yagan baana.”
42011043	“Gbalona ɛ xa, ɛ tan Farisi muxune, amasɔtɔ dɔxɔde faɲin nafan ɛ ma salide banxine yi, binye xɔntɔnne rafan ɛ ma lɔxɔ tideni.
42011044	Gbalona ɛ xa! Amasɔtɔ ɛ ligaxi nɛn alo gaburu fonna. Yamaan sigan tima a fari, e mi a kolon.”
42011045	Sariya karamɔxɔ keden yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, i naxan falama ito ra, i nxu fan nafɛyama nɛn nayi!”
42011046	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “Gbalona ɛ xa, ɛ tan sariya karamɔxɔne! Amasɔtɔ ɛ goronna sama yamaan xun ma naxan binya kati, koni ɛ tan yɛtɛɛn mi ɛ yii dinɲɛ a ra hali, ɛ yi e mali a tongɛ.
42011047	Gbalona ɛ xa! Ɛ bata gaburu faɲine rafala nabine xa, ɛ benbane nabiin naxanye faxa yati!
42011048	Ɛ benbane naxan liga, ɛ yɛtɛɛn bata tin, ɛ bata a mayita amasɔtɔ e nabine faxa nɛn, ɛ tan bata gaburune yitɔn mɔn.
42011049	Nanara, en bata Ala xaxinla to, a naxa, ‘N nabine nun xɛrane rasigama e ma nɛn, e ndee faxama nɛn, e yi ndee bɛsɛnxɔnya.’
42011050	Nanara, iki muxune saranma na nabine birin faxa feen nan na xabu dunuɲa da waxatini,
42011051	fɔlɔ Habila saya feen ma han sa dɔxɔ Sakari saya feen ma, e naxan faxa saraxa ganden nun yire sariɲanxin tagi. N xa a fala ɛ xa, na feene xɛtɛma nɛn iki muxune ma.”
42011052	“Gbalona ɛ xa, ɛ tan sariya karamɔxɔne, amasɔtɔ ɛ bata dɛɛn ɲinna mara naxan xaxilimaya banxin dɛɛn nabima, ɛ tan yɛtɛɛn mi soɛ. Naxanye waxi so feni, ɛ bata ne raxɛtɛ!”
42011053	Yesu keli na yi waxatin naxan yi, sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxune yi a yigbɛtɛn fɔlɔ, e yi a yɛ mɔ ayi kati! E yi a maxɔdin fe wuyaxi ma amasɔtɔ
42011054	e yi waxi a xɔn ma, e xa a suxu feni tɔn a falana fe ra.
42012001	Muxu wuli wuyaxi e malan waxatin naxan yi han e lu tiyɛ e bode ma, Yesu yi falan ti a xarandiine singe xa, a naxa, “Ɛ a liga ɛ yeren ma Farisi muxune buru rate sena fe yi, naxan findixi e nafigiyaan na.
42012002	Feen naxan luxunxi na minima nɛn kɛnɛnni, wundo feen birin kolonma nɛn.
42012003	Nanara, ɛ bata naxan fala dimini, na mɛma nɛn kɛnɛnni. Ɛ bata naxan birin kɔyɛkɔyɛn muxune xa konkoni, ne ralima nɛn taa tagini kɛnɛnni.”
42012004	“N xɔyine, n xa a fala ɛ xa, ɛ nama gaxu ne yɛɛ ra naxanye fati bɛndɛn faxama koni e mi nɔɛ fefe ligɛ dangu na ra.
42012005	Ɛ gaxuma naxan yɛɛ ra, n na yitama ɛ ra nɛn: ɛ xa gaxu Ala yɛɛ ra, sɛnbɛna a yii, a na i faxa waxatin naxan yi, na xanbi ra a yi i rasiga yahannama yi. N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, ɛ xa gaxu na nan yɛɛ ra!”
42012006	“Xɔlidi suulun mi sarɛ gbanan firin na ba? Koni hali na keden, Ala mi ɲinanɲɛ a xɔn ma.
42012007	Hali ɛ xun sɛxɛn keden kedenne, Ala a xasabin birin kolon. Nanara, ɛ nama gaxu, ɛ dangu xɔlidi wuyaxin na!”
42012008	“N xa a fala ɛ xa, naxan yo na a ti n ma fe ra yamaan yɛtagi, n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn fan na ɲɔxɔnna ligama nɛn a xa Alaa malekane yɛtagi.
42012009	Koni naxan yo na a mɛ n na yamaan yɛtagi, n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn fan n mɛma a ra nɛn Alaa malekane yɛtagi.”
42012010	“Naxan na n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn nayelefu, na mafeluma nɛn. Koni naxan na Alaa Nii Sariɲanxin nayelefu, na mi mafeluyɛ mumɛ!”
42012011	“E na siga ɛ ra salide banxin yɛtagi waxatin naxan yi, e yi ɛ yigbɛtɛn, hanma mangane yɛtagi hanma kuntigine yɛtagi, ɛ nama xamin ɛ xɔn ba feen na hanma ɛ naxan falama.
42012012	Amasɔtɔ ɛ naxan falama Alaa Nii Sariɲanxina ɛ xaranma nɛn na ra na waxatin yɛtɛni.”
42012013	Muxuna nde yi a fala a xa yamaan tagi, a naxa, “Karamɔxɔ, a fala ngaxakedenna xa, nxu fafe nafunla naxan lu nxu yii, a xa a yitaxun, a yi n gbeen so n yii.”
42012014	Yesu yi a yabi, a naxa, “Ee! I tan! Nde n findixi kiti bolonna ra hanma se taxun na muxu firinna tagi?”
42012015	Na xanbi ra, a yi a fala e birin xa, a naxa, “Ɛ a liga ɛ yeren ma milana fe yi amasɔtɔ muxun findi nafulu kanna ra ki ki a mi nɔɛ luyɛ a siini a nafunla fe ra.”
42012016	Awa, Yesu yi sandani ito sa e xa, a naxa, “Bɔxɔna nde yi nafulu kanna nde yii nun naxan sise yi sabatima kati!
42012017	A yi a miri a yɛtɛ ma, a naxa, ‘Yire mi n yii, n na n ma siseene ramarɛ dɛnaxan yi. N nanfe ligama nayi?’
42012018	A yi a miri a yɛtɛ ma, a naxa, ‘N naxan ligama na ni ito ra. N na n ma se ramara banxine kalama nɛn, n yi nde gbɛtɛye ti naxanye gbo dangu a fonne ra. N yi n ma maala nun n yii seene ramara na yi.
42012019	Na xanbi ra, n na a falɛ nɛn n yɛtɛ ma, n naxa, n makoon seen naxan birin ma ɲɛɛ wuyaxi bun ma, n bata ne sɔtɔ. N xa n dɛge ki faɲi, n yi n min, n yi n yɛtɛ rasɛwa.’
42012020	Koni Ala yi a fala a xa, a naxa, ‘I tan daxuna, to kɔɛɛn na ɛ nun i niin fatama nɛn, na xanbi ra i bata seen naxan birin namara i yɛtɛ xa, ne findima nde gbee ra?’ ”
42012021	Yesu naxa, “A na kii nin ɛ birin xa naxanye nafunla malanma ɛ yɛtɛ xa, koni nafulu kan mi ɛ ra Ala yɛɛ ra yi.”
42012022	Na xanbi ra, Yesu yi a fala a xarandiine xa, a naxa, “Nanara, n na a falama ɛ xa, ɛ nama kɔntɔfili ɛ dunuɲa yi gidina fe ra, ɛ naxan donma hanma ɛ ɛ maxidima naxan yi.
42012023	Amasɔtɔ niin dangu donseen na, fati bɛndɛn dangu dugin na pon!
42012024	Ɛ xɔline mato, e mi sese sima, e mi sese xabama, donse ramarade mi e yii, koni Ala e baloma. Ɛ tan dangu xɔline ra pon!
42012025	Ɛ tan nde nɔɛ waxatidi sɛ a yɛtɛ siin fari xaminna fe ra ba?
42012026	Xa ɛ mi nɔɛ fe xuridine ligɛ, nanfera ɛ xaminma a dɔnxɛne fe ra nayi?
42012027	Ɛ wudi fuge faɲine gbo kii mato. E mi walima, e mi dugi rafalama e yɛtɛ xa, koni n xa a fala ɛ xa, hali Manga Sulemani e nun a nɔrɔn birin yi, a mi marabɛri ba alo e tan nde.
42012028	Ala nan sɛxɛne marabɛri bama naxanye be yi to, tila a ganma nɛn, a ɲan fefe! A mi ɛ marabɛri bɛ dangu ne ra ba? Ɛ dɛnkɛlɛyaan xurun.
42012029	Nanara, ɛ nama kɔntɔfili sena fe ra ɛ naxan donma e nun ɛ naxan minma.
42012030	Amasɔtɔ dunuɲa dɛnkɛlɛyatarene seni itoe birin fenma waxatin birin. Koni ɛ Fafe Ala ɛ makoon kolon.
42012031	Koni ɛ Alaa Mangayaan fen, na xanbi ra, a seni itoe fan soma ɛ yii nɛn.”
42012032	Yesu naxa, “Yɛxɛɛ kurudina, ɛ nama gaxu amasɔtɔ a bata ɛ Fafe Ala kɛnɛn, a Mangayaan so ɛ yii.
42012033	Ɛ ɛ yii seene birin sara, ɛ gbetin so yiigelitɔne yii. Ɛ gbetin namara seene sɔtɔ ɛ yɛtɛ xa naxanye mi kalɛ. Ɛ yi ɛ nafunla ramara ariyanna yi a mi ɲanma dɛnaxan yi, muɲadene nun mɛlimɛnle mi a kalɛ dɛnaxan yi.
42012034	Bayo i ya nafunla dɛnaxan yi, i xaxinla fan mɛnna nin.”
42012035	Yesu naxa, “Ɛ ɛ yitɔn alogo ɛ xa wali, ɛ yi ɛ lɛnpune radɛgɛ.
42012036	Ɛ xa liga alo walikɛɛn naxanye e kuntigin legedenma keli ɲaxalandi tiin malanni. A na fa waxatin naxan yi a dɛɛn kɔnkɔn, e a rabima a xa nɛn mafurɛn!
42012037	Muxu sɛwaxin nan ne ra naxanye kuntigina e lima e yɛ, e yitɔnxi! N xa ɲɔndin fala ɛ xa, a a tagi xidima nɛn, a yi e radɔxɔ, a donseen so e yii.
42012038	Muxu sɛwaxin nan ne ra xa a e yitɔnxin li, hali a fa kɔɛ tagini hanma dangu na ra.
42012039	Ɛ xaxili lu ito xɔn ma. Xa banxi kanna muɲaden fa waxatin kolon, a mi tinɲɛ muɲaden yi so a banxini.
42012040	Ɛ fan xa ɛ yitɔn amasɔtɔ ɛ xaxili mi waxatin naxan ma, n tan Muxuna Dii Xɛmɛn fama na waxatini.”
42012041	Piyɛri yi Yesu maxɔdin, a naxa, “Marigina, i sandani ito sama nxu tan nan xa ba hanma muxun birin xa?”
42012042	Marigin yi a yabi, a naxa, “Walikɛɛn mundun lannaya muxun nun xaxilimaan na? Naxan ma kuntigi a dɔxi walikɛɛn bonne xun na, a donseen taxun e ra a waxatini, a tan nan na ra.
42012043	Na walikɛɛn sɛwama nɛn xa a kuntigina a li na wanla kɛ!
42012044	N xa a fala ɛ xa yati, a kuntigina a yii seen birin taxuma a ra nɛn.
42012045	Koni xa a walikɛna a miri a yɛtɛ ma fa fala, ‘N ma kuntigin bata buyɛ ayi, a mi xɛtɛn xulɛn,’ xa a walikɛɛn bonne bɔnbɔ fɔlɔ, xɛmɛn nun ɲaxanle, a a dɛge, a yi a min han a yi a radangu ayi,
42012046	a kuntigin na fa waxatin naxan yi, walikɛɛn na xaxili mi a xɔn ma waxatin naxan yi, a kuntigina a ɲaxankatama nɛn nayi, a yi a saranna fi alo dɛnkɛlɛyatarene kii naxan yi.”
42012047	“Walikɛɛn naxan a kuntigin sagoon kolon, koni a mi tin na ligɛ, na bɔnbɔma nɛn bosaan yɛ wuyaxi ra kati!
42012048	Koni walikɛɛn naxan mi a kuntigin sagoon kolon, xa na fena nde liga, a bosaan sɔtɔma naxan ma fe ra, a bulanma nɛn nayi ndedi. Awa, a wuyaxi soxi naxan yii, a wuyaxi maxilima nɛn na ra. A gbegbe soxi naxan yi, a gbegbe maxilima nɛn na fan na dangu bonna ra.”
42012049	Yesu naxa, “N bata fa tɛɛn na dunuɲa yi. Xa a yi dɛgɛ nun, na rafan n ma han!
42012050	Koni fɔ n xa mamin tɔrɔni singen. N bɔɲɛ mi sɛ han a kamali!
42012051	Ɛ mirixi a ma fa fala a n faxi bɔɲɛ xunbenla nan na dunuɲa yi ba? N xa a fala ɛ xa, n mi faxi bɔɲɛ xunbenla xan na fɔ mayitaxunna.
42012052	To xanbi ra, muxu suulun yitaxunma nɛn denbaya kedenna kui, saxan fɔxɔ kedenni, firin fɔxɔ kedenni.
42012053	Dii fafane kelima nɛn dii xɛmɛne xili ma, dii xɛmɛne fan yi keli e fafane xili ma. Dii ngane kelima nɛn e dii tɛmɛne xili ma, dii tɛmɛne fan yi keli e ngane xili ma. Mamene kelima nɛn e diine ɲaxanle xili ma. Diine ɲaxanle fan yi keli e mamene xili ma.”
42012054	Yesu mɔn yi a fala yamaan xa, a naxa, “Ɛ na kundaan to sogegododeni waxatin naxan yi, ɛ a kolonma nɛn nayi fa fala, ‘Tulen famaan ni i ra,’ a ligama na kii nin.
42012055	Ɛ na foyen to kelɛ sogetede yiifari fɔxɔni waxatin naxan yi, ɛ a falama nɛn, ɛ naxa, ‘Kuye wolonma nɛn to,’ anu a ligama nɛn.
42012056	Ɛ tan nafigine, ɛ nɔɛ kore xɔnna nun bɔxɔ xɔnna matoɛ nɛn, ɛ yi a bunna kolon, nanfera ɛ mi nɔɛ waxatini ito bunna kolonɲɛ?”
42012057	“Nanfera ɛ mi nɔɛ kitin sɛ ɛ yɛtɛ ma, naxan tinxin ɛ na liga?
42012058	Xa i yɛngɛfaan sigama i ra i kitideni, ɛ nɛma kira yi waxatin naxan yi, i xa kata i na feen ɲan ɛ tagi alogo a nama siga i ra kitisaan fɛma, alogo kitisaan fan nama i so doma kanne yii, doma kanne fan yi i sa kasoon na.
42012059	N xa a fala i xa, i mi kelɛ na fɔ i yanginna birin fi.”
42013001	Na waxatini, muxuna ndee yi fa Galile kaane fe fala Yesu xa Pilati naxanye faxa e yi saraxan bama Ala xa waxatin naxan yi.
42013002	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Bayo Galile kaane bata faxa na kiini, ɛ mirima na ma nɛn ba, fa fala hakɛ kanna nan ne ra dangu Galile kaan bonne birin na ba?
42013003	Ɛn-ɛn de! N xa a fala ɛ xa, xa ɛ mi ɛ xun xanbi so ɛ hakɛne yi, ɛ birin faxama nɛn alo bonne.
42013004	Kore banxin naxan Siloyan yi, a bira muxu fu nun solomasɛxɛn naxanye fari, ne fe di? Ɛ mirixi a ma fa fala ne ɲaxu dangu Yerusalɛn kaane birin na ba?
42013005	Ɛn-ɛn de, n xa a fala ɛ xa, xa ɛ mi ɛ xun xanbi so ɛ hakɛne yi, ɛ birin faxama nɛn alo bonne.”
42013006	Yesu yi sandani ito sa e xa, a naxa, “Xɔdɛ binla yi xɛmɛna nde yii a nakɔni. A siga a bogin fendeni koni a mi sese to a kɔɛ ra.
42013007	Nanara, a yi a fala a nakɔ kantanna xa, a naxa, ‘A mato, a ɲɛɛ saxanna nan ito ra, n fama be, n fa xɔdɛni ito bogin fen koni n mi se to a ra. A sɛgɛ, i yi a woli ayi, a nama bɔxɔ faɲin kala.’
42013008	Koni a nakɔ kantanna yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘N kanna, a lu na ɲɛɛ kedenni ito yi. N xa yinla ge a rabilinni, n yi a rafe lɔxɔn na naxan a sabatima.
42013009	Xa xɔdɛ binli ito bogi nayi faraxi, na fan, xa a mi bogi, i yi a sɛgɛ.’ ”
42013010	Matabu Lɔxɔna nde yi, Yesu yi xaranna tima salide banxini.
42013011	Ɲaxanla nde yi na nun ɲinan ɲaxin yi naxan fɔxɔ ra, a bata yi a rafura ɲɛɛ fu nun solomasɛxɛ, a bata yi a mafelen, a mi yi fa nɔɛ a ratinxinɲɛ hali!
42013012	Yesu a to waxatin naxan yi, a yi a xili, a yi a fala, a naxa, “Nga ɲaxanla, i bata i sɔtɔ i ya fureni ito ra to!”
42013013	A yi a yiin sa a fari, ɲaxanla yi ratinxin kedenna, a yi Ala tantun.
42013014	Salide banxin kuntigin yi xɔlɔ, bayo Yesu bata muxun nakɛndɛya Matabu Lɔxɔni. Nanara, a falan ti yamaan xa, a naxa, “Wanla kɛma xii sennin nan bun, nayi ɛ xa fa na lɔxɔne ma, ɛ fa kɛndɛyaan sɔtɔ, koni a mi ligɛ Matabu Lɔxɔni!”
42013015	Marigin yi a yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ tan nafigine, ɛ tan naxanye birin be, ɛ mi ɛ ɲingena hanma sofanla fulunma ba, ɛ sa a ramin Matabu Lɔxɔni?
42013016	Awa, Iburahima bɔnsɔnna nan ɲaxanli ito ra, Setana bata naxan xidi ɲɛɛ fu nun solomasɛxɛ. A mi lan, a xa xɔrɔya, a fulun Matabu Lɔxɔni ba?”
42013017	Yesu a falan yi a yɛngɛfane birin nayagi. Na waxatini yamaan birin yi lu sɛwɛ a kabanako feene birin na.
42013018	Yesu naxa, “Alaa Mangayaan maligaxi nanse ra? N na a misalima nanse ma?
42013019	A luxi nɛn alo sansi kɛsɛ xuridina, xɛmɛn naxan si a xɛɛn ma, a gbo, a findi wudin na, xɔline yi e tɛɛn sa a yi.”
42013020	Yesu mɔn yi maxɔdinna ti, a naxa, “N na Alaa Mangayaan misalima nanse ma?
42013021	A ligaxi nɛn alo burun nate sena ɲaxanla naxan tongo, a yi a sa buru fuɲi bɛnbɛli keden yi, a yi a yimaxa, a birin yi te.”
42013022	Yesu yi siga taa gbeene nun banxidɛne ra, a xaranna ti a yi a tinxin Yerusalɛn taan na.
42013023	Nde yi a maxɔdin, a naxa, “N kanna, muxun naxan kisima, na mi wuya ba?” Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa,
42013024	“Ɛ yixɔdɔxɔ ɛ so dɛ xurin na, n xa a fala ɛ xa, muxu wuyaxi katama nɛn so feen na koni e mi nɔɛ soɛ.”
42013025	“Banxi kanna kelima nɛn, a dɛɛn balan. Ɛ ti a xanbi ra, ɛ dɛɛn makɔnkɔn fɔlɔ, ɛ naxa, ‘N kanna, dɛɛn nabi nxu xa,’ a ɛ yabima nɛn nayi, a naxa, ‘N mi ɛ keliden kolon!’
42013026	Awa, ɛ a yabima nɛn nayi, ɛ naxa, ‘Nxu bata yi nxu dɛge, nxu yi nxu min i fɛma, i bata xaranna ti nxɔ taani!’
42013027	A mɔn a falama nɛn, a naxa, ‘Ɛ tan tinxintarene, ɛ keli n fɛma, n mi ɛ keliden kolon.’
42013028	Ɛ na Iburahima nun Isiyaga nun Yaxuba nun nabine birin to Alaa Mangayani waxatin naxan yi, koni ɛ tan mi so, ɛ wugama nɛn nayi, ɛ yi ɛ ɲinna raxin kati!
42013029	Yamaan fama nɛn, sa keli sogeteden nun sogegododen nun yiifari fɔxɔn nun kɔmɛnna ma, e dɔxɔ sɛwa bande dondeni Alaa Mangayani.
42013030	Nayi, naxanye xanbin na, na ndee sa luma nɛn yɛɛn na. Naxanye yɛɛn na iki, ne yi sa lu xanbin na.”
42013031	Na waxatin yɛtɛni Farisi muxuna ndee yi fa Yesu fɛma, e yi a fala a xa, e naxa, “Keli be yi, i siga yire gbɛtɛ yi, amasɔtɔ Herode waxi i faxa feni.”
42013032	Yesu yi e yabi, a naxa, “Ɛ sa a fala na xulumaseen xa, ɛ naxa, ‘N ɲinanne kedima nɛn, n muxune rakɛndɛya to nun tila yi, a soge saxandeni, n yelinma nɛn n ma wanla ra.’
42013033	Koni hali na, fɔ n xa lu sigan tiyɛ nɛn to nun tila nun tila buda yi, bayo a mi lan nabiin xa faxa yire gbɛtɛ yi fɔ Yerusalɛn taani.”
42013034	A yi a fala, a naxa, “Yerusalɛn kaane! Yerusalɛn kaane! Ɛ tan naxanye nabine faxaxi, ɛ yi Alaa xɛrane magɔlɔn. A xɔnla n suxu nɛn sanɲa ma wuyaxi n xa ɛ malan n fɛma alo tɔxɛ ngana a diine malanma a gabutɛɛn bun ma kii naxan yi, koni ɛ mi tin!
42013035	Awa, Ala ɛ konna rabeɲinma nɛn fefe! N xa a fala ɛ xa, ɛ mi fa n toma han ɛ yi a fala, ɛ naxa, ‘Naxan fama Marigin xinli, Ala xa na baraka!’ ”
42014001	Matabu Lɔxɔna nde yi, Yesu yi siga a dɛgedeni Farisi muxu gbeena nde konni. Awa, yamaan yi Yesu matoma kati!
42014002	Xɛmɛn naxan fatin yi makusinxi, na yi fa Yesu yɛtagi.
42014003	Yesu yi sariya karamɔxɔne nun Farisi muxune maxɔdin, a naxa, “A daxa muxune yi rakɛndɛya Matabu Lɔxɔni ba, hanma na mi lan?”
42014004	Koni e mi a yabi hali! Yesu yi xɛmɛn tongo, a yi a rakɛndɛya, a siga.
42014005	Na xanbi ra, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Xa dii xɛmɛna hanma turana ɛ tan nde yii, xa a bira xɔɲinna kui Matabu Lɔxɔni, i mi a ratema mafurɛn Matabu Lɔxɔni ba?”
42014006	Koni e mi nɔ a maxɔdinna yabɛ.
42014007	Yesu mɔn yi falan ti muxu xilixine xa sandani, amasɔtɔ a yi a rakɔrɔsima e katama dɔxɔdeni yɛɛn na kii naxan yi, a naxa,
42014008	“Muxuna nde na i xili ɲaxalandi tiin malanni waxatin naxan yi, i nama dɔxɔ yɛɛn na, amasɔtɔ yanyina nde muxu gbɛtɛ xilixi naxan dangu i tan na.
42014009	Awa, naxan ɛ birin xilixi, na fama nɛn, a yi a fala i xa, a naxa, ‘Dɔxɔdeni ito so a yii.’ Xa na liga, i yagima nɛn nayi amasɔtɔ i bata keli na dɔxɔde faɲini.
42014010	Koni e na i xili waxatin naxan yi, siga i sa dɔxɔ xanbin na, nayi i xɔɲɛ yatigin fama nɛn i fɛma, a yi a fala i xa, a naxa, ‘N sɔxɔ, fa i magodo yire faɲini ito yi.’ I binyama nɛn nayi muxu xilixin bonne birin yɛtagi.
42014011	Amasɔtɔ naxan birin a yɛtɛ yitema, na magodoma nɛn. Naxan na a yɛtɛ magodo, na yitema nɛn.”
42014012	Yesu yi a fala xɔɲɛ yatigin xa, a naxa, “Xa i fɛriɲɛn seen hanma ximɛnna soma yamaan yii, i nama i xɔyine xili, hanma i ngaxakedenne hanma i xabilane hanma i dɔxɔ bode nafulu kanne, amasɔtɔ ne fan i xilima nɛn, e yi i ya donla saran.
42014013	I na ɲaxaɲaxan ti waxatin naxan yi, i xa yiigelitɔne xili e nun madɔntɔne nun sankalaxitɔne nun danxutɔne.
42014014	Awa, i barayin sɔtɔma nɛn nayi amasɔtɔ ne mi nɔɛ a donla saranɲɛ. Koni Ala a saranna fiyɛ muxu tinxinxine rakeli waxatini sayani.”
42014015	Donse donna nde yi a fɛma, na ito mɛ waxatin naxan yi, a yi a fala Yesu xa, a naxa, “Muxu sɛwaxin nan ne ra naxanye balon donma Alaa Mangayani.”
42014016	Yesu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Xɛmɛna nde yi na naxan donse donna malan gbeen ti, a muxu wuyaxi xili.
42014017	Na malanna waxati saxini, a yi a walikɛɛn nasiga, a xa sa a fala a muxu xilixine xa, a e xa fa, seene birin bata yi yelin yitɔnɲɛ!
42014018	Koni e birin yi e makone fala fɔlɔ. A singe ra xiin yi a fala walikɛɛn xa, a naxa, ‘N bata xɛɛn sara fɔ n xa sa na mato, yandi i hakɛ lu n xa.’
42014019	Bonna naxa, ‘N bata ɲinge fu sara, n sa e matoma, yandi i xa i hakɛ lu n xa.’
42014020	Bonna fan naxa, ‘N baxi ɲaxanla futude nɛn. Nanara, n mi nɔɛ sigɛ.’
42014021	Walikɛɛn yi xɛtɛ, a sa na birin fala a kuntigin xa. Awa, banxi kanna yi xɔlɔ nayi han, a yi a fala a walikɛɛn xa, a naxa, ‘I mafura, i siga kirane xɔn ma, i sa fa yiigelitɔne nun madɔntɔne nun danxutɔne nun sankalaxitɔne ra.’
42014022	A mi bu walikɛɛn naxa, ‘N kanna, i naxan fala n xa, n bata na liga koni dɔxɔdena ndee mɔn luxi.’
42014023	Nanara, kuntigin yi a fala walikɛɛn xa, a naxa, ‘Siga xɛɛn ma kirane xɔn ma e nun burunna ra, i kankan yamaan ma, e xa fa, alogo n ma banxin xa rafe.
42014024	N xa a fala i xa, muxun naxanye xilixi, ne sese mi fa fɛriɲɛn seni ito donɲɛ!’ ”
42014025	Yama gbeen yi Yesu fɔxɔ ra sigatini, a yi a yɛɛ rafindi e ma, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa,
42014026	“Muxu yo fa n tan fɛma, a mi nɔɛ findɛ n ma xarandiin na fɔ a xa a mɛ a nga nun a fafe ra e nun a ɲaxanla nun a diine nun a ngaxakeden xɛmɛmane nun a ɲaxalanmane nun a yɛtɛna.
42014027	Muxu yo mi a faxa wudin tongo, a bira n fɔxɔ ra, na mi findɛ n ma xarandiin na.
42014028	Xa ɛ tan nde waxi a xɔn, a xa sangansoon ti, a dɔxɔma nɛn singen, a yi a gbetin yatɛ a yi a kolon naxan ɲɔxɔn a yii, xa na wanla ɲanɲɛ.
42014029	Xa a mi na liga, a na yelin a bɛtɛn sɛ waxatin naxan yi, a mi nɔɛ sangansoon naɲanɲɛ. Naxan birin na na to, e a magelema nɛn.
42014030	E a falama nɛn, e naxa, ‘Xɛmɛni ito bata banxin ti fɔlɔ koni a mi nɔxi a raɲanɲɛ!’ ”
42014031	Yesu naxa, “Xa mangana nde na naxan ma gali muxu wuli fu liyɛ, a waxi a xɔn ma, a xa sa mangan bonna yɛngɛ naxan ma gali sigɛ han muxu wuli mɔxɔɲɛ, a dɔxɔma nɛn singen, a yi a yatɛ xa a sɛnbɛn na mangan yɛngɛ.
42014032	Xa sɛnbɛ mi a yii, a xɛraan nasigama nɛn benun a xa a fɛman li, a yi a mafan, alogo e nama yɛngɛ.
42014033	Awa, a na kii nin, ɛ tan nde keden mi nɔɛ findɛ n ma xarandiin na fɔ a xa a yii seen birin yiba.”
42014034	“Fɔxɔn fan, koni xa a mɛxɛmɛxɛnna ba ayi, a fa ramɛxɛmɛxɛnma nanse ra nayi?
42014035	A mi lan bɔxɔn ma, a mɔn mi findɛ lɔxɔn na sansine xa fɔ a woli ayi nɛn. Xa tunla naxan ma a feen mɛ, na xa a tuli mati!”
42015001	Lɔxɔna nde mudu maxinle nun yulubitɔ wuyaxi yi fa Yesu fɛma e tuli matideni.
42015002	Farisi muxune nun sariya karamɔxɔne yi falan ti fɔlɔ e dɛ bun ma, e naxa, “Xɛmɛni ito yulubitɔne yisuxuma, a yi a dɛge e fɛma.”
42015003	Nanara, Yesu yi sandan sa e xa, a naxa,
42015004	“Xa yɛxɛɛ kɛmɛ ɛ tan nde yi, na nde keden yi lɔ ayi, a nanfe ligama? A yɛxɛɛ tonge solomanaanin e nun solomanaaninna luma nɛn burunna ra, a sa a tununxin fen han a yi a to.
42015005	A na to waxatin naxan yi, a sɛwama nɛn, a yi a sa a kɔɛ ma,
42015006	a mɔn yi siga a ra a konni, a yi a dɔxɔ bodene nun a xɔyine xili, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, ‘En sɛwa amasɔtɔ n ma yɛxɛɛn naxan yi tununxi n bata a to!’
42015007	N xa a fala ɛ xa, a na kii nin, sɛwan tima nɛn ariyanna yi hakɛ kan keden tubixina fe ra dangu tinxin muxu tonge solomanaanin e nun solomanaaninna ra naxanye mirixi a ma fa fala e mako mi tubin ma.”
42015008	“Awa, gbeti gbanan fu ɲaxanla naxan yii, xa na keden tunun a ma, a nanfe ligama? A lɛnpun nan nadɛgɛma, a yi a banxin makɔ mafurɛn, a yi a fen yiren birin yi han a yi a to.
42015009	A na a to waxatin naxan yi, a a xɔyine nun a dɔxɔ bodene xilima nɛn e bode xɔn ma, a yi a fala e xa, a naxa, ‘En sɛwa en bode xɔn ma amasɔtɔ n ma gbetin naxan tunun, n bata a to!’
42015010	Awa, n xa a fala ɛ xa a na kii nin, Alaa malekane sɛwama nɛn hakɛ kan keden na fe ra naxan bata tubi.”
42015011	Yesu yi lu falan tiyɛ, a naxa, “Xɛmɛna nde yi na, dii xɛmɛ firin yi a yii.
42015012	A xurimaan yi a fala a fafe xa, a naxa, ‘N fafe, i ya nafunla taxun, i n gbeen so n yii.’ Awa, a fafe yi nafunla taxun e nun a tada ra.
42015013	Waxatidi danguxina xurimaan yi a gbee seene sara, a gbetin tongo, a siga yamana makuyena nde yi, a sa a gbetin birin kala dunuɲa feene yi.
42015014	A yii seen birin yi ɲan, na xanbi ra, kamɛ gbeen yi so na yamanan birin yi, sese mi yi fa a tan yii sɔnɔn.
42015015	Awa, a siga na yamanan dugurenna nde fɛma wali kɛdeni, na yi a rasiga a xɛɛn ma xɔsɛ kantandeni.
42015016	Xɔsɛne toge dagin naxan donma, a xɔnla yi a suxu a xa na nde don koni muxe mi na so a yii.
42015017	Dɔnxɛn na, a yi a miri, a naxa, ‘N fafe a walikɛne donseen donma han e mi a ɲanɲɛ koni kamɛna n tan faxamaan ni i ra.
42015018	N xa siga n fafe fɛma n sa a fala a xa, n naxa, N fafe, n bata hakɛn liga i tan na, n yi Ala yulubin tongo.
42015019	I mi lan sɔnɔn i xa n xili fa fala i ya diina, i xa n suxu alo i ya walikɛɛn bonne.’
42015020	Awa, a keli, a xɛtɛ a fafe konni.” “Benun a xa na li waxatin naxan yi, a fafe yi a to fɛ, a ndedi makuya. A kininkinin a ma kati, a yi a bara, a sa a ralan, a yi a yiin nabilin a dii xɛmɛn ma, a yi a sunbu.
42015021	A dii xɛmɛn naxa, ‘N fafe, n bata hakɛn liga i tan na, n yi Ala yulubin tongo, a mi lan sɔnɔn i xa n xili fa fala i ya diina.’
42015022	Koni a fafe yi a walikɛne xili, a naxa, ‘Ɛ mafura, ɛ fa doma gbeen na, ɛ yi a ragodo a ma, ɛ yii rasoon so a yii sonla ra, ɛ sankidin so a sanni.
42015023	Ɛ sa ɲinge raturaxin faxa, en malanna raba, en sɛwa.
42015024	Amasɔtɔ n ma dii xɛmɛn bata yi faxa nun koni iki a niin bata bira ayi mɔn. A bata yi tunun nun koni iki, n bata a to.’ Awa, e ɲaxaɲaxan fɔlɔ.”
42015025	“Na waxatini, dii xɛmɛn forimaan sa xɛɛn ma. A faxi na sa keli xɛɛn ma, a maso banxin na waxatin naxan yi, a sumun xuiin nun bodon ti xuiin mɛ.
42015026	Awa, a walikɛ keden xili, a yi a maxɔdin, a naxa, ‘Nanfe ligaxi?’
42015027	Walikɛɛn yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘I xunyɛn bata fa, i fafe bata ɲinge raturaxin faxa a xa, amasɔtɔ a mɔn bata a dii xɛmɛn to, a kɛndɛ.’
42015028	A tada yi xɔlɔ kati, a mi tin soɛ banxini. Nanara, a fafe yi fa, a yi a mafan a xa so.
42015029	Koni, a yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘A mato, n bata ɲɛɛni itoe birin wanla kɛ i xa alo konyina, n mi i ya yamarin matandi hali sanɲa ma keden pe. I nanse soxi n yii? Hali sii diina, i mi a so n yii nxu nun n lanfane yi sɛwa nxu bode xɔn ma!
42015030	Koni i ya dii xɛmɛn naxan bata i ya nafunla birin kala yalunyani, bayo na mɔn bata fa, i bata ɲinge raturaxin faxa a xa!’
42015031	A fafe yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘N ma diina, i tan n fɛma be waxatin birin, n yii seen birin i tan nan gbee a ra.
42015032	Koni a lan en xa malanna ti, en sɛwa amasɔtɔ i xunyɛn bata yi faxa nun koni a niin bata bira ayi iki. A bata yi tunun nun koni iki n bata a to.’ ”
42016001	Yesu yi a fala a xarandiine xa, a naxa, “Nafulu kanna nde yi na nun, walikɛɛn yi naxan yii a feene xun na. Muxune yi a fala nafulu kanna xa, e naxa, ‘I walikɛ mangan naxan dɔxi, a i ya nafunla kalama.’
42016002	Nafulu kanna yi na walikɛ mangan xili banxini, a yi a fala a xa, a naxa, ‘N naxan mɛxi i ya fe yi ito ra, na di? N nafunla naxan soxi i yii, fa i dɛntɛgɛ amasɔtɔ n mi i findima walikɛ mangan na sɔnɔn.’
42016003	A yi a fala a yɛtɛ ma, a naxa, ‘N ma kuntigina n yiibama nɛn n ma wanli ito ra, n nanfe ligama nayi? Sɛnbɛ mi n na n xɛɛn sa, n yagima nɛn xanditideni.
42016004	Koni n naxan ligama, n bata na kolon iki! Benun n xa n yiin ba wanli waxatin naxan yi, n xɔyine sɔtɔma nɛn naxanye n yisuxɛ e konne yi.’
42016005	Awa, a kuntigina donla muxun naxanye birin ma, a yi ne xili. A yi a fala a singe ra xiin xa, a naxa, ‘N ma kuntigina donla yoli i ma?’
42016006	A yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘Oliwi turen liga se xungbeen yɛ kɛmɛ donla nan n ma.’ Walikɛ mangan yi a fala, a naxa, ‘I ya doli kɛdin nan ito ra, dɔxɔ, i tonge suulun sɛbɛ.’
42016007	A yi a fala bonna xa, a naxa, ‘Yoli i tan ma?’ Na yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘Malo bɛnbɛli kɛmɛ nan n ma.’ Kuntigin yi a fala a xa, a naxa, ‘I ya doli kɛdin nan ito ra, tonge solomasɛxɛ sɛbɛ.’
42016008	Na walikɛ manga tinxintarena kuntigin yi a matɔxɔ a to kɔtaxi ayi fe ɲaxi rabadeni, amasɔtɔ dunuɲa muxune kɔta fe ɲaxi rabadeni dangu kɛnɛnna gbee muxune ra.”
42016009	Yesu yi a fala, a naxa, “Ɛ xɔyine fen ɛ yɛtɛ xa dunuɲa nafunli alogo a na ɲan i yii waxatin naxan yi, naxanye ariyanna yi ne ɛ yisuxuma nɛn habadan banxine yi.
42016010	Naxan lannayaan liga fedi xurini, na lannayaan ligama nɛn fe gbeene fan yi. Koni naxan tinxintareyaan ligama fe xurine yi, a tinxintareyaan ligama nɛn fe gbeene fan yi.
42016011	E nafunla naxan soma ɛ yii dunuɲa yi, xa ɛ mi lannayaan liga nayi, nde lama ɛ ra nafulu feni ariyanna yi?
42016012	Xa ɛ mi lannayaan liga muxune gbeeni, nde i tan gbeen soma i yii?”
42016013	“Walikɛ yo mi nɔɛ walɛ kuntigi firinna xa sanɲa ma kedenni. Amasɔtɔ a kedenna raɲaxuma nɛn, a kedenna xanu, hanma a kedenna binya, a yi a mɛ bonna ra. Ɛ mi nɔɛ wanla kɛ Ala nun nafunla xa sanɲa yi kedenni.”
42016014	Farisi muxune yi ito birin mɛ, e yi Yesu magele amasɔtɔ e bata gbetin xanu.
42016015	Yesu yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Ɛ yɛtɛ findima muxu tinxinxine ra yamaan yɛtagi, koni Ala tan ɛ bɔɲɛ yi feen kolon. Amasɔtɔ muxun feen naxan yatɛxi, fe haramuxin nan na ra Ala yɛɛ ra yi.”
42016016	“Benun Yoni gbee waxatin xa a li Sariya Kitabun nun nabine kitabune nan yi ralima nun. Fɔlɔ na waxatin ma Alaa Mangayana fe Xibaru Faɲin yi rali, muxun birin yi e yixɔdɔxɔ, e so a yi.
42016017	Koni kore xɔnna nun bɔxɔ xɔnna danguɛ nɛn benun Sariya Kitabun sɛbɛnla yiredi keden xa ba a ra.”
42016018	“Xɛmɛn naxan na a mɛ a ɲaxanla ra a yi nde gbɛtɛ futu, na bata yalunyaan liga. Xɛmɛn naxan na ɲaxalan namɛxin futu, na fan bata yalunyaan liga.”
42016019	Yesu naxa, “Nafulu kanna nde yi na nun naxan yi marabɛri baxi dugi sare xɔdɛxɛne ra, a yi ɲaxunni waxatin birin.
42016020	Yiigelitɔna nde fan yi na nun, a xili Lasarusi, koron yi a fatin birin ma. Na yi saxi nafulu kanna dɛɛn na waxatin birin.
42016021	A yi waxi a xɔn ma bande kɛsɛdin naxanye yolonma keli nafulu kanna tabanla ra, a xa ne don. Barene fan yi lu a korone dɛ kɔnɲɛ.
42016022	Xɛmɛ yiigelitɔɔn na yi faxa, malekane yi siga a ra Iburahima dɛxɔn ma yire ɲaxumɛni. Awa, nafulu kanna fan yi faxa, e yi a maluxun.
42016023	A tɔrɔ laxira yi kati! A yi a yɛɛ rasiga, a yi Iburahima to wulani, Lasarusi a dɛxɔn ma.
42016024	A yi gbelegbele, a naxa, ‘N Fafe Iburahima, kininkinin n ma, Lasarusi xɛ n ma, a xa a yii sonla sin igeni, a yi fa a dindin n lɛnna ma, amasɔtɔ n tɔrɔxi tɛɛni be kati!’
42016025	Koni Iburahima yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘N ma dii, i xaxili na xɔn ma ba, i yi kɛndɛ waxatin naxan yi, i se faɲin birin sɔtɔ nɛn koni Lasarusi tan yi tɔrɔn nin. Iki a tan sɛwaxi be, i tan tɔrɔni.
42016026	Mɔn sɔnɔn, yili gbeena en tagi alogo naxanye waxi keli feni be, siga i fɛma, ne nama siga. Muxe nama keli i fan fɛma mɛnni fa nxu fɛma be.’
42016027	Nafulu kanna naxa, ‘N fafe, n na i mafanma, i xa Lasarusi xɛ, a xa siga n fafe konni,
42016028	bayo n ngaxakedenmaan muxu suulun na yi, a xa sa e kawandi alogo e nama fa tɔrɔ yireni ito yi be.’
42016029	Iburahima yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘Musa nun nabine falane e fɛma na, e xa ne xuiin namɛ.’
42016030	Nafulu kanna yi a yabi, a naxa, ‘N fafe Iburahima, na mi a gasɛ! Koni xa muxun keli sayani, a siga e fɛma, e e xun xanbi soma e hakɛni nɛn, e tubi.’
42016031	Koni Iburahima naxa, ‘Xa e mi e tuli mati Musa nun nabine ra, hali muxun keli sayani, a siga e fɛma, e mi lɛ a ra.’ ”
42017001	Yesu yi a fala a xarandiine xa, a naxa, “Feen naxanye muxune birama yulubini, a fɛrɛ mi na fɔ ne xa taran na, koni gbalona e yɛɛ ra naxanye na findi sabun na.
42017002	A yi lan ne ma, gɛmɛ gbeen xa xidi e kɔɛ ra, e woli baan nin benun e xa diidi xurini ito nde keden bira yulubini.
42017003	Ɛ a liga ɛ yeren ma!” “Xa i ngaxakedenna hakɛn liga, i xa a sɔnna yita a ra. Xa a na feen beɲin, i xa a mafelu.
42017004	Xa a hakɛn liga i ra sanɲa yi solofere soge kedenni, koni a yi fa i fɛma na waxatin birin yi, a naxa, ‘N bata nimisa,’ a mafelu.”
42017005	Xɛrane yi a fala Marigin xa, e naxa, “Nxɔ dɛnkɛlɛyaan fari sa.”
42017006	Marigin yi e yabi, a naxa, “Xa ɛ dɛnkɛlɛyaan gbo ayi alo sansi kɛsɛ xuridina, ɛ nɔɛ a falɛ nɛn wudi bili gbeeni ito ma, ɛ naxa, ‘I yɛtɛ tala bɔxɔni, i sa ti fɔxɔ igen tagi!’ A ɛ fala xuiin suxuma nɛn.”
42017007	“Xa konyina ɛ tan nde yii naxan xɛɛn sama hanma a yɛxɛɛne kantan, a na fa waxatin naxan yi, sa keli xɛɛn ma, i a falama a xa nɛn ba, fa fala, ‘Fa i dɛge?’
